




























































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Livru nee koalia kona ba Jesus Kristu. Jesus husi liurai David nia jerasaun, i David nee husi Abraão nia jerasaun.
Jesus nia bei-ala sira nia naran komesa husi Abraão too liurai David hanesan tuir mai nee: Abraão nia oan Isac. Isac nia oan Jacó. Jacó nia oan Judá ho ninia maun-alin sira.
Judá nia oan Perez ho Zerá, sira nia inan naran Tamar. Perez nia oan Hesron. Hesron nia oan Aram.
Aram nia oan Aminadab. Aminadab nia oan Nahason. Nahason nia oan Salmon.
Salmon nia oan Boaz, nia inan naran Rahab. Boaz nia oan Obed, nia inan naran Rute. Obed nia oan Jessé.
Jessé nia oan liurai David. Jesus nia bei-ala sira husi liurai David too nia jerasaun nebee mak militar lori baa dadur iha rai Babilónia, sira nia naran mak tuir mai nee: David nia oan Salomão, nia inan nee uluk Urias nia feen.
Salomão nia oan Roboão. Roboão nia oan Abias. Abias nia oan Aza.
Aza nia oan Josafat. Josafat nia oan Jorão. Jorão nia oan Uzias.
Uzias nia oan Jotam. Jotam nia oan Ahaz. Ahaz nia oan Ezequias.
Ezequias nia oan Manassés. Manassés nia oan Amon. Amon nia oan Jozias.
Jozias nia oan mak Jekonias ho nia alin sira. Iha sira nia tempu mak militar lori povu Israel baa dadur iha Babilónia.
Jesus nia bei-ala sira husi tempu dadur nee ba oin mak tuir mai nee: Jekonias nia oan Salatiel. Salatiel nia oan Zorobabel.
Zorobabel nia oan Abiud. Abiud nia oan Eliakim. Eliakim nia oan Azur.
Azur nia oan Zadok. Zadok nia oan Jakim. Jakim nia oan Eliud.
Eliud nia oan Eleazar. Eleazar nia oan Matan. Matan nia oan Jacó.
Jacó nia oan José. José kaben ho Maria, i Maria mak kous Jesus. Jesus nee, ema mos bolu Nia Mesias, nee dehan katak, Salvador nebee Maromak promete hori uluk kedas atu haruka mai.
Nunee, komesa husi Abraão too David hamutuk jerasaun sanulu resin haat. Husi David too militar lori povu Israel baa dadur iha Babilónia mos jerasaun sanulu resin haat. I husi jerasaun nebee dadur iha Babilónia too Mesias hamutuk jerasaun sanulu resin haat tan.
Istoria kona ba Jesus Kristu nia moris hanesan nee: Nia inan Maria troka prenda ona ho José. Maibee bainhira sira nain rua seidauk moris hamutuk nudar feen ho laen, Maria hatene ona katak nia isin rua liu husi Espiritu Santu nia kbiit.
Bainhira José hatene katak Maria isin rua ona, nia hakarak atu hakotu sira nain rua nia relasaun. Maibee José lakohi halo moe Maria iha ema barak nia oin, tanba nia ema ida nebee laran moos. Nunee nia desidi atu hakotu nonook deit.
Maibee bainhira José hanoin hela buat nee, Nai Maromak nia anju ida mai hatudu aan ba nia liu husi mehi. Anju nee dehan, “José, liurai David nia jerasaun, la bele tauk atu kaben ho Maria. Tanba Labarik nebee mak iha Maria nia kabun laran nee mai husi Espiritu Santu.
Maria sei tuur ahi oan mane ida. O tenki foo naran Jesus, tanba Nia mak sei salva Nia povu husi sira nia sala.”
Buat hirak nee hotu sai nunee tuir saida mak Nai Maromak nia profeta hori uluk kedas hakerek ona dehan,
“Aban-bainrua iha feto raan ida sei isin rua hodi tuur ahi oan mane ida. Labarik nee nia naran Emanuel.” Nee dehan katak “Maromak hamutuk ho ita”.
Bainhira José hadeer, nia halo tuir saida mak anju nee hatete ba nia. Nia kaben ho Maria.
Maibee nia la halo relasaun ho Maria hanesan feen-laen too Maria tuur ahi. I José foo naran ba Labarik nee, Jesus.
Jesus moris iha aldeia Belém iha provinsia Judeia. Iha tempu nebaa liurai Herodes mak ukun rai nee. Iha loron ida matenek nain balu nebee hatene siik sinal iha fitun, sira mai husi rai dook, husi parte lorosae. Too iha sidade Jerusalém,
sira husu, “Kosok Oan nebee moris atu sai ema Judeu sira nia liurai nee iha nebee? Ami haree tiha ona fitun ida iha parte lorosae nebee foo sinal kona ba Nia moris. Tanba nee mak ami mai atu adora Nia.”
Bainhira liurai Herodes rona sira nia liafuan nee, nia laran susar teb-tebes, nunee mos povu iha Jerusalém tomak.
Depois Herodes halibur nai lulik nia ulun sira ho mestri relijiaun sira hotu hodi husu, “Mesias, Salvador nebee Maromak promete hori uluk kedas atu haruka mai nee, sei moris iha nebee?”
Sira hataan, “Iha aldeia Belém iha provinsia Judeia. Tanba hori uluk kedas Maromak nia profeta hakerek dehan,
‘Imi ema Belém, iha povu Judá nia rain, keta hanoin dehan imi mak kiik liu iha Judá nee. Tanba ukun nain ida sei mai husi imi nia rain, Nia mak sei sai bibi atan ba Hau nia povu Israel.’”
Rona nunee, Herodes bolu nonook matenek nain sira nee hodi husu ba sira, hori-bainhira loos mak fitun nee mosu. I sira mos esplika ba nia.
Depois nia haruka sira baa Belém. Nia hameno hela dehan, “Senhor sira baa buka di-diak Labarik nee. Bainhira hetan ona Nia, mai fali foo hatene hau, para hau mos bele baa adora Nia.”
Rona tiha liurai nia liafuan, matenek nain sira nee komesa lao ba dadauk. Derepenti fitun nebee sira uluk haree iha lorosae nee, mosu fila fali iha sira nia oin. Haree nunee, sira mos kontenti teb-tebes, i sira lao tuir fitun nee. Too iha Labarik nee nia hela fatin, fitun nee mos para iha uma leten.
<range>
Nunee sira tama liu ba uma laran haree Labarik nee ho Nia inan Maria, i sira hakneak hakruuk too rai hodi adora Nia. Depois sira hasai sira nia prezenti karun teb-tebes, sira foo ba Labarik nee osan mean, ai been morin ho mina morin diak nian.
Hotu tiha Maromak foo hanoin ba sira liu husi mehi katak sira la bele fila fali ba Herodes. Entaun sira fila ba sira nia rain liu husi dalan seluk.
Bainhira matenek nain sira fila tiha, Nai Maromak nia anju mai hatudu aan ba José liu husi mehi. Anju nee foo hatene dehan, “Hadeer ona! Lori Labarik nee ho Nia inan halai ba iha rai Ejitu, tanba Herodes buka hela Labarik nee atu oho Nia. Hela iha nebaa too hau foo hatene fali ba o katak imi bele fila.”
Iha kalan nee kedas, José hadeer lori Labarik nee ho Nia inan halai ba Ejitu,
i sira hela iha nebaa too Herodes mate. Uluk kedas Nai Maromak koalia liu husi Nia profeta dehan, “Hau bolu Hau nia Oan sai husi Ejitu.” Agora sai duni nunee.
Bainhira liurai Herodes hatene katak, matenek nain sira halo beik tiha nia hodi fila liu husi dalan seluk, nia hirus teb-tebes. Nia foo orden ba soldadu sira atu baa Belém vila ho rai nebee besik hodi oho hotu labarik mane kiikoan nebee tinan rua mai kraik. Nia foo orden nunee tuir informasaun husi matenek nain sira kona ba tempu nebee mak sira haree fitun nee mosu.
Buat nee akontese tuir saida mak Maromak nia profeta Jeremias foo sai uluk kedas dehan,
“Iha ema tanis hakilar iha aldeia Rama. Rakél tanis halerik tanba nia oan sira la iha ona. Ema hamaus nia atu la bele tanis maibee nia lakohi rona.”
Ikus mai liurai Herodes mate. Iha tempu nebaa Nai Maromak nia anju hatudu aan ba José liu husi mehi iha rai Ejitu.
Anju nee dehan, “Hadeer ona! Lori Labarik nee ho Nia inan fila fali ba rai Israel, tanba ema nebee hakarak oho Labarik nee mate tiha ona.”
Entaun José hadeer i lori Labarik nee ho Nia inan fila fali ba Israel.
Maibee too iha nebaa, José rona katak liurai Herodes nia oan Arquelau mak ukun fali iha provinsia Judeia, nunee nia tauk atu fila ba nebaa. Maromak mos foo hanoin ba nia liu husi mehi. Entaun sira baa hela fali iha provinsia Galileia,
iha aldeia ida naran Nazaré. Nunee buat nebee profeta sira uluk koalia akontese duni. Sira dehan, “Ema sei bolu Nia Nazaré oan.”
Molok Jesus hahuu Nia knaar, João Sarani Nain komesa hanorin ema iha rai fuik maran iha rai Judeia.
Nia foo sai dehan, “Hakribi ona imi nia sala, tanba tempu besik ona atu Maromak ukun imi.”
Uluk liu Maromak nia profeta Isaias hakerek ona kona ba João dehan, “Iha ema ida foo sai ho lian makaas iha rai fuik maran dehan, ‘Imi tenki hadia dalan para simu ita nia Nai. Halo loos tiha dalan nebee kleuk para Nia lao tuir.’ ”
João nia hena halo husi kuda kamelu nia fulun, i nia sintu halo husi animal nia kulit. Nia hahaan mak gafanhotu ho bani been.
Ema barak mai husi fatin oi-oin atu haree João. Sira mai husi sidade Jerusalém, husi provinsia Judeia tomak ho mos husi aldeia sira nebee mak besik iha mota Jordaun.
Sira foo sai sira nia sala, depois João foo sarani sira iha mota Jordaun.
Iha mos ema barak husi grupu Farizeu ho Saduseu mai atu João foo sarani sira. Maibee bainhira João haree sira, nia siak sira dehan, “Hoi! Samea nia oan! Maromak sei kastigu imi tanba imi nia hahalok aat. Karik ema bosok imi dehan imi bele sarani para sees aan husi kastigu nee.
Imi tenki muda imi nia hahalok hodi hatudu katak imi husik duni imi nia sala.
I lalika hanoin dehan, imi loos ona tanba deit imi Abraão nia jerasaun. Lae! Hau hatete ba imi, fatuk sira nee mos, Maromak bele halo sai Abraão nia jerasaun.
Maromak hanesan toos nain nebee kaer hela baliu atu tesi ona ai huun too abut. Ai huun hotu-hotu nebee la foo fuan diak, Nia sei tesi tiha hodi soe ba ahi laran.
Hau foo sarani imi ho bee deit para hatudu katak, imi hakribi ona imi nia sala. Maibee la kleur tan, Ema ida boot liu hau sei mai. Atu lori deit Nia sandalias mos, hau la serve. Ema nee laos foo sarani imi ho bee, maibee Nia sei foo sarani imi hodi Espiritu Santu ho mos ahi.
Nia hanesan natar nain nebee prontu ona atu haketak hare isin ho hare kulit sira nee. Hotu tiha, hare isin nia sei rai di-diak iha armazen, maibee hare kulit nia soe tiha ba ahi ida nebee nunka mate.”
Iha tempu nebaa Jesus mai husi rai Galileia ba iha mota Jordaun para João foo sarani Nia.
Maibee João lakohi. Nia dehan, “Tuir lo-loos Ita Boot mak foo sarani hau. Nusaa mak Ita Boot mai fali iha hau?”
Jesus hataan, “Husik ba, agora nee ita mak foo sarani Hau para halo tuir Maromak nia hakarak.” João mos simu.
Sarani hotu tiha, Jesus sai kedas husi bee laran. Derepenti lalehan nakloke, i Nia haree Maromak nia Espiritu hanesan manu pombu tuun ba iha Nia.
Depois lian ida husi lalehan hatete, “Ida nee Hau nia Oan Doben; Nia halo Hau nia laran haksolok teb-tebes.”
Hotu tiha, Maromak nia Espiritu domina Jesus i lori Nia ba iha rai fuik maran atu Satanás bele koko Nia.
Iha nebaa Jesus jejun durante loron haat-nulu, kalan haat-nulu, too Nia hamlaha.
Depois diabu tentador mai koko Jesus. Diabu nee dehan, “Se O Maromak nia Oan duni, haruka fatuk sira nee sai paun.”
Maibee Jesus hataan, “Iha Livru Sagradu hakerek, ‘Ema kriatura laos moris husi hahaan deit, maibee presiza mos Maromak nia liafuan hotu-hotu.’”
Depois Satanás lori Jesus ba iha Jerusalém, Maromak nia sidade. Satanás lori Nia baa hamriik iha uma kreda boot nia tutun,
i dehan, “Se O Maromak nia Oan duni, soe aan tuun ba rai. Tanba iha Livru Sagradu hakerek dehan, ‘Maromak sei haruka Nia anju sira mai kuidadu O.’ ‘Sira sei lolo liman hodi tane O, atu O nia ain la bele kona fatuk.’”
Maibee Jesus hataan dehan, “Iha Livru Sagradu mos bandu ema dehan, ‘La bele koko Maromak, o nia Nai.’”
Depois Satanás lori tan Jesus ba iha foho ida aas teb-tebes nia tutun, i hatudu ba Jesus nasaun hotu-hotu iha mundu tomak ho sira nia riku-soin hotu.
Satanás dehan ba Jesus, “Buat sira nee hotu hau sei foo ba O, naran katak O hakneak hodi adora hau.”
Maibee Jesus hataan fali dehan, “Satanás, sai tiha husi nee! Tanba iha Livru Sagradu haruka ema hotu-hotu nunee: ‘O tenki adora Maromak, o nia Nai, i serbi mak Nia deit.’”
Hotu tiha Satanás husik tiha Jesus, i anju sira mai serbi Nia.
Iha loron ida, Jesus rona katak ema kaer tiha João Sarani Nain hodi baa dadur iha komarka. Nunee Jesus husik tiha provinsia Judeia baa fali iha provinsia Galileia.
Too iha nebaa, Nia baa uluk iha Nia aldeia Nazaré, depois baa hela fali iha sidade Kafarnaum. Sidade nee iha tasi Galileia nia sorin, iha rai Zebulón ho Naftali.
Nunee Jesus halo tuir saida mak Maromak nia profeta Isaias hakerek nanis ona dehan,
“Rai Zebulón ho rai Naftali, besik tasi Galileia, iha mota Jordaun nia sorin ba, rai Galileia, ema nebee laos Judeu nia hela fatin.
Iha rai nee, ema uluk moris iha nakukun laran, maibee agora sira hetan ona naroman boot. Iha sira nia rain, uluk nakukun atu lori sira ba mate haketak aan husi Maromak, maibee agora naroman mosu ona hodi leno sira.”
Iha tempu nebaa Jesus komesa foo sai ba ema dehan, “Hakribi ona imi nia sala, tanba tempu besik ona atu Maromak ukun imi.”
Iha loron ida Jesus lao hela iha tasi ibun Galileia. Nia haree peskador nain rua soe hela dai iha tasi. Sira nain rua nee maun-alin, maun naran Simão, ema mos bolu nia Pedro. Alin naran André.
Jesus dehan ba sira, “Mai tuir Hau! Imi nee peskador ikan nian, maibee agora Hau sei hanorin imi atu sai peskador ba ema.”
Sira mos husik kedas sira nia dai hodi tuir Jesus.
Jesus lao nafatin, Nia haree tan ema nain rua, Tiago ho nia alin João. Sira nain rua hadia hela redi iha roo laran hamutuk ho sira nia aman Zebedeu. Jesus bolu tan sira nain rua atu tuir Nia.
Tiago ho João mos husik kedas sira nia aman ho sira nia roo hodi tuir Jesus.
Jesus lao iha provinsia Galileia tomak hodi hanorin iha ema Judeu sira nia uma kreda. Nia foo sai Liafuan Diak kona ba oinsaa Maromak ukun nudar Liurai. I ema nia moras oi-oin deit, Nia kura hotu kedas.
Buat nebee Jesus halo, ema konta iha nebee-nebee too iha provinsia Síria tomak. Ema barak mai lori sira nia maluk nebee moras oi-oin, balu diabu tama iha laran, balu moras bibi maten, liman-ain mate ho moras sel-seluk tan. I Jesus kura moras sira nee hotu.
Ema barak teb-tebes mak tuir Jesus. Iha ema husi Galileia, husi rai Dekápolis, husi sidade Jerusalém ho provinsia Judeia, balu tan mai husi mota Jordaun nia sorin ba.
Iha loron ida Jesus haree ema barak mai hobur Nia, entaun Nia baa sae iha foho ida. Too iha nebaa, Nia tuur, i Nia eskolante sira mai haleu Nia.
Depois Nia komesa hanorin sira.
Jesus hanorin nunee: “Ema sira nebee hatene aan dehan sira presiza hela Maromak, sira simu bensaun nunee: Sira nee Maromak nia reinu.
Ema sira nebee tanis ho laran susar, sira simu bensaun nunee: Maromak sei hamaran sira nia matan been.
Ema sira nebee haraik aan, sira simu bensaun nunee: Maromak sei foo mundu foun ba sira atu hela.
Ema sira nebee hakarak teb-tebes atu moris loos, sira simu bensaun nunee: Maromak sei foo tuir sira nia hakarak nee.
Ema sira nebee mak hatudu laran luak ba ema seluk, sira simu bensaun nunee: Maromak sei hatudu Nia laran luak ba sira.
Ema sira nebee laran moos, sira simu bensaun nunee: Sira sei haree Maromak.
Ema sira nebee gosta tulun ema seluk atu moris iha dame nia laran, sira simu bensaun nunee: Maromak sei bolu sira nee Nia oan.
Ema nebee hetan terus tanba moris tuir Maromak nia hakarak, sira simu bensaun nunee: Sira nee Maromak nia reinu.
Bainhira ema hatete aat imi i halo terus imi tanba imi tuir Hau, ka sira bobar lia tuun-sae hodi hatete aat imi nia naran tanba Hau, imi hetan bensaun.
Kuandu ema halo imi terus nunee, simu ho haksolok i kontenti deit ba, tanba Maromak sei foo premiu boot ba imi iha lalehan. Keta haluha katak, Maromak nia profeta sira nebee moris iha tempu uluk mos, ema halo terus sira hanesan nee.”
“Imi hanesan masin ba mundu. Maibee se masin nee sai miis ona karik, ita la bele halo meer fila fali, la iha folin tan ona. Ita soe tiha deit i ema sama.
Imi mos hanesan ahi-oan nebee foo naroman ba mundu. Imi nia naroman hanesan sidade nebee mak harii iha foho leten, ema hotu-hotu bele haree.
Nunee mos bainhira ema sunu ahi-oan, nia nunka taka fali ho sanan. Maibee ahi-oan tenki tau iha fatin aas para bele foo naroman ba ema hotu nebee iha uma laran.
Imi nia moris mos tenki nunee, imi tenki sai naroman ba ema seluk atu nunee sira bele haree buat diak nebee imi halo. Nunee sira sei hahii imi nia Aman iha lalehan.”
“La bele hanoin katak, Hau mai iha mundu nee atu halakon Moisés nia lei ho profeta sira nia liafuan. Lae! Hau mai laos atu halakon maibee atu kumpri lo-loos buat hotu-hotu nebee mak sira hakerek tiha ona.
Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, bainhira lalehan ho rai sei iha, buat hotu nebee hakerek iha lei nee, buat kiikoan ida mos sei la lakon, too buat hotu nebee Maromak hatete, sai realidade.
Nunee, see mak kontra lei ruma tanba dehan lei nee kiikoan deit, depois hanorin ema seluk atu lalika halo tuir, Maromak sei konsidera nia ema kiik liu iha Nia reinu. Maibee see mak moris tuir lei nee i hanorin ema seluk mos atu halo tuir, Maromak sei konsidera nia ema boot iha Nia reinu.
Hau dehan ba imi, imi tenki moris loos liu fali mestri relijiaun sira ho ema Farizeu sira. Se lae, imi la bele tama iha Maromak nia reinu.”
Jesus hanorin nafatin Nia eskolante sira dehan, “Imi rona ona katak uluk ita nia bei-ala sira hetan lei ida nebee dehan, ‘La bele oho ema. See mak oho ema, nia sei hetan kastigu.’
Maibee Hau hatete ba imi, see mak hirus ema seluk, nia sei hetan kastigu. See mak hirus ema seluk too tolok, nia sei baa hataan iha tribunal. I see mak hirus ema seluk dehan, ‘O beik-teen’, ema nee lao dadauk ona ba iha ahi infernu.
Nunee, se o baa iha altar atu foo o nia oferta ba Maromak, maibee too iha nebaa o hanoin hetan ema ruma hirus o tanba o nia hahalok,
husik lai o nia oferta iha altar oin. Depois baa dame malu ho ema nee lai mak foin fila fali mai hodi foo oferta nee ba Maromak.
Se ema ruma atu lori o ba iha tribunal, diak liu molok too tribunal o dame malu kedas ho nia. Se lae, ema nee bele entrega o ba iha juis, juis bele entrega o ba iha polisia, i polisia hatama o iha kadeia.
Hau dehan lo-loos ba o, o selu kotu tiha multa mak foin bele sai fali husi kadeia.”
“Imi rona ona lei nebee dehan, ‘La bele halo sala seksual ho ema nia feen ka laen.’
Maibee Hau hatete ba imi, se mane ida fihir feto ida hodi hanoin foer ba nia, mane nee halo ona sala seksual ho nia iha nia laran.
Se o nia matan sorin loos halo o monu ba sala karik, sukit sai o nia matan nee i soe tiha. Diak liu o moris ho matan sorin deit, duke o tama ba iha infernu ho matan kompletu.
Se o nia liman loos halo o monu ba sala karik, tesi sai o nia liman nee i soe tiha. Diak liu o moris ho liman ida deit, duke o tama ba iha infernu ho liman kompletu.”
“Iha lei ida nebee dehan, ‘See mak hakarak soe nia feen, tenki halo surat deklarasaun ida foo ba nia.’
Maibee Hau hatete ba imi, mane so bele soe nia feen kuandu nia feen halo ona sala seksual ho ema seluk. Se nia feen la sala ida, maibee mane nee soe nia, nee dehan katak, mane nee mak dudu nia feen atu halo sala seksual. Tanba se nia feen hola fali mane seluk, nee sala ona. I se mane ida kaben fali ho feto nebee nia laen soe tiha nee, mane nee mos halo sala seksual.”
“Nunee mos imi rona ona katak, uluk ita nia bei-ala sira simu lei ida nebee dehan, ‘Buat nebee mak o jura ba Nai Maromak, o tenki halo tuir duni, la bele kontra fali.’
Maibee Hau hatete ba imi, la bele halo juramentu saida deit. La bele jura temi lalehan, tanba lalehan nee Maromak nia kadeira hodi tuur kaer ukun.
La bele jura temi rai, tanba rai nee fatin hodi Maromak tau Nia ain. La bele jura temi Jerusalém, tanba Jerusalém nee Liurai Boot nia sidade.
I la bele jura temi imi nia ulun rasik, tanba imi nia fuuk lahan ida mos, imi la bele halo metan ka halo mutin.
Entaun se imi promete atu halo buat ruma, dehan deit, ‘Sin, hau sei halo.’ Se lae, dehan deit, ‘Lae.’ Se imi aumenta tan para haforsa imi nia promesa, entaun liafuan sira nee mai husi aat nain.”
“Imi rona ona lei nebee dehan, ‘Matan tenki selu ho matan, nehan tenki selu ho nehan.’
Maibee Hau hatete ba imi, la bele halo aat fali ba ema nebee mak halo aat imi. Se ema ruma basa imi nia hasan sorin loos karik, foo tan hasan sorin ba nia.
Se iha ema ruma hakarak hadau imi nia faru, foo mos imi nia faru manas ba nia.
Se iha militar ruma mak obriga imi atu hulan nia sasaan lao too kilometru ida, kontinua lao ho nia too kilometru rua.
Se ema husu imi nia sasaan ruma, foo deit ba. Se ema hakarak empresta buat ruma husi imi, foo empresta ba.”
“Imi rona ema dehan, ‘Hadomi o nia maluk, odi o nia inimigu.’
Maibee Hau hatete ba imi, hadomi imi nia inimigu sira, i harohan atu Maromak tulun ema nebee mak halo terus imi.
Se imi halo nunee, imi hatudu katak imi halo tuir imi nia Aman iha lalehan. Tanba Nia halo loro matan sae hodi foo naroman ba ema diak ho mos ema aat. I Nia foo udan ba ema nebee moris loos ho mos ema nebee moris iha sala laran.
Se imi hadomi deit ema nebee mak hadomi imi, imi atu manaan saida? Tanba kobrador impostu sira gosta han-matak ema maibee sira mos hadomi ema nebee mak hadomi sira.
Se imi kumprimenta deit imi nia maluk, imi nia hahalok nee diak liu ema seluk ka? Lae! Ema nebee la konhese Maromak mos halo ida nee.
Imi tenki laran diak teb-tebes, hanesan mos imi nia Aman iha lalehan laran diak.”
Jesus hanorin nafatin nunee: “Kuidadu, keta foti aan hatudu imi nia hahalok diak iha ema nia oin atu sira bele haree. Se imi halo nunee, imi nia Aman iha lalehan sei la selu imi nia kolen.
Bainhira o foo buat ruma ba ema kiak, la bele konta tuun-sae hanesan fali ema nebee buka oin. Sira sempre konta tuir sira nia diak iha uma kreda laran ho mos iha estrada ibun para ema bele gaba sira. Hau dehan lo-loos ba imi, sira simu hotu ona sira nia kolen.
Maibee bainhira o foo buat ruma ba ema kiak, saida mak o nia liman loos foo, o nia liman karuk lalika hatene.
Ho nunee, o foo sub-subar deit. O nia Aman iha lalehan haree hotu saida mak ema halo sub-subar, i Nia sei selu o nia kolen.”
“Bainhira imi halo orasaun, la bele hanesan ema nebee buka oin. Sira gosta hamriik halo orasaun iha uma kreda laran ho mos iha estrada boot atu ema bele haree. Hau dehan lo-loos ba imi, sira simu hotu ona sira nia kolen.
Maibee bainhira imi halo orasaun, tama iha kuartu laran, taka odamatan i halo orasaun ba imi nia Aman iha lalehan. Imi nia Aman nee, ema ida la haree. Maibee Nia haree hotu saida mak ema halo sub-subar, i Nia sei selu imi nia kolen.
Bainhira imi halo orasaun, la bele koalia fila ba fila mai hanesan fali jentiu sira, tanba sira hanoin dehan harohan ho liafuan naruk mak foin sira nia maromak simu.
La bele halo orasaun hanesan sira, tanba molok imi husu buat ruma ba imi nia Aman iha lalehan, Nia hatene uluk ona buat nebee mak imi presiza.
Nunee, halo orasaun hanesan nee: ‘Ami nia Aman iha lalehan, tulun ema atu foti aas Ita Boot nia naran santu.
Mai ukun ema hotu-hotu ba. Tulun ema iha mundu nee atu halo tuir Ita Boot nia hakarak, hanesan sira iha lalehan mos halo tuir.
Foo ai haan natoon mai ami iha loron ida nee.
Perdua ami nia sala, hanesan ami mos perdua ona ba ema nebee halo sala mai ami.
Keta husik ami atu monu ba tentasaun, maibee hasai ami husi buat aat. [Ita Boot mak Liurai, Ita Boot mak Kbiit Nain, Ita Boot mak serve atu ema hotu-hotu hahii, too tinan ba tinan. Amen.]’
Se imi perdua ema nebee mak halo sala hasoru imi, entaun imi nia Aman iha lalehan mos sei perdua imi nia sala.
Maibee se imi la perdua ema nebee mak halo sala hasoru imi, imi nia Aman mos sei la perdua imi nia sala.”
“Bainhira imi halo jejun, la bele halo imi nia oin tristi hanesan fali ema sira nebee buka oin. Sira hatudu aan nunee para ema bele hatene katak sira jejun hela. Hau dehan lo-loos ba imi, sira simu hotu ona sira nia kolen.
Maibee bainhira imi halo jejun, fase imi nia oin halo moos i sui imi nia fuuk halo kabeer,
para ema nebee haree imi la nota katak imi jejun hela. So imi nia Aman iha lalehan mak hatene. Ema ida la haree Nia, maibee Nia haree hotu saida mak ema halo sub-subar, i Nia sei selu imi nia kolen.”
“La bele rai riku-soin mundu nian ba imi nia aan, tanba iha mundu nee nehek mutin bele estraga, bele fuhuk tiha, i naok-teen bele tama baa foti.
Diak liu rai riku-soin ba imi nia aan iha lalehan. Iha nebaa nehek mutin la estraga, la fuhuk, i naok-teen mos la tama baa foti.
Tanba imi nia riku-soin tau iha nebee, imi nia laran mos iha nebaa.”
“Imi nia matan hanesan ahi-oan nebee foo naroman ba imi nia aan tomak. Se imi nia matan haree moos, imi nia aan mos naroman.
Maibee se imi nia matan aat, imi nia aan mos sai nakukun tiha. I kuandu naroman nebee iha imi nia aan la iha ona, entaun imi nia moris nakukun teb-tebes.”
“La iha ema ida mak bele serbi patraun nain rua. Tanba nia sei odi ida, i hadomi ida seluk. Nia sei foo laran ba ida, i lakohi interese ida seluk. Nunee mos imi la bele serbi Maromak i serbi osan dala ida.
Tanba nee, Hau hatete ba imi, lalika preokupa ho imi nia moris loro-loron, atu haan saida, ka atu hemu saida ka atu hatais saida. Ita nia moris folin liu hahaan, i ita nia isin lolon folin liu ropa.
Haree took manu fuik sira nebee semo iha leten nebaa. Manu sira nee la kuda batar, la silu batar, la rai hahaan iha armazen. Maibee imi nia Aman iha lalehan foo ai haan ba sira. Imi folin liu manu sira nee.
Se imi preokupa kona ba imi nia moris, nee bele aumenta imi nia tinan ka? Lae! Atu aumenta oras ida deit mos la bele.
Entaun nusaa mak imi preokupa kona ba imi nia ropa? Haree took ai funan nebee moris iha rai fuik nebaa. Ai funan nee la halo servisu, la soru tais.
Maibee Hau dehan ba imi, liurai Salomão, maski riku teb-tebes, nia hatais kapaas halo nusaa mos, ai funan sira nee kapaas liu nafatin.
Duut nebee ohin loron matak iha rai fuik, aban ema soe fali ba ahi laran mos, Maromak halo furak. Saa tan imi! Nia sei foo ropa ba imi hatais. Entaun nusaa mak imi nia fiar fraku hanesan nee?!
Nee duni lalika preokupa dehan, ‘Ita atu haan saida?’ ka ‘Ita atu hemu saida?’ ka ‘Ita atu hatais saida?’
Ema nebee la konhese Maromak, sira buka tuun-sae buat sira nee. Maibee imi nia Aman iha lalehan hatene hotu imi nia presiza nee.
Hakaas aan liu-liu atu serbi Maromak nudar imi nia Liurai hodi moris loos iha Nia oin mak Maromak sei foo tan buat sira nee ba imi.
Entaun lalika preokupa kona ba loron aban, tanba loron aban nee preokupasaun ketak fali. Susar nebee ita hetan iha loron ida nee, too ona ba loron nee.”
Jesus hanorin nafatin Nia eskolante sira dehan, “La bele ansi foo sala ba ema, atu nunee Maromak la foo sala ba o.
Imi tetu ema seluk nia sala oinsaa, Maromak mos sei tetu imi nunee. I sasukat nebee mak imi uza ba ema seluk, Maromak sei uza fali sasukat nee ba imi.
Nusaa mak o haree ai uut iha ema seluk nia matan, maibee ai kabelak nebee taka o nia matan rasik, o la senti?
Oinsaa mak o brani dehan ba o nia maluk, ‘Mai hau hasai tiha ai uut nee husi o nia matan.’ Afinal iha ai kabelak ida taka hela o nia matan rasik.
Imi nee koalia oin seluk, hahalok oin seluk! Hasai tiha uluk ai kabelak iha o nia matan rasik mak foin o haree hetan para bele hasai ai uut husi o nia maluk nia matan.
Buat nebee Maromak nian, la bele foo ba ema nebee lakohi rona. Nee hanesan imi foo fali ba asu, ka foo buat murak mean ba fahi. Se imi halo nunee, fahi sei sama tiha ba rai, i asu sei fila hodi ataka imi.”
“Husu beibeik ba Maromak, Nia sei foo. Buka beibeik, o sei hetan. Dere beibeik odamatan, odamatan sei nakloke ba o.
Tanba, see mak husu beibeik ba Maromak, nia sei simu. See mak buka beibeik, nia sei hetan. See mak dere beibeik odamatan, Maromak sei loke ba nia.
Imi aman sira, bainhira imi nia oan husu paun, imi foo fali fatuk ka?
Se nia husu ikan, imi foo fali samea ka? Nunka!
Maski imi ema aat, maibee imi hatene foo buat diak ba imi nia oan sira. Saa tan imi nia Aman iha lalehan! Bainhira imi husu, Nia sei foo buat diak teb-tebes ba imi.”
“Saida mak o hakarak atu ema seluk halo ba o, o mos tenki halo buat nee ba ema seluk. Ida nee mak Moisés nia lei ho profeta sira nia livru hanorin hori uluk kedas.”
“Atu tama ba moris rohan-laek, tenki liu husi odamatan kloot. Tanba odamatan ba infernu luan, nia dalan mos fasil atu ema liu, i ema barak mak tama liu husi odamatan nee.
Maibee odamatan atu tama ba moris rohan-laek kloot, nia dalan mos susar, i ema uitoan deit mak buka odamatan nee too hetan.”
“Kuidadu ho ema nebee bosok dehan, sira Maromak nia profeta. Sira finji maus hanesan bibi malae, afinal sira gosta estraga ema hanesan asu fuik.
Imi sei hatene sira husi sira nia hahalok, hanesan ita hatene ai huun ida husi nia fuan. Ai tarak nunka foo fuan fali uvas ka ai fuan figeira.
Ai huun nebee diak sei foo fuan nebee diak. I ai huun nebee la diak sei foo fuan nebee aat.
Ai huun diak la bele foo fuan nebee mak aat. I ai huun nebee aat la bele foo fuan diak.
Ai nebee mak la foo fuan diak, sei tesi tiha hodi soe ba ahi.
Nunee mos ho profeta falsu sira, imi bele konhese sira husi sira nia hahalok.”
“Ema barak bolu Hau dehan, ‘Nai, Nai!’ Maibee laos sira hotu-hotu mak sei tama ba Maromak nia reinu. So sira nebee moris tuir Hau nia Aman iha lalehan nia hakarak mak bele tama.
Iha loron ikus bainhira Maromak tesi ema hotu-hotu nia lia, ema barak sei mai dehan, ‘Nai, Nai, ami uluk foo tutan Maromak nia lia menon hodi Nai nia naran. Ami mos temi Ita Boot nia naran hodi duni sai diabu husi ema, i halo milagre oi-oin.’
Maibee Hau sei koalia mo-moos ba sira dehan, ‘Hau nunka konhese imi. Imi ema aat, sai husi nee!’ ”
“Ema nebee rona Hau nia liafuan nee i halo tuir, nia hanesan ema matenek ida nebee harii nia uma iha fatuk leten.
Depois udan boot mai, mota tuun, anin boot mos baku makaas uma nee. Maibee uma nee la monu, tanba harii metin iha fatuk leten.
Ema nebee rona Hau nia liafuan maibee la halo tuir, nia hanesan ema beik ida nebee harii nia uma iha rai henek leten.
Depois udan boot mai, mota tuun, anin boot mos baku makaas uma nee. I uma nee naksobu tiha too rai.”
Bainhira Jesus hanorin tiha hotu, ema barak nebee rona nee admira,
tanba Nia hanorin ho kbiit, la hanesan ho mestri relijiaun sira nia hanorin.
Jesus lao tuun mai husi foho, ema lubun boot nee mos lao tuir Nia.
Derepenti ema ida moras lepra mai hakneak iha Jesus nia oin hodi husu tulun dehan, “Nai, Ita Boot iha kbiit atu kura hau nia moras hodi halo hau nia isin sai moos fali, naran katak Ita Boot hakarak.”
Jesus lolo liman ba tau iha nia isin hodi dehan, “Hau hakarak. O diak ona ba!” I ema nee nia isin moos kedas.
Depois Jesus dehan ba nia, “La bele konta sai buat nee ba ema seluk. Maibee baa aprezenta aan iha nai lulik, atu nia haree katak o nia isin moos ona. Depois foo oferta tuir lei Moisés nian, para ema hotu bele hatene katak o diak ona.”
Depois Jesus tama ba iha sidade Kafarnaum. Iha nebaa komandante Roma ida mai hasoru Jesus hodi husu tulun
dehan, “Nai, Hau nia atan mane ida moras todan iha uma. Nia la bele book aan hodi hadeer husi toba fatin, nia terus atu mate.”
Jesus hataan, “Hau sei baa kura nia.”
Maibee komandante nee hataan fali dehan, “Nai, hau la serve atu simu Ita Boot iha hau nia uma. Nai foo deit orden ba moras nee mak moras nee sai husi hau nia atan.
Hau hatene nunee tanba hau nia komandante sira mos iha kbiit atu foo orden mai hau. Nunee mos, hau iha kbiit atu foo orden ba hau nia soldadu sira. Se hau manda hau nia soldadu ida dehan, ‘Baa nebaa!’, nia mos baa. Se hau hatete, ‘Mai iha nee!’, nia mai. Se hau haruka hau nia atan dehan, ‘Halo ida nee!’, nia halo duni.”
Rona nunee, Jesus admira, i Nia hatete ba ema sira nebee tuir Nia, “Hau dehan lo-loos ba imi, Hau seidauk haree ema Israel ida nebee fiar makaas hanesan ema Roma nee.
Rona mai. Ema barak sei mai husi fat-fatin, husi lorosae-loromonu, sira sei mai tuur haan hamutuk ho Ita nia bei-ala Abraão, Isac ho Jacó iha Maromak nia festa boot iha lalehan.
Hori uluk Maromak hili ema Israel atu sai Nia reinu hodi tama iha nebaa. Maibee barak mak Nia sei soe sai ba iha fatin nakukun. Iha nebaa sira sei tanis hakilar i ruun nehan.”
Depois Jesus dehan ba komandante nee, “Bele baa ona. Buat nebee ita fiar nee sei akontese duni.” Iha oras nee kedas komandante nia atan hetan fali isin diak.
Loron ida, Jesus baa iha Pedro nia uma. Nia tama baa haree Pedro nia banin feto toba hela, tanba nia isin manas.
Jesus kaer nia liman, derepenti nia isin manas lakon tiha, i nia hadeer kedas baa prepara hahaan foo ba Jesus.
Bainhira kalan ona, ema barak mai lori sira nia maluk nebee mak diabu tama iha laran. Depois Jesus foo orden deit, diabu sira nee sai kedas. Nia mos kura ema moras hotu-hotu.
Nunee Nia halo tuir saida mak Maromak nia profeta Isaias hakerek nanis ona dehan, “Nia rasik hasai ita nia moras. Ita nia moras aat, Nia mak lori.”
Iha loron ida, Jesus haree ema barak mai haleu Nia. Entaun Nia haruka Nia eskolante sira prepara roo para baa iha tasi sorin.
Jesus seidauk sae roo, mestri relijiaun ida mai dehan ba Nia, “Mestri, Ita Boot baa nebee deit, hau prontu atu tuir.”
Jesus hataan, “Asu fuik iha nia fatin hodi hela. Manu fuik mos iha nia knuuk. Maibee Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan la iha fatin ida hodi tau Hau nia ulun ba.”
Iha tan ema ida nebee baibain tuir Jesus dehan ba Nia, “Nai, husik hau fila baa hakoi hau nia aman lai mak foin hau tuir Ita Boot.”
Maibee Jesus hataan, “Mai tuir Hau! Ema nebee lakohi rona Maromak, sira hanesan ema nebee mate tiha ona. Husik sira mak hakoi malu.”
Hotu tiha Jesus sae roo, i Nia eskolante sira mos tuir Nia.
Iha tasi klaran derepenti anin boot mai, too laloran boot halo tasi been tama iha roo laran. Maibee Jesus dukur hela.
Nia eskolante sira fanu Nia dehan, “Nai, salva lai ami, ita atu mout ona!”
Jesus hataan, “Imi nee fiar fraku. Nusaa mak imi tauk hanesan nee?” Depois Nia hadeer hodi siak anin ho laloran boot nee. Anin para kedas, tasi mos hakmatek liu.
Nia eskolante sira admira dehan, “Ema nee see loos mak too anin ho laloran mos rona Nia?”
Depois Jesus too iha tasi sorin, iha ema Gadara sira nia rain. Iha nebaa iha mane nain rua diabu tama iha sira nia laran. Sira nee siak loos, too la iha ema ida mak brani atu lao liu husi nebaa. Sira sai mai husi fatuk kuak nebee ema halo ba rate, i hasoru Jesus.
Sira hakilar dehan, “Maromak nia Oan, O hakarak halo saida mai ami? Tempu seidauk too mos, O atu kastigu ami ka?”
Iha momentu nebaa iha fahi barak teb-tebes haan hela iha foho lolon, laduun dook husi fatin nee.
Diabu sira husu fila-fila ba Jesus, “Se O atu duni sai ami karik, entaun haruka ami tama ba iha fahi sira nebaa.”
Jesus haruka sira dehan, “Baa ona!” Entaun diabu sira sai tiha husi ema nain rua nee hodi tama fali iha fahi. Derepenti fahi sira nee halai saruntu malu tuun husi foho nee, monu hotu ba tasi laran, i mout too mate hotu.
Haree nunee, fahi atan sira halai ba vila laran hodi konta sai kona ba ema nain rua nebee uluk diabu domina nee, ho mos istoria nee tomak.
Depois ema hotu sai mai husi vila hasoru Jesus, i sira husu fila-fila atu Nia sai ona husi rai nee.
Hotu tiha Jesus sae fali roo fila ba iha tasi sorin hodi baa iha Nia sidade.
Iha nebaa ema balu mai hulan mane ida liman-ain mate, latan hela iha nia toba fatin. Sira lori nia ba Jesus. Bainhira Jesus haree sira nia fiar, Nia dehan ba ema isin mate nee, “Oan, laran metin ba! O nia sala hamoos tiha ona.”
Mestri relijiaun sira rona liafuan nee, sira murmura dehan, “Ema nee foti Aan hanesan fali Maromak!”
Maibee Jesus hatene hela sira nia hanoin, entaun Nia dehan, “Nusaa mak imi hanoin aat nunee?
Se Hau dehan ba ema nee katak, nia sala hamoos tiha ona, imi seidauk hatene, sai duni nunee ka lae. Maibee se Hau haruka nia hamriik ona hodi lao, imi bele haree ho matan.
Agora Hau sei hatudu mo-moos ba imi katak, iha mundu nee Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan iha kbiit hodi hamoos ema nia sala.” Depois Jesus hatete ba ema liman-ain mate nee, “Hamriik ona! Foti o nia toba fatin hodi fila ba uma.”
Ema nee mos hamriik kedas hodi lao ba uma.
Ema barak haree buat nebee Jesus halo nee. Sira hakfodak ho tauk, i sira hahii Maromak tanba Nia foo tiha ona kbiit hanesan nee ba ema.
Depois Jesus husik tiha fatin nee. Nia lao dadauk, Nia hetan ema kobrador impostu ida naran Mateus, tuur hela iha nia servisu fatin. Jesus dehan ba nia, “Mai tuir Hau!” Mateus mos hamriik hodi tuir Jesus.
Depois Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira baa haan iha Mateus nia uma, i kobrador impostu barak ho ema aat sira seluk mai haan hamutuk ho sira.
Ema husi grupu Farizeu sira haree, i sira husu ba Jesus nia eskolante sira, “Nusaa mak imi nia mestri haan hamutuk fali ho kobrador impostu ho ema aat sira nee?”
Maibee bainhira Jesus rona sira nia liafuan nee, Nia dehan, “So ema moras mak presiza doutor, ema isin diak lae.
Baa aprende di-diak Maromak nia liafuan nebee dehan, ‘Hau hakarak atu imi hatudu laran luak ba malu. Se lae, imi lori sakrifisiu foo mai Hau mos la iha folin.’ Hau mai atu bolu ema aat sira, laos atu bolu ema nebee konsidera nia aan moris loos ona.”
Depois João Sarani Nain nia eskolante sira mai husu Jesus nunee: “Ami nebee tuir João Sarani Nain baibain halo jejun. Ema Farizeu sira nia eskolante sira mos hanesan. Maibee tansaa mak Ita Boot nia eskolante sira la jejun?”
Jesus hataan ho komparasaun dehan, “Hau hanesan noivu ida nebee selebra nia festa kazamentu. Bainhira noivu sei hamutuk ho nia bainaka sira, sira la bele tristi. Maibee too iha loron ida, ema sei lori lakon tiha noivu nee. Iha loron nee mak nia bainaka sira sei jejun.
La iha ema ida uza hena foun hodi taka fali ba hena bosan nebee kuak. Se lae, hena foun dada hamutuk sai kiik tiha too estraga fali hena bosan nee halo naklees liu tan.
Nunee mos ema halo tua, la tau iha tua fatin nebee halo husi animal nia kulit nebee tuan ona. Tanba tua foun sempre nafurin sae hodi halo kulit tuan nee nakfera tanba toos tiha ona. Nunee tua mos fakar sai. Tua foun, tenki tau iha tua fatin foun. Nunee tua fatin bele dura i tua mos la fakar sai.”
Jesus sei koalia hela ho João Sarani Nain nia eskolante sira, responsavel uma kreda ida mai hakneak iha Jesus nia oin hodi husu tulun dehan, “Hau nia oan feto foin mate. Hau husu atu Ita Boot baa tau liman ba nia hodi halo nia moris fali.”
Entaun Jesus hamriik lao tuir responsavel nee, i Nia eskolante sira mos baa hamutuk ho Nia.
Iha dalan klaran, iha feto ida, nia fulan mai la para durante tinan sanulu resin rua. Feto nee hanoin nunee: “Naran katak hau kona kois deit Nia hena mos, hau nia moras sei diak.” Entaun nia bes-besik ba iha Jesus nia kotuk hodi kona Jesus nia hena rohan.
<range>
Jesus fila ba kotuk i haree feto nee hodi dehan, “Oan, laran metin ba! O hetan kura tanba o fiar mai Hau.” I nia moras diak kedas.
Bainhira Jesus too iha responsavel nia uma, Nia haree ema toka muzika mate nian i ema barak tanis halerik.
Jesus dehan ba sira, “Imi hotu sai. Menina nee la mate ida, nia toba deit.” Maibee sira hamnasa fali Nia.
Bainhira ema sira nee sai hotu, Jesus tama ba laran hodi kaer menina nee nia liman, i menina nee hadeer fali.
Buat nebee Jesus halo nee, ema konta lemo-lemo, too ema iha rejiaun nee tomak hatene.
Depois Jesus sai husi fatin nee. Nia lao dadauk, iha ema matan delek nain rua lao tu-tuir Nia hodi bolu ho lian makaas dehan, “Liurai David nia Jerasaun, hanoin ami ba!”
Jesus tama iha uma laran, ema matan delek nain rua nee mos tama tuir Nia. Jesus husu ba sira dehan, “Imi fiar katak Hau bele kura imi nia matan ka?” Sira hataan, “Ami fiar, Nai.”
Depois Jesus tau liman ba sira nia matan hodi dehan, “Tanba imi nia fiar mak imi hetan kura.”
Sira nain rua nia matan haree moos kedas. Jesus bandu makaas sira dehan, “La bele foo hatene buat nee ba see-see deit.”
Maibee sira sai baa konta lemo-lemo kona ba Jesus iha rejiaun nee tomak.
Bainhira sira nain rua nee sai dadauk, ema lori tan sira nia maluk ida ba Jesus. Ema nee diabu domina ona too nia koalia la diak.
Jesus duni sai tiha diabu, ema nee bele koalia kedas. Ema barak nebee haree buat nee, sira hotu admira dehan, “Buat ida hanesan nee foin mak akontese iha rai Israel.”
Maibee ema Farizeu sira dehan, “Nia duni sai diabu tanba diabu nia xefi mak foo kbiit ba Nia.”
Jesus lao husi sidade ba sidade ho aldeia ba aldeia hodi hanorin iha uma kreda laran. Nia foo sai Liafuan Diak kona ba oinsaa Maromak ukun nudar Liurai. I ema nebee moras oi-oin Nia kura tiha hotu.
Bainhira Jesus haree ema barak nee, Nia hanoin loos sira, tanba sira la hatene atu halo oinsaa, i la iha ema ida atu tulun sira. Sira hanesan bibi malae nebee la iha bibi atan atu hatudu dalan ba sira.
Depois Jesus soe lia ba Nia eskolante sira dehan, “Batar iha toos laran maran tiha ona. Batar nee barak teb-tebes, maibee ema atu silu, uitoan deit.
Tanba nee, harohan ba Toos Nain atu haruka tan ema hodi silu batar nee.”
Iha loron ida Jesus halibur Nia eskolante nain sanulu resin rua. Nia foti sira sai Nia apostolu hodi foo kbiit ba sira atu duni sai diabu husi ema i kura ema nia moras oi-oin.
Sira nain sanulu resin rua nia naran mak hanesan tuir mai nee: Primeiru, Simão (ema mos bolu nia Pedro), ho nia alin André, Tiago ho nia alin João (sira nain rua Zebedeu nia oan),
Filipe ho Bartolomeu, Tomé ho Mateus (nia kobrador impostu), Tiago (nia Alfeu nia oan) ho Tadeu,
Simão (nia ema Patriota), ho Judas Iscariotes (ikus mai nia mak faan Jesus).
Jesus foo knaar ba apostolu nain sanulu resin rua hanesan nee: “Imi baa ona. Imi tenki baa iha ema Israel sira deit, tanba sira hanesan bibi malae nebee lao sala dalan ona. La bele baa tama iha ema jentiu sira nia leet. Ema Samaria nia aldeia sira mos la bele tama.
<range>
Baa foo hatene ema Israel sira dehan, ‘Tempu besik ona atu Maromak ukun imi.’
Baa kura ema moras, halo moris fali ema mate, foo isin diak ba ema nebee moras lepra, i duni sai diabu husi ema nia laran. Imi simu kbiit nee ho gratis, tenki foo mos ho gratis.
La bele lori osan mean ka osan mutin, atu doit ida mos la bele.
Lalika lori pasta, lalika lori hena tahan rua ka sandalias atu troka iha dalan, i lalika lori imi nia ai tonka. Tanba ema nebee servisu, nia iha direitu atu ema foo buat nebee mak nia presiza.
Bainhira imi tama iha sidade ida ka aldeia ida, baa buka uluk ema ida nebee laran diak, i hela iha nia uma too imi sai fali husi fatin nee.
Bainhira imi tama iha uma laran, harohan ba Maromak atu foo bensaun ba uma kain nee.
Se uma nain simu imi ho diak, sira sei hetan duni bensaun nee. Se lae, dada fila fali imi nia liafuan bensaun nee.
Se imi baa too iha uma ida ka aldeia ida mak ema la simu imi ka lakohi rona imi nia liafuan, husik tiha fatin nee. I hisik rai rahun husi imi nia ain okos nudar sinal katak sira rasik mak sei lori todan.
Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, iha loron ikus bainhira Maromak tesi ema hotu-hotu nia lia, ema iha aldeia nee sei simu kastigu todan liu fali ema aat sira nebee uluk hela iha rai Sodoma ho Gomora.”
Jesus hatutan tan dehan, “Rona di-diak, Hau haruka imi baa hanesan bibi malae nebee tama iha asu fuik nia leet. Imi tenki matenek hanesan samea. I imi nia laran tenki moos hanesan manu pombu.
Kuidadu, tanba ema sei mai kaer imi hodi lori imi ba iha tribunal. Sira sei baku imi ho sikoti iha sira nia uma kreda laran.
Sira mos sei foo sala ba imi iha nai ulun ho liurai sira nia oin. Buat sira nee hotu sai nunee tanba imi tuir Hau. Ho nunee imi sei foo sasin kona ba Hau iha sira nia oin ho mos iha ema nebee laos Judeu nia oin.
Bainhira ema lori imi baa hataan iha tribunal, lalika preokupa atu koalia saida ka atu hataan oinsaa. Tanba iha oras nee duni Maromak sei foo hatene ba imi liafuan nebee mak imi atu koalia sai.
Iha tempu nee, laos imi mak koalia, maibee imi nia Aman nia Espiritu mak koalia liu husi imi.
Iha uma laran ida, se iha ema ida mak fiar mai Hau, nia maun-alin rasik mak sei entrega nia ba nai ulun sira para oho. Se oan ida fiar mai Hau, nia aman rasik mak entrega nia ba ema seluk para oho. Se inan-aman mak fiar, sira nia oan rasik mak hamriik hasoru sira hodi foo ba ema oho.
Ema iha nebee-nebee deit sei odi imi tanba imi tuir Hau. Maibee ema nebee mak aguenta nafatin too rohan, Maromak sei salva sira.
Bainhira ema halo terus imi iha sidade ida tanba imi fiar mai Hau, halai ba sidade seluk. Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, imi seidauk haleu sidade hotu iha Israel laran, Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan mai fali ona.
Estudante ida la bele boot liu nia mestri, i atan ida la bele boot liu fali nia patraun.
Se estudante ida sai hanesan nia mestri, nee too ona. I atan ida sai hanesan nia patraun, nee mos too ona. Hau hanesan imi nia xefi familia, maibee ema hatete aat Hau dehan, Hau diabu nia xefi Belzebu. Entaun imi nebee tama iha Hau nia familia mos, ema sei hatete imi aat loos.”
“Nunee lalika tauk ema sira nee. Tanba buat hotu-hotu nebee agora taka hela, loron ida sei nakloke. I buat hotu-hotu nebee agora subar hela, aban-bainrua ema sei hatene.
Buat nebee mak Hau foo hatene ba imi iha kotu-kotuk, imi tenki hatete sai. I saida mak Hau hanorin bis-bisu deit ba imi, imi tenki foo sai ho lian makaas iha ema barak nia oin.
La bele tauk ema nebee mak hakarak oho imi, tanba sira so bele oho deit imi nia isin, imi nia klamar sira la bele oho. Diak liu imi tauk mak Maromak, tanba Nia iha kbiit atu oho imi nia isin hodi soe imi nia klamar iha infernu laran.
Hanoin took manu liin. Manu liin rua, ema faan sentavus ida deit. Maski baratu liu, maibee la iha ida mak monu ba rai, se imi nia Aman iha lalehan la foo lisensa.
Laos nee deit, maibee Maromak mos hatene lo-loos imi nia fuuk lahan hira mak iha imi nia ulun.
Nee duni lalika tauk, tanba imi folin boot liu manu liin barak.”
“See mak foo sai iha ema nia oin katak nia fiar mai Hau, aban-bainrua Hau mos sei foo sai iha Hau nia Aman iha lalehan nia oin katak, nia Hau nia ema.
Maibee see mak foo sai iha ema nia oin katak nia la konhese Hau, aban-bainrua Hau mos sei foo sai iha Hau nia Aman iha lalehan nia oin katak, nia laos Hau nia ema.”
“Keta hanoin dehan Hau mai iha mundu nee atu lori dame. Hau mai laos atu lori dame, maibee atu lori konflitu.
Hau mai para halo ‘oan mane kontra nia aman, oan feto kontra nia inan, feto foun kontra nia banin feto.
Ema nia inimigu mai husi nia uma laran rasik.’
See mak hadomi liu nia inan-aman duke nia hadomi Hau, nia la serve atu sai Hau nia ema. Nunee mos ema nebee mak hadomi nia oan mane ka oan feto liu fali Hau, nia la serve sai Hau nian.
See mak hakarak sai Hau nia ema, nia tenki tuir Hau, i nia tenki prontu atu simu terus, hanesan ema nebee lori nia krus too mate. Se lae, nia la serve sai Hau nia ema.
Ema nebee hanoin liu nia moris iha mundu nee, sei lakon fali nia moris. Maibee see mak lakon nia moris iha mundu nee tanba nia tuir Hau, nia sei hetan moris rohan-laek.”
“See mak simu imi, nia simu ona Hau. See mak simu Hau, nia simu ona Ida nebee mak haruka Hau mai.
See mak simu profeta ida tanba profeta nee foo tutan Maromak nia lia menon, iha loron ikus bainhira Maromak selu profeta sira nia kolen, ema nee mos simu hanesan. I see mak simu ema ida nebee moris loos tanba nia moris nee loos, iha loron ikus bainhira Maromak selu ema moris loos sira nia kolen, ema nee mos simu hanesan.
Hau dehan lo-loos ba imi, see mak foo tulun ba ema kiik ida tanba ema nee tuir Hau, maski nia foo bee kopu ida deit mos, Maromak la haluha nia kolen.”
Bainhira Jesus hanorin tiha buat sira nee hotu ba Nia eskolante nain sanulu resin rua, Nia husik tiha fatin nee. Depois Nia lao husi aldeia ba aldeia iha rejiaun nee hodi hanorin ema i foo sai Maromak nia liafuan.
Iha tempu nebaa João Sarani Nain dadur tiha ona iha kadeia. Nia rona buat nebee Mesias halo. Nunee nia haruka nia eskolante balu baa hasoru Jesus hodi husu,
“Ita Boot mak Ema ida nebee Maromak promete atu haruka mai ka, ami tenki hein fali ema seluk?”
Jesus hataan dehan, “Imi fila baa konta ba João kona ba buat hotu-hotu nebee imi ohin rona ho saida mak imi haree.
Ema matan delek bele haree. Ema ain aat bele lao. Ema moras lepra, isin sai moos. Ema tilun diuk bele rona. Ema mate moris fila fali. I ema kiak rona Liafuan Diak.
Hatete mos ba João dehan, ‘Ema nebee fiar nafatin mai Hau too rohan, nia hetan bensaun.’ ”
Bainhira João nia eskolante sira fila dadauk, Jesus komesa koalia kona ba João. Nia husu ema barak nebee haleu Nia nunee: “Uluk imi baa iha rai fuik maran atu haree see loos? Imi baa atu haree ema nebee nakdoko ba-mai tuir anin hanesan fali duut manulain ka? Lae!
Entaun imi baa atu haree see? Imi baa atu haree ema nebee hatais hena folin karun ka? Lae! Ema nebee hatais hena folin karun hela iha uma liurai nian.
Entaun imi baa atu haree see? Imi hanoin atu haree Maromak nia profeta ka? Loos duni! Maibee Hau hatete ba imi, João nee boot liu fali profeta.
Nia nee uluk kedas Livru Sagradu temi tiha ona dehan, ‘Rona mai! Hau haruka Hau nia ema ida baa uluk hodi prepara dalan ba O.’
Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, hori uluk kedas, la iha ema ida iha mundu nee mak hetan bensaun boot liu João Sarani Nain. Maski nunee komesa agora ba oin, see mak hakruuk ba Maromak nudar Liurai, bele ema nee kiik mos, nia sei hetan bensaun boot liu fali João.
Husi tempu João Sarani Nain mai too agora, iha ema uza violensia kontra Maromak nia reinu atu hatuun Maromak nudar Liurai.
Molok João mai, profeta sira ho mos Moisés nia lei foo sai antes tiha ona kona ba saida mak akontese agora dadauk.
Se imi hakarak fiar buat nebee mak loos, entaun imi sei hatene katak João mak profeta Elias nebee durante nee ema hein hela.
Imi nebee iha tilun, rona di-diak ba!”
Jesus dehan tan, “Ema agora dadauk nee, Hau atu kompara ho saida? Sira hanesan labarik nebee tuur iha merkadu hodi hakilar ba sira nia kolega halimar dehan,
‘Ami toka muzika kapaas loos, maibee imi la dansa. Ami tanis lelir, maibee imi la tanis.’
Nunee mos João mai, nia sempre jejun i la hemu tua, depois ema dehan, diabu tama iha nia laran.
Maibee Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan mai, Hau haan ho hemu tua hanesan ema baibain, depois ema dehan, Hau kaan-teen ho lanu-teen, i halo belun ho kobrador impostu sira ho ema aat sira. Maibee ema hotu-hotu nebee moris tuir Maromak nia matenek, sira hatudu katak Maromak nia matenek nee loos duni.”
Depois Jesus komesa kritika ema iha aldeia balu, tanba iha aldeia hirak nee mak Nia halo milagre barak liu, maibee ema sira nee lakohi hakribi sira nia sala.
Jesus dehan, “Imi ema Korazim sei terus. Imi ema Betsaida sei terus. Hau halo ona milagre bar-barak iha imi nia leet, maibee imi lakohi hakribi imi nia sala. Ema jentiu sira nebee uluk liu hela iha sidade Tiru ho Sidon nunka haree milagre sira nee. Se sira haree karik, entaun sira tuur hakdasak iha ahu kdesan i hatais hena lutu hodi hatudu katak sira hakribi ona sira nia sala.
Maibee Hau hatete ba imi, iha loron ikus bainhira Maromak tesi ema hotu-hotu nia lia, imi sei simu kastigu todan liu fali ema Tiru ho ema Sidon.
Nunee mos imi ema Kafarnaum sira, keta hanoin katak, Maromak sei foti sae imi ba lalehan. Lae! Nia sei soe imi ba infernu. Se karik uluk ema jentiu sira iha sidade Sodoma haree milagre nebee Hau halo iha imi nia rai nee, entaun sira husik sira nia sala, i Maromak la sunu mutuk sidade nee.
Hau dehan ba imi, iha loron ikus bainhira Maromak tesi ema nia lia, Maromak sei foo kastigu ba imi todan liu fali ema Sodoma sira nian.”
Iha tempu nee, Jesus hahii Maromak dehan, “Hau nia Aman, lalehan ho rai nia Nain. Hau hahii Ita Boot, tanba Ita Boot taka buat sira nee ba ema matenek ho ema eskola boot, maibee Ita hatudu fali ba ema nebee kiik.
Hau nia Aman, ida nee halo Ita Boot nia laran haksolok duni.”
Hotu tiha, Jesus koalia ba ema iha nebaa nunee: “Hau nia Aman foo ona kbiit ho matenek hotu-hotu mai Hau. La iha ema ida konhese lo-loos Hau, so Hau nia Aman deit. I la iha ema ida mak konhese lo-loos Hau nia Aman, so Nia Oan, Hau deit. Hau mos hili ema seluk hodi hatudu Hau nia Aman ba sira, para sira mos bele konhese Nia.
Imi nebee kole, imi nebee loro-loron lori naha todan, mai iha Hau, i Hau sei halo kamaan imi nia todan.
Mai aprende husi Hau i moris tuir Hau nia hanorin, tanba Hau nee laran maus ho haraik Aan. Nunee imi nia laran bele senti kamaan.
Tanba buat nebee Hau hanorin la susar, i naha nebee Hau foo ba imi atu lori mos la todan.”
Iha loron Sabadu ida, Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira lao liu husi ema nia toos. Nia eskolante sira hamlaha, entaun sira komesa korut trigu musan hodi haan.
Iha ema husi grupu Farizeu haree, i sira hasee Jesus dehan, “Haree took. Ita Boot nia eskolante sira servisu fali iha loron Sabadu. Ida nee kontra ita nia lei!”
Jesus hataan, “Imi lee tiha ona liurai David nia istoria. Nusaa mak imi la kompriende nafatin? Iha loron ida David ho nia ema sira hamlaha loos.
Nia tama ba tenda orasaun. Iha nebaa iha paun nebee nai lulik sira oferese ona ba Maromak. Tuir lo-loos, so nai lulik sira deit mak bele haan paun nee, David ho nia ema sira nee la bele. Maibee David foti tiha paun nee, i nia ho nia ema sira haan.
Imi mos lee tiha ona Moisés nia lei. Tuir lei nee dehan, se nai lulik ida nia loron atu servisu iha uma kreda boot monu iha Sabadu, entaun nia tenki servisu duni. Maski kontra lei Sabadu nian, maibee Maromak la foo sala ba nia.
Hau dehan ba imi, agora iha imi nia leet iha Ema ida boot liu uma kreda nee.
Iha Livru Sagradu hakerek dehan, ‘Hau hakarak atu imi hatudu laran luak ba malu. Se lae, imi lori sakrifisiu foo mai Hau mos la iha folin.’ Maibee liafuan nee, karik imi la simu. Nee mak imi hatudu liman ba ema nebee mak la sala.
Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan mak loron Sabadu nia Nain. Hau mak iha direitu atu desidi, ema bele halo saida iha loron nee.”
Depois Jesus lao husi toos nee, baa tama fali iha uma kreda.
Iha nebaa iha mane ida nia liman sorin mate. Ema Farizeu sira buka dalan atu foo sala ba Jesus. Entaun sira husu ba Jesus dehan, “Tuir lei Moisés nian, bele kura ema moras iha loron Sabadu ka lae?”
Jesus hataan, “Se karik loron Sabadu mak imi nia bibi ida monu tama ba rai kuak laran, imi baa hasai ka lae?
Entaun halo buat diak ba ema iha loron Sabadu mos la kontra lei. Tanba kompara ho bibi, ema mak folin boot liu.”
Depois Jesus dehan ba ema liman sorin mate nee, “Lolo o nia liman mate nee mai!” Ema nee lolo ba, nia liman diak kedas hanesan fali nia liman sorin.
Maibee ema Farizeu sira sai tiha ba liur hodi kombina malu para oho Jesus.
Jesus hatene hela ema Farizeu sira nia planu, nunee Nia husik tiha fatin nee. Ema barak tuir Nia, i Nia kura sira nia moras hotu.
Maibee Nia bandu sira atu la bele hatete sai kona ba Nia.
Nunee Nia halo tuir buat nebee mak Maromak foo sai tiha ona liu husi profeta Isaias. Maromak dehan,
“Haree ba! Nee Hau nia Atan, Hau mak hili Nia. Hau hadomi Nia, i Nia halo haksolok Hau nia laran. Hau sei tau Hau nia Espiritu iha Nia, i Nia sei foo sai lia loos ba ema husi suku hotu-hotu.
Nia la diskuti malu ho ema, i la hakilar. Nia la koalia ho lian makaas tuir dalan.
Ai sanak lotuk nebee mak besik atu tohar, Nia la silu tohar. Ahi-oan nebee mak besik atu mate, Nia la huu mate. Nia sei hatudu Nia laran luak beibeik too lia loos mak manaan.
Ema iha suku hotu-hotu sei laran metin ba Nia.”
Depois ema balu lori mane ida ba Jesus. Ema nee diabu domina too nia matan delek i la hatene koalia. Jesus kura nia, nunee nia bele koalia ho haree fila fali.
Ema hotu admira hodi dehan, “Keta halo be Ema nee mak David nia Jerasaun nebee Maromak promete atu haruka mai?”
Maibee bainhira ema husi grupu Farizeu rona nunee, sira dehan, “Ema nee duni sai diabu tanba deit Nia simu kbiit husi diabu nia xefi Belzebu.”
Maibee Jesus hatene sira hotu nia hanoin. Nunee Nia hatete ba sira, “Se iha nasaun ida, nia povu haan malu hela deit, nasaun nee sei rahun. Se iha sidade ida ka uma kain ida, nia ema sira istori malu hela deit, sira sei naksobu.
Se Satanás mak duni sai Satanás, entaun diabu sira haan malu hela deit, i Satanás nia ukun sei la dura.
Imi duun Hau dehan, hodi Belzebu nia kbiit mak Hau duni sai diabu. Entaun bainhira imi nia eskolante sira duni sai diabu, sira mos uza Belzebu nia kbiit ka? Lae! Imi nia eskolante sira rasik mak sei hatete sai katak, buat nebee imi duun Hau nee, la loos.
Hau duni sai diabu hodi Maromak nia Espiritu. Nee hatudu katak Maromak ukun ona iha imi nia leet nudar Liurai.
Hau foo ezemplu tan. Se ema ida hakarak tama baa foti sasaan husi ema forti ida nia uma, nia tenki futu metin tiha ema forti nee uluk mak foin bele lalin sasaan sai husi nia uma.
Ema nebee la hamutuk ho Hau, nia kontra Hau. I ema nebee la servisu hamutuk ho Hau, nia estraga Hau nia servisu.
Nunee Hau dehan ba imi, ema nebee halo sala, too hatete aat Maromak mos, Maromak sei foo perdaun. Maibee see mak hatete aat Maromak nia Espiritu, Maromak la foo perdaun ba nia.
Nunee mos ema nebee mak koalia aat Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan, nia sei hetan perdaun. Maibee see mak koalia aat Espiritu Santu, Maromak la foo perdaun ba nia too tinan ba tinan.”
Jesus koalia nafatin ba ema Farizeu sira dehan, “Ai huun nebee diak sei foo fuan diak. Maibee ai huun nebee la diak sei foo fuan la diak. Tanba ai nee nia fuan mak hatudu sai katak ai huun nee diak ka la diak.
Imi nee samea nia oan! Imi ema laran aat bele koalia buat diak ka? Lae! Tanba buat nebee mak rai iha ema nia laran, ida nee mak sei sai husi nia ibun.
Ema nebee diak koalia liafuan diak, tanba nia laran nakonu ho buat diak. I ema nebee aat koalia buat aat, tanba nia laran nakonu ho buat aat.
Hanoin di-diak! Iha loron ikus bainhira Maromak tesi ema hotu-hotu nia lia, Nia sei tetu ema nia liafuan ida-ida. Imi nia liafuan nebee mak imi koalia arbiru, imi tenki hataan iha Maromak nia oin.
Atu Maromak desidi foo kastigu ka, desidi dehan imi la sala, depende ba imi nia liafuan.”
Depois ema Farizeu ho mestri relijiaun balu husu ba Jesus dehan, “Mestri, ami hakarak haree milagre husi Ita Boot hodi hatudu katak Ita Boot nia kbiit mai husi Maromak.”
Jesus hataan, “Imi ema agora nee mesak aat deit i la foo laran ba Maromak! Imi husu Hau halo milagre hanesan sinal atu imi bele fiar. Maibee Hau sei la halo. Milagre nebee Maromak uluk halo liu husi profeta Jonas too ona.
Jonas hela iha ikan boot nia kabun laran loron tolu kalan tolu. Nunee mos Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan sei hela iha rai okos loron tolu kalan tolu.
Iha loron ikus bainhira Maromak tesi ema hotu-hotu nia lia, ema jentiu sira husi sidade Nínive sei hamriik hodi foo sala ba imi. Tanba uluk bainhira Jonas baa foo sai Maromak nia liafuan ba sira, sira husik kedas sira nia sala. Agora iha Ema ida nebee boot liu fali Jonas iha imi nia leet, maibee imi lakohi husik imi nia sala.
Laos povu Nínive deit mak sei foo sala ba imi. Liurai feto husi rai Seba mos sei moris fali, i hamriik hodi foo sala ba imi nebee moris agora, tanba uluk nia mai husi rai dook atu rona rasik liafuan matenek nian husi liurai Salomão. Agora iha Ema ida boot liu fali Salomão iha imi nia leet, maibee imi lakohi rona Nia.”
“Bainhira espiritu aat sai husi ema ida, espiritu aat nee baa lao lemo-lemo iha rai fuik maran hodi buka fatin atu hela. Maibee nia la hetan fatin nebee diak.
Entaun nia dehan, ‘Diak liu hau fila fali ba hau nia hela fatin uluk.’ Kuandu nia fila, nia haree fatin nee mamuk, hamoos tiha ona i buat hotu-hotu tau tuir nia fatin.
Depois espiritu aat nee baa bolu tan espiritu hitu nebee aat liu fali nia, i sira hotu baa hela iha ema nee. Nunee ema nee nia moris aat liu fali uluk. Ema aat nebee moris agora mos sei sai hanesan nee.”
Jesus sei koalia hela ba ema lubun boot, Nia inan ho Nia alin mane sira mai hamriik iha liur atu koalia ho Nia.
Iha ema ida foo hatene ba Jesus dehan, “Ita Boot nia inan ho alin sira hamriik iha liur. Sira husu atu koalia ho Ita Boot.”
Maibee Jesus hataan ba ema nee dehan, “Hau nia inan mak see? I Hau nia alin sira mak see?”
Depois Nia hatudu ba Nia eskolante sira hodi dehan, “Sira nee mak Hau nia inan ho Hau nia alin sira.
Tanba see mak halo tuir Hau nia Aman iha lalehan nia hakarak, sira nee mak Hau nia inan, Hau nia feton ho Hau nia alin sira.”
Iha loron nebaa, Jesus sai husi uma nee i baa tuur iha tasi ibun.
Ema barak teb-tebes mak mai haleu Nia, nunee Nia baa tuur iha roo laran, i ema sira nee hamriik deit iha tasi ibun.
Nia hanorin buat barak uza komparasaun. Nia dehan nunee: “Iha toos nain ida baa kari fini iha nia toos.
Bainhira nia kari fini nee, balu monu iha dalan. I manu fuik mai haan tiha hotu.
Fini balu monu iha fatuk leten, fini nee moris lalais deit tanba rai mihis.
