Maibee se Hau husu nunee karik, saida mak hakerek iha Livru Sagradu kona ba Hau nee la sai realidade.”
Depois Jesus hatete ba ema barak nee dehan, “Nusaa mak imi mai lori surik ho ai dona atu kaer Hau? Imi hanoin Hau ema kriminozu ka? Afinal loro-loron Hau iha hela area uma kreda boot hodi hanorin, i imi la kaer Hau.
Maibee buat sira nee hotu akontese hodi kumpri saida mak profeta sira foo sai tiha ona iha Livru Sagradu.” Depois Jesus nia eskolante sira husik hela Nia hodi halai namkari hotu.
Depois ema nebee kaer Jesus lori Nia ba iha nai lulik boot Kaifás nia uma. Iha nebaa mestri relijiaun sira ho katuas lia nain sira halibur hamutuk ona atu foo justisa ba Jesus.
Pedro lao tu-tuir Jesus husi dook deit, i tama liu ba moru laran. Nia tuur hamutuk ho ema seguransa sira iha uma oin, atu hatene tuir saida mak akontese ba Jesus.
Iha uma laran, nai lulik nia ulun sira ho justisa nain relijiaun Judeu sira seluk buka hela ema atu foo sasin falsu para bele kastigu mate Jesus.
Maski ema barak mai hamriik iha oin hodi duun Nia, maibee justisa nain sira la hetan sala ida atu bele kastigu Nia. Too ikus ema nain rua tan baa hamriik iha oin
hodi foo sasin dehan, “Ema nee hatete hanesan nee: ‘Hau bele halo rahun Maromak nia uma kreda boot nee, depois iha loron tolu nia laran Hau bele harii fila fali.’ ”
Depois nai lulik boot hamriik hodi dehan ba Jesus, “Ema sira nee foo sasin tiha ona kona ba O nia sala. Nusaa mak O la hataan sira?”
Maibee Jesus nonook deit. Nunee nai lulik boot dehan, “Jura took hodi Maromak Moris nia naran, O mak Mesias, Maromak nia Oan, ka?”
Jesus hataan, “Ita dehan nee loos. Maibee Hau hatete ba imi, aban-bainrua imi sei haree Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan tuur iha Maromak Kbiit Nain nia sorin loos. I imi sei haree Hau tuun mai husi lalehan iha kalohan laran.”
Rona nunee, nai lulik boot nee hirus too lees tiha nia batina hodi dehan ba justisa nain sira, “Agora imi rona rasik ona Nia liafuan. Nia hatete aat Maromak! Nusaa mak ita hein tan sasin seluk?
Imi foo justisa oinsaa?” Justisa nain sira hataan, “Nia merese mate.”
Depois sira tafui kabeen ba Jesus nia oin i baku Nia. Balu basa Nia hasan
hodi husu, “He, Mesias, Profeta, foo sai took, see mak baku O nee?”
Pedro sei tuur hela iha uma oin, iha kriada ida mai besik nia dehan, “O mos hamutuk ho Jesus, Ema Galileia nee.”
Maibee Pedro nega iha ema hotu nia oin dehan, “Hau la hatene buat nebee o koalia nee.”
Depois Pedro sai ba iha portaun, kriada ida tan haree nia i hatete ba ema nebee mak besik dehan, “Ema nee ohin hamutuk ho Jesus, Ema Nazaré.”
Pedro nega tan dala ida hodi dehan, “Hau jura, hau la konhese Ema nee.”
La kleur ema sira nebee hamriik iha nebaa mai besik Pedro hodi dehan, “O nee Nia ema duni. Tanba o koalia hanesan ema Galileia.”
Maibee Pedro jura dehan, “Hau la konhese Ema nee. Se hau bosok karik, husik Maromak kastigu hau ba.” Derepenti manu kokoreek.
Rona nunee, Pedro hanoin fila fali liafuan nebee uluk Jesus dehan, “Molok manu kokoreek, o sei nega Hau dala tolu.” Entaun Pedro sai husi nebaa i tanis ho laran dodok.
Dadeer-saan deit, nai lulik nia ulun sira ho katuas lia nain sira foti desizaun atu kastigu mate Jesus.
Depois sira futu Nia hodi lori Nia baa entrega ba governador Pilatus.
Bainhira Judas, eskolante nebee mak faan Jesus nee, hatene katak sira atu kastigu mate Jesus, nia laran tristi teb-tebes. Nunee nia entrega fali osan mutin tolu-nulu nee ba nai lulik nia ulun sira ho katuas lia nain sira.
Nia hatete, “Hau halo sala ona! Ema ida nebee la iha sala sei mate tanba hau mak faan.” Maibee sira hataan, “Ami la interese. O halo sala ka lae, nee o mak hatene.”
Entaun Judas soe osan nee ba iha uma kreda boot laran. Depois nia sai baa tara aan mate tiha.
Nai lulik nia ulun sira hili tiha osan nebee mak Judas soe nee hodi dehan, “Osan nee raan nia folin. Lei bandu atu hatama fali hamutuk ho osan uma kreda boot nian.”
Entaun sira desidi uza osan nee hodi sosa rai pedasuk nebee uluk badaen sanan rai nian. I sira foo rai nee atu sai fatin hodi hakoi ema estranjeiru.
Too agora ema bolu rai nee Rai Raan.
Nunee sira halo tuir liafuan nebee profeta Jeremias hakerek hori uluk dehan, “Ema Israel sira desidi tiha ona katak, Nia folin mak osan mutin tolu-nulu. Entaun sira foti osan nee
hodi sosa rai nebee uluk badaen sanan rai nian, tuir orden nebee mak Nai Maromak foo mai hau.”
Bainhira Jesus hamriik iha governador Pilatus nia oin, governador husu ba Nia, “Loos ka, O mak ema Judeu sira nia Liurai ka?” Jesus hataan, “Ita dehan nee loos.”
Maibee bainhira nai lulik nia ulun sira ho katuas lia nain sira duun Jesus iha Pilatus nia oin, Jesus la hataan buat ida.
Entaun Pilatus hatete ba Jesus dehan, “O la rona ka? Ema sira nee foo sasin oi-oin hodi hasoru O!”
Maibee Nia la hataan, uitoan mos lae, halo governador Pilatus admira loos.
Tin-tinan, bainhira ema Judeu halo festa Paskua, governador sempre hasai ema dadur ida tuir povu nia hakarak.
Iha tempu nebaa iha ema dadur ida naran Barabás, ema hotu konhese nia kriminozu boot ida.
Entaun bainhira ema barak halibur hamutuk ona, Pilatus husu ba sira dehan, “Imi hakarak hau husik ida nebee? Barabás ka Jesus nebee ema bolu Mesias?”
Pilatus koalia nunee tanba nia hatene hela nai ulun Judeu sira laran moras ba Jesus, nee mak sira entrega Jesus ba nia.
Bainhira Pilatus tuur iha kadeira juis nian atu tesi Jesus nia lia, nia feen haruka lia menon dehan, “Keta halo buat ruma ba Ema nee tanba Nia la sala ida. Hau ohin mehi aat kona ba Nia, halo hau hanoin barak.”
Maibee nai lulik nia ulun sira ho katuas lia nain sira obriga deit ema barak nee husu ba Pilatus atu husik Barabás, i oho Jesus.
Depois governador Pilatus husu fali dehan, “Husi ema nain rua nee, imi hakarak hau husik ida nebee?” Sira hataan, “Barabás!”
Rona nunee Pilatus husu tan, “Entaun hau atu halo saida ba Jesus nebee ema bolu Mesias nee?” Sira hotu hakilar, “Prega tiha Nia ba krus!”
Depois Pilatus husu, “Tansaa? Nia halo krimi saida?” Maibee sira hakilar makaas liu tan, “Prega tiha Nia ba krus!”
Pilatus haree katak ema barak nee atu halo rungu-ranga, i nia la bele halo buat ida. Entaun nia foti bee hodi fase nia liman iha ema barak nee nia oin dehan, “Kona ba Ema nee nia mate, hau la hatene! Imi mak sei lori todan.”
Sira hotu hataan, “Husik ba, Ema nee nia raan, ami ho ami nia jerasaun sira mak lori.”
Entaun Pilatus halo tuir sira nia hakarak hodi hasai Barabás husi kadeia. I nia haruka ema baku Jesus ho sikoti, depois entrega Jesus ba soldadu sira atu prega iha krus.
Hotu tiha soldadu sira lori Jesus ba iha governador Pilatus nia rezidensia i sira halibur sira nia maluk soldadu sira seluk nebee hela iha nebaa hodi mai haleu Nia.
Sira kolu tiha Jesus nia hena hodi foo hatais fali batina kor mean ida hanesan liurai sira baibain hatais.
Sira mos dulas ai tarak halo kabuar hanesan koroa liurai nian hodi tau ba Nia ulun. Sira tau ai sanak lotuk ida iha Nia liman loos hanesan ai tonka. Sira hakneak iha Nia oin hodi hamoe Nia dehan, “Viva, ema Judeu sira nia Liurai!”
Sira mos tafui kabeen ba Nia i foti fali ai sanak nee husi Nia liman laran hodi baku Nia ulun fila-fila.
Sira hamoe tiha Nia nunee, sira kolu fali batina mean hodi foo hatais fali Nia hena rasik. Hotu tiha sira lori Nia sai atu baa prega iha krus.
Iha dalan klaran, soldadu sira nebee mak lori Jesus nee hetan ema ida husi sidade Sirene, naran Simão. Sira obriga nia lori Jesus nia krus.
Sira too iha fatin ida naran Golgota, katak “Fatin Ulun Ruin”.
Iha nebaa sira kahur tua ho aimoruk hodi foo ba Jesus. Nia koko tiha maibee lakohi hemu.
Depois sira prega Jesus iha krus. I soldadu sira dada rifa atu hatene see mak bele hetan Jesus nia hena.
Hotu tiha sira tuur hodi hein Nia.
Sira mos iha ai kabelak ida nebee hakerek nunee: “Nee Jesus, ema Judeu sira nia Liurai.” Nee foo hatene razaun saida mak Jesus simu kastigu mate. I sira prega ai kabelak nee iha Nia ulun leten.
Sira prega tan ema naok-teen boot nain rua iha krus, ida iha Jesus nia sorin loos, ida iha sorin karuk.
Ema nebee liu husi fatin nee, sira doko ulun hodi koalia aat Jesus.
Sira hatete, “Uluk O dehan atu halo rahun uma kreda boot, depois harii fali iha loron tolu nia laran. Se O Maromak nia Oan duni, entaun salva took O nia Aan hodi tuun husi krus nee.”
Nai lulik nia ulun sira, mestri relijiaun sira ho katuas lia nain sira mos hatete aat Jesus dehan,
“Nia salva ona ema seluk, maibee Nia la bele salva Nia Aan rasik. Nia dehan, Nia mak ema Israel nia Liurai, entaun diak liu agora Nia tuun husi krus atu ita fiar.
Nia fiar ba Maromak. Se Maromak gosta Nia, entaun ita haree took Maromak mai salva Nia ka lae. Tanba Nia rasik hatete katak Nia Maromak nia Oan.”
Naok-teen nain rua nebee mak iha Jesus nia sor-sorin mos tarata aat Jesus nunee.
Komesa meudia, nakukun taka metin rejiaun nee tomak too tuku tolu lokraik.
Iha tuku tolu lokraik, Jesus hakilar ho lian makaas dehan, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” Nee dehan, “Hau nia Maromak, Hau nia Maromak, tansaa mak Ita Boot husik Hau mesak?”
Rona nunee, ema balu nebee hamriik besik dehan, “Nia bolu profeta Elias.”
Sira ida halai kedas baa foti esponza rohan ida habokon ho tua siin, tau ba ai naruk ida hodi lolo ba iha Jesus nia ibun atu hemu.
Maibee sira seluk dehan, “Hein lai! Ita haree took, Elias mai salva duni Nia ka lae.”
Depois Jesus hakilar dala ida tan ho lian makaas, i Nia hakotu Nia iis.
Bainhira Jesus nia iis kotu, kurtina boot nebee taka Fatin Lulik iha uma kreda boot, naklees husi leten too kraik fahe tiha ba rua. Rai nakdoko makaas i fatuk bo-boot sira nakfera tiha.
Rate sira mos nakloke. I Maromak nia ema balu nebee mate tiha ona, Nia halo moris fali.
Sira ida-idak sai husi sira nia rate. Bainhira Jesus moris fila fali, sira mos tama iha sidade santu Jerusalém, i ema barak haree.
Bainhira komandante Roma ho soldadu sira nebee hein Jesus nee haree rai nakdoko ho buat seluk nebee akontese, sira tauk teb-tebes hodi dehan, “Loos duni! Ema nee Maromak nia Oan.”
Iha nebaa iha senhora barak asisti husi dook deit. Sira nee uluk tuir Jesus husi Galileia too iha Jerusalém hodi serbi Nia.
Sira nee mak Maria Madalena, Maria ida seluk (Tiago ho José nia inan), Zebedeu nia feen (Tiago ho João nia inan) ho mos sel-seluk tan.
Iha ema riku ida husi sidade Arimateia, naran José. Nia mos Jesus nia eskolante ida. Loro matan atu monu ona,
nia baa hasoru Pilatus hodi husu Jesus nia mate isin atu hakoi. Entaun Pilatus haruka soldadu sira entrega Jesus nia mate isin ba José.
Depois José simu Jesus nia mate isin, i falun ho hena mutin diak nian nebee foun.
Nia lori Jesus nia mate isin baa haloot iha rate nebee nia prepara tiha ona ba nia aan rasik. Fatin nee fatuk lolon nebee ema bahat tiha ona atu sai rate. Depois nia duir fatuk boot ida hodi taka rate nee. Hotu tiha nia fila.
Maibee Maria Madalena ho Maria ida seluk tuur hela hodi hateke ba rate nee.
Iha fali aban, loron Sabadu, nai lulik nia ulun sira ho ema Farizeu sira baa hasoru malu ho governador Pilatus.
Sira dehan, “Senhor, ami hanoin hela Ema bosok-teen nee nia liafuan. Uluk Nia sei moris, Nia dehan katak too iha loron tolu Maromak sei halo Nia moris fali.
Nee duni haruka ita boot nia soldadu sira baa halo seguransa iha rate too iha loron tolu. Keta halo be Nia eskolante sira mai naok tiha Nia mate isin, depois sira dehan, Maromak halo Nia moris fali ona husi mate. Se ida nee mak akontese, entaun sira nee bosok aat liu fali sira nia Mestri.”
Pilatus hataan, “Entaun lori soldadu balu ba iha rate hodi halo seguransa metin iha nebaa.”
Nunee nai ulun Judeu sira hamutuk ho soldadu sira baa iha rate. Sira tau sinal ba rate nee nia odamatan atu ema keta tama. Depois soldadu sira halo seguransa nafatin iha nebaa.
Aban fali iha loron Domingu dadeer-saan nakukun, Maria Madalena ho Maria ida seluk baa haree rate.
Derepenti rai nakdoko makaas teb-tebes tanba Nai Maromak nia anju ida tuun mai husi lalehan hodi duir tiha fatuk nebee taka rate nee. Depois nia tuur iha leten.
Anju nee nia oin nabilan hanesan rai lakan, i nia hena mutin loos.
Haree nunee, seguransa sira tauk teb-tebes too sira nakdedar i monu tiha ba rai hanesan ema mate.
Depois anju hatete ba senhora nain rua nee dehan, “La bele tauk. Hau hatene imi buka hela Jesus, Ida nebee ema prega tiha ona ba krus nee.
Nia la iha nee ona, tanba Maromak halo moris fali ona Nia, tuir buat nebee uluk Nia hatete tiha ona. Mai haree fatin nebee mak ema tau Nia mate isin nee.
Haree tiha, imi baa lalais foo hatene Nia eskolante sira dehan, ‘Maromak halo moris fali ona Jesus husi mate. Nia sei baa iha Galileia hodi hein imi, i imi sei haree Nia iha nebaa.’ Keta haluha hau nia lia menon nee.”
Nunee senhora nain rua nee husik kedas rate. Sira tauk maibee sira mos haksolok teb-tebes. Sira halai lalais atu baa foo hatene Jesus nia eskolante sira.
Iha dalan klaran, derepenti Jesus hasoru sira i kumprimenta sira. Entaun sira baa besik Nia i hakruuk hakuak Nia ain hodi adora Nia.
Depois Jesus hatete ba sira, “La bele tauk. Baa foo hatene Hau nia maluk sira atu sira baa iha Galileia. Iha nebaa sira sei haree Hau.”
Bainhira senhora sira nee lao dadauk, seguransa sira balu hamriik hodi baa iha sidade Jerusalém. Too iha nebaa, sira konta ba nai lulik nia ulun sira kona ba buat hotu-hotu nebee mak ohin akontese iha rate.
Entaun nai lulik nia ulun sira hasoru malu ho katuas lia nain sira hodi halo planu. Sira foo osan barak ba soldadu sira nebee kontrola rate nee.
I sira hameno dehan, “Imi tenki foo sai dehan, ‘Iha kalan boot bainhira ami toba dukur hela, Nia eskolante sira mai naok tiha Nia mate isin.’
Se governador rona karik, ami mak baa koalia ho nia atu nunee imi la bele hetan kastigu.”
Entaun ema seguransa sira simu osan nee i habelar lia falsu nebee mak hameno tiha ona ba sira. Too agora istoria nee ema Judeu sira sei konta nafatin.
Depois Jesus nia eskolante nain sanulu resin ida baa sae foho ida iha provinsia Galileia, tuir buat nebee Jesus hameno tiha ona ba sira.
Bainhira sira haree Jesus, sira adora Nia. Maibee sira balu sei duvida hela.
Depois Jesus baa besik sira hodi dehan, “Maromak foo tiha ona kbiit tomak mai Hau atu ukun buat hotu-hotu iha lalehan ho rai.
Tanba nee, baa hanorin ema iha nasaun hotu-hotu atu sira sai Hau nia eskolante. Foo sarani sira hodi Aman, Oan ho Espiritu Santu sira nia naran.
Hanorin sira atu halo tuir buat hotu-hotu nebee mak Hau hatete ona ba imi. Keta haluha, Hau sempre hamutuk ho imi too mundu nee remata.”
Nee Liafuan Diak kona ba Maromak nia Oan Jesus Kristu. Liafuan Diak nee hahuu hanesan tuir mai nee.
Hori uluk kedas profeta Isaias hakerek Maromak nia lia menon kona ba ema nebee prepara dalan ba Jesus. Maromak dehan nunee: “Rona mai! Hau haruka Hau nia ema ida baa uluk hodi prepara dalan ba O.
Nia sei foo sai ho lian makaas iha rai fuik maran dehan, ‘Imi tenki hadia dalan atu simu ita nia Nai. Halo loos tiha dalan nebee kleuk para Nia lao tuir.’ ”
Ema nee mak João Sarani Nain. Nia baa iha rai fuik maran hodi foo hatene ba povu dehan, “Hakribi ona imi nia sala hodi mai sarani, para Maromak hamoos imi nia sala.”
Ema barak mai husi provinsia Judeia laran tomak ho sidade Jerusalém. Sira foo sai sira nia sala, depois João foo sarani sira iha mota Jordaun.
João hatais hena nebee halo husi kuda kamelu nia fulun, i nia sintu halo husi animal nia kulit. Nia hahaan mak gafanhotu ho bani been.
Nia foo sai dehan, “Iha Ema ida boot liu hau sei mai, atu hakruuk hodi kore deit Nia sandalias talin mos, hau la serve.
Hau foo sarani imi ho bee deit, maibee Nia sei foo sarani imi hodi Espiritu Santu.”
Iha tempu nebaa Jesus mai husi aldeia Nazaré iha provinsia Galileia ba iha mota Jordaun, i João foo sarani Nia iha mota nee.
Sarani hotu tiha Jesus sai husi bee laran. Derepenti Nia haree lalehan nakloke, i Maromak nia Espiritu hanesan manu pombu tuun ba iha Nia.
Depois lian ida husi lalehan dehan, “O mak Hau nia Oan doben. O halo Hau nia laran haksolok teb-tebes.”
Hotu tiha Espiritu Santu lori kedas Jesus ba iha rai fuik maran.
Durante loron haat-nulu, kalan haat-nulu Jesus hela iha rai fuik maran iha animal fuik nia leet, i Satanás koko Nia fila-fila. Maibee anju sira serbi Nia.
Iha loron ida, ema kaer João Sarani Nain hodi baa dadur iha komarka. João tama tiha komarka, Jesus baa iha provinsia Galileia hodi foo sai Maromak nia Liafuan Diak.
Iha nebaa Nia dehan, “Tempu too ona. La kleur tan Maromak sei ukun imi. Nee duni, hakribi ona imi nia sala hodi fiar Liafuan Diak.”
Iha loron ida Jesus lao liu husi tasi ibun Galileia. Nia haree peskador nain rua, Simão ho nia alin André soe hela dai iha tasi.
Jesus hatete ba sira, “Mai tuir Hau! Imi nee peskador ikan nian, maibee agora Hau sei hanorin imi atu sai peskador ba ema.”
Sira mos husik kedas sira nia dai hodi tuir Jesus.
Depois Jesus lao tan uitoan, Nia haree Zebedeu nia oan nain rua, Tiago ho João hadia hela redi iha sira nia roo laran.
Jesus bolu kedas sira nain rua atu tuir Nia. Sira mos husik sira nia aman Zebedeu iha roo laran hamutuk ho ema nebee servisu ho sira. Depois sira nain rua baa tuir Jesus.
Hotu tiha Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira baa iha sidade Kafarnaum. Iha loron Sabadu Jesus baa iha uma kreda i komesa hanorin.
Ema nebee rona nee admira, tanba Nia hanorin ho kbiit, la hanesan ho mestri relijiaun sira nia hanorin.
Iha uma kreda laran, iha mos mane ida espiritu aat domina hela nia. Derepenti nia hakilar dehan,
“Jesus, Ema Nazaré. O hakarak halo saida ba ami? O mai atu halakon ami ka? Hau hatene O. O mak Ema Santu nebee Maromak haruka mai.”
Maibee Jesus siak espiritu aat dehan, “Nonook! Sai husi ema nee!”
Depois espiritu aat doko makaas ema nee i hakilar makaas hodi sai husi nia.
Ema hotu admira hodi husu ba malu dehan, “Saida mak nee? Hanorin nee foun! Ema nee nia hanorin iha kbiit. Too Nia foo orden ba espiritu aat mos, espiritu aat halo tuir.”
Entaun saida mak Jesus halo nee ema konta ba-mai too ema iha provinsia Galileia tomak rona.
Bainhira Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira sai husi uma kreda, Jesus baa tama kedas iha Simão ho André nia uma. Tiago ho João mos tuir.
Momentu nee Simão nia banin feto isin manas toba hela iha kama. Ema konta kedas nia moras nee ba Jesus.
Nunee Jesus baa kaer senhora nee nia liman hodi ajuda nia hadeer. Derepenti nia isin manas lakon tiha, i nia hadeer kedas baa prepara hahaan foo ba sira.
Loro matan monu ona, ema barak mai lori sira nia maluk sira nebee moras ka diabu tama iha laran.
Ema husi sidade nee tomak mai halibur iha uma oin.
Jesus kura ema barak nebee moras oi-oin deit. Nia mos duni sai diabu husi ema barak. Nia bandu diabu sira la bele koalia, tanba sira konhese hela Nia.
Iha dadeer-saan nakukun, Jesus hadeer, Nia sai husi uma baa iha rai fuik ida hodi halo orasaun.
Simão ho nia kolega sira seluk sai baa buka Nia.
Bainhira sira hetan Nia, sira dehan, “Ema hotu-hotu buka Ita Boot!”
Maibee Jesus hataan, “Mai ita baa iha aldeia sira nebee besik atu Hau bele foo sai Maromak nia liafuan iha fatin sira nee. Tanba Hau mai atu halo ida nee duni.”
Nunee Jesus lao haleu provinsia Galileia tomak hodi hanorin iha sira nia uma kreda i duni sai diabu husi ema.
Iha mane ida moras lepra mai hakneak iha Jesus nia oin hodi husu tulun dehan, “Nai, Ita Boot iha kbiit atu kura hau nia moras hodi halo hau nia isin sai moos fali, naran katak Ita Boot hakarak.”
Jesus hanoin ema nee, nunee Nia lolo liman ba tau iha ema nee nia isin hodi dehan, “Hau hakarak. O diak ona ba!”
Derepenti ema nee nia moras lakon, i nia isin sai moos tiha.
Depois Jesus haruka nia baa ona, i hameno dehan,
“La bele konta sai buat nee ba ema seluk. Maibee baa aprezenta aan iha nai lulik, atu nia haree katak o nia isin moos ona. Depois foo oferta tuir lei Moisés nian, para ema hotu bele hatene katak o diak ona.”
Maibee ema nee baa foo sai lemo-lemo katak Jesus kura tiha ona nia moras. Nunee Jesus la bele hatudu Aan ona iha sidade laran. Nia baa hela tiha iha rai fuik. Maski nunee ema husi fatin nebee-nebee deit baa nafatin iha Jesus.
Liu tiha loron ida-rua, Jesus fila fali ba Kafarnaum. Ema rona katak Jesus mai fali ona.
Nunee ema nadodon mai sena malu metin iha uma laran, too iha odamatan oin mos, ema nakonu. Depois Jesus foo sai Maromak nia liafuan ba sira.
Jesus koalia dadauk, ema nain haat mai hulan mane ida liman-ain mate atu lori ba Jesus.
Maibee iha uma laran ema nakonu, too sira obriga atu tama mos, tama la diak. Entaun sira lori nia sae ba iha uma leten, i sira sobu uma kakuluk halo kuak hodi hatuun nia ho nia toba fatin, iha loos Jesus nia oin.
Bainhira Jesus haree sira nia fiar, Nia dehan ba ema isin mate nee, “Oan, o nia sala hamoos tiha ona.”
Iha mos mestri relijiaun balu tuur hela iha nebaa. Sira komesa hanoin dehan,
“Nusaa mak Nia koalia fali nunee? Nia hatete aat Maromak! So Maromak deit mak bele hamoos ema nia sala.”
Jesus hatene kedas sira nia hanoin, entaun Nia husu sira, “Nusaa mak imi hanoin nunee?
Se Hau dehan ba ema liman-ain mate nee katak, nia sala hamoos tiha ona, imi seidauk hatene, sai duni nunee ka lae. Maibee se Hau haruka nia hamriik ona hodi lori nia toba fatin i lao, imi bele haree ho matan.
Agora Hau sei hatudu mo-moos ba imi katak iha mundu nee Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan iha kbiit hodi hamoos ema nia sala.” Nunee Jesus hatete ba ema liman-ain mate nee dehan,
“Hamriik ona! Foti o nia toba fatin hodi fila ba uma.”
Ema nee hamriik kedas, i foti nia toba fatin hodi lao sai ba liur. Ema hotu iha fatin nee haree, i sira admira hodi hahii Maromak dehan, “Ita foin mak haree buat ida hanesan nee.”
Hotu tiha Jesus sai ba iha tasi ibun Galileia, ema barak mai hasoru Nia, i Nia komesa hanorin sira.
Jesus lao dadauk, Nia haree kobrador impostu ida naran Levi, Alfeu nia oan tuur hela iha nia servisu fatin. Jesus dehan ba nia, “Mai tuir Hau!” Levi mos hamriik hodi tuir Jesus.
Depois Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira baa haan iha Levi nia uma, i kobrador impostu barak ho ema aat sira seluk mos haan hamutuk ho sira. Tanba ema hanesan nee, barak mak tuir Jesus.
Iha mestri relijiaun balu husi grupu Farizeu haree Jesus haan hamutuk ho kobrador impostu ho ema aat sira. Nunee sira husu ba Jesus nia eskolante sira, “Nusaa mak Nia haan hamutuk fali ho kobrador impostu ho ema aat sira nee?”
Bainhira Jesus rona sira nia liafuan nee, Nia dehan ba sira, “So ema moras mak presiza doutor, ema isin diak lae. Hau mai atu bolu ema aat sira, laos atu bolu ema nebee konsidera nia aan moris loos ona.”
Iha loron ida João Sarani Nain nia eskolante sira ho mos ema Farizeu sira halo jejun. Ema balu mai husu Jesus nunee: “Ema nebee tuir João Sarani Nain halo jejun. Ema Farizeu sira nia eskolante sira mos hanesan. Maibee tansaa mak Ita Boot nia eskolante sira la jejun?”
Jesus hataan ho komparasaun dehan, “Hau hanesan noivu ida nebee selebra nia festa kazamentu. Bainhira noivu sei hamutuk ho nia bainaka sira, sira bele jejun ka? La bele! Durante noivu iha hela sira nia klaran, sira la bele jejun.
Maibee too iha loron ida, ema sei lori lakon tiha noivu nee. Iha loron nee mak nia bainaka sira sei jejun.
La iha ema ida uza hena foun hodi taka fali ba hena bosan nebee kuak. Se lae, hena foun dada hamutuk sai kiik tiha too estraga fali hena bosan nee halo naklees liu tan.
Nunee mos ema halo tua, la tau iha tua fatin nebee halo husi animal nia kulit nebee tuan ona. Tanba tua foun sempre nafurin sae hodi halo kulit tuan nee nakfera tanba toos tiha ona. Nunee tua mos fakar sai. Tua foun, tenki tau iha tua fatin foun.”
Iha loron Sabadu ida, Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira lao liu husi ema nia toos. Sira lao dadauk, nia eskolante sira komesa korut trigu musan.
Haree nunee, ema husi grupu Farizeu hasee Jesus dehan, “Haree took. Sira servisu fali iha loron Sabadu. Ida nee kontra ita nia lei!”
Jesus hatete ba sira, “Imi lee tiha ona liurai David nia istoria. Nusaa mak imi la kompriende nafatin? Iha loron ida David ho nia ema sira hamlaha loos i presiza hahaan.
Nia tama ba tenda orasaun. Iha nebaa iha paun nebee nai lulik sira oferese ona ba Maromak. Tuir lo-loos, so nai lulik sira deit mak bele haan paun nee, ema seluk la bele. Maibee David foti tiha paun nee hodi haan, i nia fahe mos ba nia ema sira haan. Ida nee akontese iha nai lulik boot Abiatar nia tempu.”
Jesus hatutan tan dehan, “Maromak halo loron Sabadu atu ajuda ema, laos atu foo todan ba ema.
Nee duni Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan mak loron Sabadu nia Nain. Hau mak iha direitu atu desidi, ema bele halo saida iha loron nee.”
Iha loron Sabadu ida, Jesus baa tama fali iha uma kreda. Iha nebaa iha mane ida nia liman sorin mate.
Ema Farizeu balu buka hela dalan atu foo sala ba Jesus. Entaun sira haree tu-tuir Nia atu kura ema nee iha loron sabadu ka lae.
Jesus bolu ema liman sorin mate nee hodi dehan, “Mai hamriik iha nee.”
Depois Nia husu ba ema sira nee, “Tuir ita nia lei relijiaun, ita bele halo saida iha loron Sabadu? Ita bele halo buat diak ka, aat? Ita bele salva ema ka, oho ema?” Maibee sira hotu nonook deit.
Jesus hateke ba sira ida-ida ho hirus. Nia mos laran susar teb-tebes tanba sira ulun toos. Depois Nia dehan ba ema liman sorin mate nee, “Lolo o nia liman mate nee mai!” Ema nee lolo ba, i nia liman diak kedas.
Haree nunee, ema Farizeu sira sai tiha husi uma kreda. I sira komesa kombina malu ho partidu Herodes nia membru sira, oinsaa mak bele oho Jesus.
Hotu tiha Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira husik tiha fatin nee hodi baa fali tasi Galileia, i ema barak lao tuir sira. Ema sira nee mai husi provinsia Galileia
ho Judeia. Iha balu mai husi sidade Jerusalém, husi Idumeia, husi mota Jordaun nia sorin ba, ho mos husi sidade Tiru ho Sidon. Ema sira nee mai tanba sira rona kona ba buat hotu nebee Jesus halo.
Tanba ema barak tebes, entaun Jesus haruka Nia eskolante sira prepara roo ida atu Nia bele tuur iha laran para ema lubun boot nee la bele sena malu ho nia.
Nia kura tiha ona ema moras barak, nee mak ema moras sira seluk mai hadau malu atu kona Nia.
Iha ema balu espiritu aat tama iha sira nia laran. Bainhira sira haree Jesus, ema sira nee monu ba rai hodi hakilar dehan, “O nee Maromak nia Oan!”
Maibee Jesus bandu makaas atu la bele foo sai katak Nia nee see.
Iha loron ida Jesus sae ba foho ida. Iha nebaa Nia bolu ema balu hakbesik ba Nia, i sira mos baa.
Depois Nia hili nain sanulu resin rua sai Nia apostolu. Nia foti sira atu sira akompanha Nia, i atu haruka sira baa foo sai Liafuan Diak.
Nia mos foo kbiit ba sira atu bele duni sai diabu husi ema.
Sira nain sanulu resin rua nebee Nia hili nee, sira nia naran mak hanesan tuir mai nee: Simão (Jesus mos bolu nia Pedro),
Tiago ho João (sira nain rua Zebedeu nia oan. Jesus bolu sira Boanerjes, nee katak “hanesan rai tarutu”),
André, Filipe, Bartolomeu, Mateus, Tomé, Tiago (Alfeu nia oan), Tadeu, Simão (nia ema Patriota),
ho Judas Iscariotes (ikus mai nia mak faan Jesus).
Hotu tiha Jesus tuun fali husi foho hodi baa tama iha uma ida. Ema barak mai hobur hamutuk iha fatin nee, too Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira atu haan mos la bele.
Bainhira Nia familia sira rona nunee, sira mai atu lori Nia sai tiha, tanba ema dehan, “Nia bulak tiha ona!”
Iha mestri relijiaun balu mai husi Jerusalém, sira dehan, “Diabu nia xefi Belzebu tama ona Nia laran. Belzebu nee mak foo kbiit ba Nia hodi duni sai diabu.”
Rona nunee, Jesus bolu ema sira nee mai hodi hatete ba sira uza komparasaun dehan, “Oinsaa mak Satanás bele duni sai Satanás?
Se iha nasaun ida, nia povu haan malu hela deit, nasaun nee sei monu.
Se iha uma kain ida, nia ema sira istori malu hela deit, sira sei naksobu.
Se Satanás kontra nia aan rasik, i diabu sira haan malu hela deit, entaun Satanás la bele hamriik metin, i nia ukun sei la dura.
Hau foo ezemplu tan. Se ema ida hakarak tama baa foti sasaan husi ema forti ida nia uma, nia tenki futu metin tiha ema forti nee uluk mak foin bele lalin sasaan sai husi nia uma.
Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, sala saida deit mak ema halo, Maromak foo perdaun, too ema hatete aat Maromak mos Maromak sei foo perdaun.
Maibee see mak hatete aat Espiritu Santu, Maromak sei la foo perdaun ba nia. Ema nee sei lori nia sala nee too tinan ba tinan.”
Jesus hatete nunee tanba sira dehan, “Ema nee, espiritu aat tama tiha ona Nia laran.”
Depois Jesus nia inan ho Nia alin mane sira too mai. Sira hamriik iha liur hodi haruka ema tama baa bolu Nia.
Iha uma laran, ema barak tuur haleu hela Jesus, sira dehan ba Nia, “Ita Boot nia inan ho alin sira iha liur hela, sira husu atu hasoru malu ho Ita Boot.”
Jesus hataan, “Hau nia inan mak see? I Hau nia alin sira mak see?”
Depois Nia hateke ba ema nebee tuur haleu Nia nee hodi dehan, “Imi sira nee mak Hau nia inan ho Hau nia alin sira.
See mak halo tuir Maromak nia hakarak, sira nee mak Hau nia inan, Hau nia feton ho Hau nia alin mane sira.”
Iha loron ida Jesus komesa hanorin iha tasi ibun Galileia. Ema barak teb-tebes mai haleu Nia, nunee Nia baa tuur iha roo ida nebee para hela iha tasi ninin, i ema barak nee hamriik deit iha tasi ibun.
Nia hanorin buat barak uza komparasaun. Nia dehan nunee:
“Rona mai! Iha toos nain ida baa kari fini iha nia toos.
Bainhira nia kari fini nee, balu monu iha dalan. I manu fuik mai haan tiha hotu.
Fini balu monu iha fatuk leten, fini nee moris lalais deit tanba rai mihis.
Bainhira loro matan sae, loro manas sunu fini nebee foin moris sai mai nee too namlaik tiha, tanba abut la tama iha rai okos.
Fini balu monu iha duut tarak laran. Fini nee moris, maibee duut tarak habit tiha too la foo isin.
Iha tan fini balu monu iha rai bokur. Fini nee moris diak, buras, too foo isin barak, balu too musan tolu-nulu, balu too musan neen-nulu i balu too musan atus ida.”
Jesus hatutan tan dehan, “Imi nebee iha tilun, rona di-diak ba!”
Bainhira Jesus mesak ho Nia eskolante sanulu resin rua ho ema balu tan nebee baibain tuir Nia, sira husu ba Nia kona ba komparasaun hirak nee.
Jesus dehan ba sira, “Uluk ema seidauk hatene, oinsaa mak Maromak ukun nudar Liurai. Agora Hau foo sai mo-moos ba imi deit, maibee ba ema seluk Hau sempre uza komparasaun,
atu nunee ‘Sira haree duni, maibee la kompriende saida mak sira haree. Sira rona hela, maibee la kompriende saida mak sira rona. Nunee sira la bele fila fali ba Maromak atu Nia hamoos sira nia sala.’ ”
Depois Jesus dehan tan, “Imi la kompriende komparasaun nee ka? Se imi la kompriende ida nee, entaun komparasaun sira seluk imi atu kompriende oinsaa?
Komparasaun nee nunee: Toos nain nebee kari fini nee mak ema nebee foo sai Maromak nia liafuan.
Fini nebee monu iha dalan mak ema nebee rona Maromak nia liafuan. Rona hotu tiha, Satanás mai hadau kedas liafuan nebee iha tiha ona sira nia laran.
Fini nebee monu iha fatuk leten mak ema nebee rona Maromak nia liafuan, i simu kedas ho laran haksolok.
Maibee liafuan nee la iha abut. Nunee sira fiar duni maibee la kleur ida. Depois susar kona sira, ka ema seluk halo terus sira tanba sira simu liafuan nee, sira husik tiha kedas.
Fini nebee monu iha duut tarak laran mak ema nebee rona Maromak nia liafuan,
maibee sira preokupa ho sira nia moris loro-loron nian, sira nia matan naklosu ba riku-soin mundu nian, i sira nia laran nakonu ho hakarak oi-oin deit. Sira nia preokupasaun nee la foo fatin ba Maromak nia liafuan, nunee liafuan nee la muda sira nia moris.
Maibee fini nebee monu iha rai bokur mak ema nebee rona Maromak nia liafuan hodi simu. Depois sira moris tuir, hanesan fini nebee moris too foo isin, balu musan tolu-nulu, balu musan neen-nulu, i balu too musan atus ida.”
Jesus foo tan komparasaun ida nunee: “Bainhira ema sunu ahi-oan, sira taka tiha ho sanan ka tau fali iha kama okos ka? Lae! Ahi-oan tenki tau iha fatin aas.
Nunee mos, buat hotu-hotu nebee agora sei subar hela, iha loron ida sei hatudu mo-moos. I buat hotu-hotu nebee agora taka hela, iha loron ida sei nakloke para ema bele hatene.
See mak iha tilun, rona di-diak ba!”
Depois Jesus hatutan tan dehan, “Hanoin di-diak buat nebee mak imi rona. Se imi hakaas aan hodi kompriende Hau nia liafuan, Maromak sei tulun imi atu kompriende tuir imi nia esforsu nee. Laos nee deit, maibee Maromak sei foo liu fali imi nia esforsu.
Tanba ema nebee kompriende ona, Maromak sei halo nia kompriende liu tan. Maibee ema nebee lakohi hatene, buat uitoan nebee nia kompriende tiha ona mos, Maromak sei hasai tiha husi nia hanoin.”
Jesus halo tan komparasaun dehan, “Maromak ukun nudar Liurai, nee hanesan toos nain kuda fini iha nia toos laran.
Kalan nia deskansa loron nia hadeer fali. Tempu lao dadauk, fini nee moris too buras ba beibeik, maibee toos nain la kompriende oinsaa mak fini nee bele buras hanesan nee.
Rai nee rasik mak halo moris, primeiru iha kain, depois iha funan mak foin iha isin.
Bainhira tasak ona, toos nain mai silu tanba tempu ona.”
Jesus dehan tan, “Maromak ukun Nia reinu, oinsaa loos? Hau atu halo komparasaun ho saida?
Nee hanesan ai musan kiikoan loos nebee mak ema kuda iha toos. Maski ai musan nee kiik liu musan sira seluk iha mundu nee,
maibee nia moris i buras too sai ai huun ida nebee mak boot liu iha toos laran, nia sanak mos boot. Nunee manu fuik sira bele mai hamahon aan hodi halo knuuk iha nebaa.”
Jesus uza beibeik komparasaun hanesan nee hodi hanorin Maromak nia liafuan ba ema lubun boot. Nia hanorin tuir saida mak sira bele kompriende.
Nia sempre hanorin sira uza komparasaun. Maibee bainhira Nia ho Nia eskolante sira mesak ona, Nia esplika mo-moos ba sira.
Iha loron nee, loro matan besik monu ona, Jesus hatete ba Nia eskolante sira, “Mai ita baa iha tasi sorin.”
Nunee sira husik hela ema barak nee hodi lao, sira sae roo nebee mak ohin Jesus tuur hodi hanorin nee. Iha mos roo seluk tuir sira.
Jesus tau ulun iha sumasu hodi toba dukur iha roo nia kotuk. La kleur anin boot mosu. I laloran baku roo nee halo tasi been tama ba roo laran too bee besik nakonu. Haree nunee, Jesus nia eskolante sira fanu Nia hodi dehan, “Mestri, Ita atu mate ona! Mestri la interese ka?”
<range>
Jesus hadeer hodi siak anin i hatete ba laloran nunee: “Para ona! Hakmatek ba!” Anin para kedas, tasi mos hakmatek liu.
Depois Jesus hatete ba sira, “Nusaa mak imi tauk hanesan nee?! Imi la fiar Hau ka?”
Nia eskolante sira tauk teb-tebes hodi dehan ba malu, “Ema nee see loos mak too anin ho laloran mos rona Nia?”
Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira ho roo too rai Gerasa, iha tasi Galileia nia sorin ba.
Iha nebaa iha mane ida, espiritu aat tama iha nia laran. Bainhira Jesus tuun husi roo, ema nee lao sai mai husi rate atu hasoru Nia.
Ema nee hela deit iha rate, i la iha tan ema ida mak bele kesi nia, maski ho korenti besi mos la bele.
Dala barak ona ema kesi nia liman-ain ho korenti besi, maibee nia sempre rasta kotu tiha korenti iha nia liman, i korenti iha nia ain mos nia halo rahun hotu. Nia forti liu, too la iha ema ida bele kaer metin.
Loron-kalan nia lao ba-mai iha rate leet ho mos lao tuun-sae foho hodi hakilar beibeik i tuku kanek nia aan ho fatuk.
Bainhira ema nee haree Jesus husi dook, nia halai ba iha Jesus hodi hakruuk too rai iha Jesus nia oin.
Jesus haruka espiritu aat nee dehan “Espiritu aat, sai husi ema nee!” Ema nee hakilar ho lian makaas dehan, “Jesus, Maromak Aas Liu nia Oan, O hakarak halo saida mai hau? Hau husu O atu jura hodi Maromak nia naran katak O sei la kastigu hau.”
<range>
Jesus husu ba nia, “O naran saa?” Ema nee hataan, “Hau nia naran Batalhaun, tanba ami barak.”
Depois nia husu beibeik ba Jesus atu la bele duni sai espiritu aat sira nee sai husi rai nee.
Iha momentu nebaa, iha fahi barak teb-tebes haan hela iha foho lolon, la dook husi fatin nee.
Espiritu aat sira husu fila-fila ba Jesus dehan, “Haruka ami baa tama iha fahi sira nebaa.”
Jesus mos foo lisensa. Entaun espiritu aat sira sai husi ema nee baa tama fali iha fahi sira. I fahi sira nee halai saruntu malu tuun husi foho lolon nee hodi monu hotu ba tasi laran. Nunee fahi sira nee mout too mate hotu. Fahi nebee mate nee hamutuk maizoumenus rihun rua.
Hotu tiha fahi atan sira halai baa konta sai iha sidade ho fatin sira nebee besik. I ema barak mai atu haree saida mak akontese tiha ona.
Too iha nebaa, sira haree ema nebee uluk espiritu aat batalhaun ida hela iha nia laran nee, diak tiha ona. Nia tuur hakmatek hela, hatais tiha ona hena, i hanoin normal fali ona. Haree nunee, sira hotu tauk.
Ema sira nebee ohin haree Jesus duni sai diabu nee, sira konta ba sira nebee foin mai, kona ba oinsaa mak Jesus kura ema nee, i saida mak akontese ba fahi sira nee.
Depois ema iha rai nee husu fila-fila atu Jesus sai tiha husi sira nia rain.
Bainhira Jesus atu sae fali ba roo laran, ema nebee ohin espiritu aat sai husi nia nee, husu atu bele baa hamutuk ho Jesus.
Maibee Jesus lakohi. Nia dehan, “Diak liu o fila ba o nia maluk sira hodi konta saida mak Nai Maromak halo ona ba o, i oinsaa Nai Maromak hatudu Nia laran luak ba o.”
Entaun ema nee baa lao lemo-lemo iha rai Dekápolis hodi konta sai kona ba buat hotu nebee Jesus halo ba nia. Ema nebee rona, sira hotu admira.
Jesus ho roo fila fali ba tasi sorin. Nia foin too iha tasi ninin, ema barak teb-tebes mai hobur Nia.
Iha ema ida naran Jairo, nia responsavel ida iha uma kreda iha sidade nee, nia mos mai. Bainhira nia haree Jesus, nia hakruuk too rai iha Jesus nia oin
hodi husu tulun dehan, “Hau nia oan feto besik atu mate. Hau husu atu Ita Boot baa tau liman ba labarik nee para nia bele diak fali i bele moris.”
Nunee Jesus baa ho Jairo. Sira lao dadauk, ema barak lao tuir Jesus too sena malu kona Nia.
Iha ema lubun boot nee, iha feto ida, nia fulan mai la para durante tinan sanulu resin rua.
Nia gasta tiha ona nia riku-soin hotu hodi baa konsulta iha doutor, maibee doutor sira la bele kura nia moras. Tratamentu nebee sira foo nee halo nia terus liu, i nia moras aumenta tan deit.
Feto nee rona ona kona ba Jesus. Nunee nia sena malu husi ema barak nia leet hodi baa bes-besik iha Jesus nia kotuk, nia kona Jesus nia hena.
Tanba nia hanoin nunee: “Naran katak hau kona kois deit Nia hena mos, hau nia moras sei diak.”
Nia foin kona Jesus nia hena, nia raan para kedas, i nia senti nia moras nee diak fali ona.
Iha momentu nee kedas Jesus senti iha kbiit sai husi Nia. Nunee Nia hateke ba kotuk hodi haree ba ema barak nee, i Nia husu, “See mak ohin kona Hau nia hena nee?”
Nia eskolante sira hataan, “Ita Boot rasik haree deit ba, iha ema barak mak sena malu kona Ita Boot. Halo nusaa mak Ita Boot husu fali, ‘See mak ohin kona Hau nia hena?!’”
Maibee Jesus haree ba-mai atu buka hatene see loos mak ohin kona Nia hena nee.
Feto nebee ohin kona Jesus nia hena nee, tauk teb-tebes ho nakdedar, tanba nia hatene saida mak ohin akontese ba nia. Nunee nia baa hakneak hakruuk too rai iha Jesus nia ain hodi konta sai hotu.
Depois Jesus dehan, “Hau nia oan, o hetan kura tanba o fiar mai Hau. O nia moras nee kura hotu tiha ona. Fila ho laran hakmatek.”
Jesus sei koalia hela, ema balu mai husi Jairo nia uma foo hatene ba Jairo dehan, “Senhor nia oan iis kotu tiha ona. Ita halo kole tan mestri hodi halo saida?”
Rona nunee Jesus hatete ba Jairo, “Lalika tauk. Fiar deit.”
Jesus lori deit Pedro, Tiago ho Tiago nia alin João hodi akompanha Jairo. Ema sira seluk Nia bandu la bele tuir.
Bainhira sira too iha Jairo nia uma, Jesus haree ema barak rungu-ranga, i ema tanis lelir.
Jesus tama ba iha uma laran. Depois Nia dehan ba sira, “Nusaa mak imi rungu-ranga hodi tanis lelir hanesan nee? Labarik nee la mate ida, nia toba deit.”
Maibee sira hamnasa fali Nia. Jesus haruka sira hotu sai. Depois Nia bolu labarik nee nia inan-aman ho Nia eskolante nain tolu nee, para sira tama hamutuk iha labarik nee nia kuartu laran.
Depois Jesus kaer labarik nee nia liman hodi dehan ba nia, “Talita kum!” Nee dehan katak, “Noi, Hau haruka o hadeer ona!”
Derepenti deit labarik feto nee hadeer, i lao kedas. Haree nunee, sira hotu admira teb-tebes. Labarik nee tinan sanulu resin rua.
Jesus bandu sira la bele konta sai ba ema seluk. I nia haruka sira foo hahaan ba labarik nee.
Jesus husik tiha fatin nee hodi baa fali iha Nia aldeia rasik, i Nia eskolante sira mos baa hotu.
Too ona loron Sabadu, Jesus tama ba iha uma kreda hodi hanorin. Ema nebee rona, barak mak admira hodi husu ba malu, “Ema nee hetan buat sira nee husi nebee? Oinsaa mak Nia bele hetan matenek hanesan nee? Nia kbiit mai husi nebee mak Nia bele halo milagre?
Ita hatene hela Nia. Nia nee badaen ai ida. Nia inan mak Maria, i nia alin sira Tiago, José, Judas ho Simão. Nia alin feto sira mos hela iha nee.” Nunee sira laran moras too lakohi simu Nia.
Jesus hatete ba sira, “Ema iha nebee-nebee deit respeita Maromak nia profeta. So ema husi nia aldeia rasik ho nia maluk rasik ho nia familia rasik mak la respeita nia.”
Ema sira nee lakohi fiar ba Jesus. Nee mak Nia la bele halo milagre barak iha sira nia leet, Nia so tau liman ba ema moras balu deit hodi kura sira. Nia hakfodak tanba ema iha nebaa la fiar ba Nia.
Hotu tiha Jesus lao husi aldeia ida ba aldeia seluk hodi hanorin Maromak nia liafuan.
Nia bolu Nia eskolante nain sanulu resin rua i haruka sira lao ru-rua hodi foo kbiit ba sira atu duni sai espiritu aat.
Nia haruka sira nunee: “Bainhira imi lao, lori ai tonka. La bele lori pasta, bukae ka osan iha bolsu.
Tau sandalias, maibee keta lori hena hodi troka.”
Nia hatutan tan, “Kuandu ema simu imi iha sira nia uma, hela deit iha uma nee too imi sai fali husi aldeia nee.
Se imi baa too iha fatin ida mak ema la simu imi ka la rona imi nia liafuan, husik tiha fatin nee, i hisik rai rahun husi imi nia ain okos nudar sinal katak sira rasik mak sei lori todan.”
Nunee eskolante sira lao ba iha fat-fatin hodi foo sai katak ema tenki hakribi sira nia sala.
Sira duni sai diabu barak husi ema, i kose mina ba ema moras barak hodi kura sira.
Iha tempu nee, ema barak temi ona Jesus nia naran. Liurai Herodes mos rona kona ba saida mak Jesus halo. Balu dehan, “Ema nee João Sarani Nain mak moris fali ona husi mate. Nee mak Nia iha kbiit hodi halo milagre.”
Balu tan dehan, “Nia nee profeta Elias.” Seluk tan dehan, “Nia nee Maromak nia profeta ida, hanesan mos profeta sira iha tempu antigu.”
Rona nunee Herodes dehan, “João ida hau tesi nia kakorok nee mak moris fali ona husi mate.”
João Sarani Nain ho Herodes nia istoria nunee: Uluk Herodes hola fali nia alin Filipe nia kaben, naran Herodias. Iha tempu nebaa João hasee nia fila-fila dehan, “Ita la bele hola fali ita nia alin nia kaben, hahalok nee kontra Maromak nia lei!” Tanba nee, Herodes haruka ema kaer João i futu nia hodi hatama ba iha komarka.
<range>
Nunee Herodias rai odi ba João, i hakarak atu oho. Maibee nia la bele oho,
tanba Herodes respeita João i defende nia. Herodes hatene katak João nee ema ida nebee moris loos, i Maromak mak haruka nia mai. Bainhira Herodes rona João koalia, nia laran la hakmatek. Maski nunee, nia gosta rona.
Too ikus Herodias hetan oportunidade atu halakon João, iha tempu nebee Herodes halo tinan. Iha loron nee nia halo festa boot. Nia konvida nia funsionariu bo-boot, komandante militar ho mos ema boot sira iha Galileia laran.
Festa too klaran ona, Herodias nia oan feto tama mai dansa iha bainaka sira nia oin. Menina nee nia dansa halo Herodes ho bainaka sira nia laran kontenti teb-tebes. Liurai Herodes hatete ba menina nee, “O hakarak husu saida deit, husu ba! Hau sei foo.”
Nia jura ba menina nee dehan, “Saida deit mak o husu mai hau, hau sei foo ba o. Se o hakarak ukun hau nia rai sorin balu mos hau sei foo ba o.”
Menina nee sai baa husu nia inan nunee, “Hau husu saida mak diak?” Nia inan hataan, “O baa husu João Sarani Nain nia ulun.”
Menina nee halai kedas ba iha liurai Herodes hodi husu, “Hau hakarak João Sarani Nain nia ulun, tau iha bandeja ida, entrega kedas mai hau.”
Liurai laran susar teb-tebes. Maibee nia jura tiha ona iha bainaka sira nia oin, entaun nia tenki halo tuir.
Nia haruka kedas nia soldadu ida baa hasai João nia ulun atu lori mai. Soldadu nee mos baa iha komarka hodi tesi João nia kakorok,
i tau nia ulun iha bandeja lori baa foo ba menina nee. Depois menina nee lori baa foo ba nia inan.
Bainhira João nia eskolante sira rona dehan ema oho tiha João, sira baa lori sai João nia mate isin baa haloot iha rate.
Iha loron ida, Jesus nia apostolu sira nebee uluk Nia haruka baa nee, sira fila fali mai hamutuk ho Nia. Sira konta ba Nia buat hotu-hotu nebee mak sira halo ona, ho buat nebee mak sira hanorin ona.
Iha tempu nee ema barak lao ba lao mai, halo Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira haan mos la bele. Entaun Jesus hatete ba Nia eskolante sira, “Mai ita baa iha fatin ida hakmatek hodi deskansa.”
Nunee Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira sae roo hodi baa iha rai fuik ida.
Maibee ema barak haree hela roo nee lao, i hatene see mak iha laran. Nunee ema husi aldeia hotu-hotu halai liu husi tasi ibun. I ema sira nee mak too uluk.
Bainhira Jesus tuun husi roo, i haree ema barak nee, Nia hanoin loos sira, tanba sira hanesan bibi malae nebee la iha bibi atan atu hatudu dalan ba sira. Entaun Nia komesa hanorin sira buat barak.
Bainhira lokraik ona, Jesus nia eskolante sira mai hatete ba Nia dehan, “Iha nee rai fuik, rai mos atu kalan ona.
Diak liu haruka ema sira nee baa iha aldeia sira nebee besik hodi sosa hahaan rasik.”
Maibee Jesus hataan, “Imi mak foo hahaan ba sira.” Nia eskolante sira hataan fali, “Ami mak atu hola hahaan ba sira hotu ka? Se nunee ita tenki gasta osan barak teb-tebes, hanesan ema badaen nia salariu fulan walu nian!”
Jesus husu, “Imi iha paun fuan hira? Baa haree took!” Nunee sira baa buka hatene, depois sira mai fali dehan, “Iha paun fuan lima ho ikan rua.”
Jesus haruka Nia eskolante sira baa foo hatene ema barak nee tuur tuir grupu iha duut matak leten.
Entaun sira tuur tuir grupu, grupu balu ema atus ida, balu lima-nulu.
Nia foti paun fuan lima ho ikan rua nee, i hateke ba lalehan hodi foo agradese ba Maromak. Nia silu paun halo rohan-rohan, i foo ba Nia eskolante sira. Depois Nia eskolante sira hodi baa fahe ba ema lubun boot nee. Ikan rua mos Nia halo pedasuk-pedasuk, depois fahe ba sira.
Sira hotu haan too bosu,
hahaan mos resin. Nia eskolante sira tau hamutuk hahaan restu sira nee iha bote sanulu resin rua nakonu.
Ema nebee haan nee rihun lima. Nee foin sura mane deit, feto ho labarik la sura.
Hotu tiha, Jesus haruka kedas Nia eskolante sira sae roo hodi baa uluk iha aldeia Betsaida iha tasi sorin. Maibee Nia sei hela iha nebaa atu haruka ema lubun boot nee fila.
Depois Jesus mesak sae ba foho ida hodi halo orasaun.
Rai kalan ona, roo nebee mak eskolante sira sae nee too tiha ona tasi klaran, i Jesus mesak iha rai maran.
Nia haree Nia eskolante sira hean roo makaas teb-tebes maibee roo la lao ba oin tanba halai hasoru anin boot. Iha dadeer-saan nakukun, Jesus lao iha bee leten ba iha Nia eskolante sira. Nia atu lao liu ona,
maibee bainhira Nia eskolante sira haree Nia lao iha bee leten, sira hanoin dehan mate klamar. Nunee sira hakilar
tanba sira hotu haree Nia i sira tauk teb-tebes. Jesus hatete kedas ba sira, “Brani ba! Nee Hau. La bele tauk!”
Depois Nia tama iha roo laran hamutuk ho sira, i anin mos para kedas. Eskolante sira hakfodak loos.
Maski Jesus halo milagre hodi foo haan ema rihun lima resin, maibee eskolante sira la kompriende nafatin kona ba Jesus nia kbiit, tanba sira nia ulun toos.
Bainhira Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira too iha tasi sorin, iha rai Genesaré, sira kesi sira nia roo iha nebaa.
Sira foin tuun husi roo, ema barak konhese kedas Jesus.
Nunee ema sira nee halai baa foo hatene ema iha rejiaun nee tomak. Ema rona dehan Jesus iha nebee, sira hulan moras sira ba iha nebaa.
Jesus baa iha aldeia ida ka sidade ka rejiaun nebee deit, ema lori sira nia maluk nebee mak moras hodi tau iha fatin publiku. Sira husu ba Jesus atu ema moras sira nee bele kona deit Nia hena rohan. Ema moras sira nebee konsege kona Nia hena rohan, sira hetan kura hotu.
Iha loron ida ema balu husi grupu Farizeu ho mestri relijiaun balu mai husi Jerusalém atu hasoru malu ho Jesus.
Sira haree Jesus nia eskolante balu haan la fase liman tuir bei-ala sira nia kostumi.
Ema Judeu hotu-hotu, liu-liu sira husi grupu Farizeu, kaer metin sira nia bei-ala nia kostumi oinsaa fase liman molok haan.
Bainhira fila husi merkadu, antes atu haan sira tenki fase liman tuir sira nia lisan. Iha tan regra seluk mak sira halo tuir, hanesan fase kopu, buli ho mos sanan.
Entaun ema Farizeu sira ho mestri relijiaun sira husu Jesus dehan, “Tansaa mak Ita Boot nia eskolante sira la moris tuir ita nia bei-ala sira nia lisan? Nusaa mak sira haan la fase liman?”
Jesus hataan, “Imi koalia oin seluk, hahalok oin seluk! Buat nebee hori uluk kedas profeta Isaias hakerek, kona loos imi. Nia foo tutan Maromak nia liafuan nunee: ‘Ema sira nee hahii Hau ho ibun tutun, maibee sira nia laran dook husi Hau.
Sira adora Hau maibee la iha folin. Sira hanorin deit lei ema nian, maibee bosok fali dehan, sira nia hanorin nee mai husi Hau.’
Imi husik tiha ona Maromak nia ukun fuan hodi kaer metin fali lisan nebee mai husi ema.”
Nia hatutan tan dehan, “Imi fasil loos tau Maromak nia ukun fuan iha imi nia kotuk para imi bele halo tuir imi nia lisan rasik.
Tanba Moisés dehan, ‘Respeita o nia inan-aman.’ Nia mos dehan, ‘See mak koalia liafuan aat hasoru nia inan-aman, ema nee sei hetan kastigu mate.’
Maibee imi hanorin oin seluk fali. Tuir imi, ema bele hatete ba nia inan-aman dehan, ‘Sasaan nebee apaa ho amaa presiza, hau la bele foo, tanba hau promete ona atu foo ba Maromak.’
Nunee imi bandu ema atu la bele ajuda sira nia inan-aman ona.
Liu husi lisan nebee mak imi hanorin nee, imi halakon tiha Maromak nia lei. Iha buat barak mak imi halo hanesan nee.”
Depois Jesus bolu tan ema hotu iha nebaa atu mai besik. Nia dehan ba sira, “Imi hotu-hotu rona mai, i kompriende di-diak Hau nia liafuan nee.
Buat nebee mak tama ba ema nia laran, nee la halo foer nia iha Maromak nia oin. Maibee buat nebee mak sai husi ema nia laran, nee mak halo foer nia.
[See mak iha tilun, rona di-diak ba!]”
Hanorin hotu tiha Jesus husik ema barak nee hodi tama ba iha uma ida. Depois Nia eskolante sira husu kona ba komparasaun nebee ohin Nia koalia nee.
Jesus hataan ba sira, “Entaun imi la kompriende nafatin ka? Imi hatene katak, buat nebee tama iha ema nia isin liu husi nia ibun nee la halo foer nia.
Tanba buat nebee ema haan, laos tama ba iha nia fuan laran, maibee hahaan nee tama ba iha nia kabun laran, depois sai fali.” Ho nunee Jesus hatete katak, hahaan saida deit ema bele haan, la bandu ida.
Jesus hatutan tan dehan, “Saida mak sai husi ema nia laran, ida nee mak halo foer nia.
Tanba hanoin aat nebee mosu husi ema nia laran mak lori nia ba halo sala ho ema nia feen ka laen, halo sala seksual sel-seluk, naok, oho ema, kaan ema nia sasaan, halo buat aat, han-matak ema nia sasaan, la hatene moe, laran moras ema, hatete aat ema seluk, foti aan, i ulun toos.
<range>
Hahalok sira nee hotu sai husi ema nia laran, nee mak halo ema foer iha Maromak nia oin.”
Hotu tiha Jesus sai husi fatin nee hodi baa iha rai ida besik sidade Tiru. Iha nebaa Nia tama iha uma ida. Nia lakohi atu ema seluk hatene katak Nia iha fatin nee, maibee Nia atu subar Aan la diak.
Iha fatin nee iha senhora ida, nia oan feto espiritu aat tama iha laran. Bainhira senhora nee rona katak Jesus iha hela fatin nee, nia mai kedas hakneak hakruuk too rai iha Jesus nia oin.
Senhora nee ema jentiu ida, laos Judeu, nia moris iha rai Fenísia iha provinsia Síria. Nia husu fila-fila ba Jesus atu duni sai espiritu aat husi nia oan.
Jesus soe lia dehan, “Husik labarik sira haan lai too bosu mak foin foo restu ba asu. La bele foti labarik nia hahaan hodi soe fali ba asu. Nee la loos.”
Maibee senhora nee hataan fali dehan, “Loos duni Nai, maibee asu iha meza okos bele hili labarik nia hahaan nebee mak monu iha rai.”
Jesus dehan, “Ita boot hataan ho diak. Entaun bele fila ona ba uma. Diabu sai tiha ona husi ita boot nia oan feto.”
Senhora nee fila ba uma, nia haree nia oan toba hela, diabu sai tiha ona husi nia.
Hotu tiha Jesus sai husi rejiaun Tiru baa fali iha Sidon. Depois Nia baa iha tasi Galileia hodi tama ba iha rai Dekápolis.
Iha nebaa ema balu mai lori sira nia maluk ida nebee tilun diuk i koalia la moos. Sira lori nia ba iha Jesus hodi husu fila-fila atu Jesus tau liman ba nia.
Jesus lori ema nee sees husi ema barak nia klaran. Nia hatama Nia liman fuan ba iha ema nee nia tilun. Depois Nia tafui kabeen ba iha Nia liman hodi tau ba ema nee nia nanaal.
Hotu tiha Nia hateke sae ba lalehan, Nia dada iis naruk hodi dehan ba ema nee, “Efata!” Nee katak “Nakloke ba!”
Derepenti ema tilun diuk nee bele rona fali, nia nanaal mos mamar tiha, i nia komesa koalia moos.
Jesus bandu ema sira iha nebaa atu la bele hatete sai ba ema ida. Maski Jesus bandu makaas, maibee sira baa konta liu tan.
Sira admira teb-tebes hodi dehan, “Nia halo saida deit, furak teb-tebes. Ema tilun diuk bele rona, ema nebee la hatene koalia bele koalia.”
Iha tempu nebaa, iha tan ema barak mai halibur hamutuk ho Jesus. Sira nia hahaan la iha ona, nunee Jesus bolu Nia eskolante sira hodi dehan,
“Hau hanoin loos ema barak nee. Sira hamutuk ho Hau loron tolu ona, i sira nia hahaan la iha ona.
Se Hau haruka sira fila ba sira nia uma ho kabun mamuk deit, sira bele monu iha dalan, tanba sira balu mai husi fatin dook.”
Jesus nia eskolante sira hataan, “Rai nee fuik. Ita atu hetan hahaan husi nebee mak atu foo hahaan ba ema sira nee?!”
Jesus husu ba sira, “Imi iha paun fuan hira?” Sira hataan, “Iha hitu.”
Depois Jesus haruka ema lubun boot nee tuur hotu iha rai. Nia foti paun fuan hitu nee hodi foo agradese ba Maromak. Nia silu halo rohan-rohan tiha foo ba Nia eskolante sira, depois sira fahe ba ema lubun boot nee.
Sira mos iha ikan kiik, uitoan deit. Jesus foo agradese ba Maromak ba ikan nee, i haruka Nia eskolante sira fahe ba ema lubun boot nee.
Sira hotu haan too bosu, hahaan mos resin. Nia eskolante sira tau hamutuk hahaan restu sira nee iha bote hitu nakonu.
Ema nebee haan nee maizoumenus rihun haat. Hotu tiha Jesus haruka ema lubun boot nee fila.
Depois Nia baa sae kedas roo hamutuk ho Nia eskolante sira hodi baa iha rai Dalmanuta.
Ema Farizeu balu mai litik Jesus. Sira hakarak koko Nia, nunee sira husu para Nia halo milagre hodi hatudu katak Nia kbiit nee mai duni husi Maromak ka lae.
Jesus dada iis naruk hodi dehan, “Tanba saa mak imi ema agora nee husu Hau halo milagre hanesan sinal atu imi bele fiar? Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, Hau sei la halo ba imi.”
Depois Jesus husik tiha sira. Nia sae fali roo hodi baa iha tasi sorin.
Iha tasi klaran, Jesus nia eskolante sira foin hanoin katak sira haluha lori paun, sira so iha deit paun fuan ida iha roo laran.
Depois Jesus foo hanoin ba sira, “Kuidadu! Hadook aan husi ema Farizeu ho Herodes sira nia fermentu.”
Nia eskolante sira komesa hatete ba malu dehan, “Karik Nia koalia hanesan nee tanba ita la iha paun.”
Jesus hatene hela saida mak sira koalia. Entaun Nia hatete, “Nusaa mak imi diskuti malu fali kona ba paun? Imi seidauk kompriende ka? Tuir loos imi hatene ona! Nusaa mak imi ulun toos hanesan nee?
Imi iha matan, maibee imi la haree. Imi iha tilun, maibee imi la rona buat ida. Imi haluha ona ka?
Foin dadauk Hau silu paun fuan lima fahe ba ema rihun lima, imi tau hamutuk hahaan restu too bote hira?” Sira hataan, “Bote sanulu resin rua.”
Jesus husu tan, “Depois oinsaa ho paun fuan hitu nebee Hau fahe ba ema rihun haat? Imi halibur hamutuk hahaan restu too bote boot hira?” Sira hataan, “Bote boot hitu.”
Jesus dehan ba sira, “Nee mos imi la kompriende nafatin ka?”
Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira baa iha aldeia Betsaida. Too iha nebaa ema balu lori ema matan delek ida ba iha Jesus. Sira husu ba Jesus atu tau liman ba ema nee hodi kura nia.
Jesus kaer ema matan delek nia liman hodi lori nia sai husi aldeia nee. Nia tafui ba ema nee nia matan, depois tau liman ba nia matan hodi husu, “O haree hetan buat ruma ka lae?”
Ema nee hateke ba-mai, depois dehan, “Hau haree hetan ema, maibee hanesan fali ai huun mak lao ba-mai.”
Depois Jesus tau Nia liman ba ema nee nia matan dala ida tan. Ema nee koko atu haree, derepenti nia matan diak fali, i bele haree buat hotu-hotu ho moos.
Jesus haruka ema nee fila ba nia uma. Nia dehan, “O bele fila ona, maibee liu husi dalan seluk. La bele tama ba aldeia Betsaida.”
Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira baa iha aldeia sira nebee besik Sezareia Filipi. Iha dalan klaran, Nia husu ba sira, “Tuir ema konta, Hau nee see?”
Sira hataan, “Ema balu dehan, Ita Boot nee João Sarani Nain. Balu tan dehan, profeta Elias. Seluk tan dehan, profeta ida seluk.”
Jesus husu tan, “Tuir imi rasik, Hau nee see?” Pedro hataan, “Ita Boot nee Mesias, Salvador nebee Maromak promete hori uluk kedas atu haruka mai.”
Jesus bandu sira atu la bele konta sai ba ema ida.
Hotu tiha Jesus foo sai ba Nia eskolante sira katak, Nia, Ema Umanu nia Oan tenki simu terus oi-oin. Nai ulun Judeu sira, nai lulik nia ulun sira ho mestri relijiaun sira sei la simu Nia. Ema sei oho tiha Nia, maibee too iha loron tolu, Nia sei moris fila fali.
Jesus hatete buat nee mo-moos deit. Rona nunee, Pedro dada Jesus ba sorin hodi siak Nia.
Jesus fila oin hodi hateke ba Nia eskolante sira. I Nia siak Pedro dehan, “Satanás, sees tiha husi Hau nia oin! O nia hanoin nee laos mai husi Maromak, maibee mai husi ema nia hanoin.”
Depois Jesus bolu ema barak nebee halibur iha nebaa atu mai besik hamutuk ho Nia eskolante sira. Nia dehan, “See mak hakarak tuir Hau, nia tenki husik tiha nia hakarak rasik, i tenki prontu simu terus, hanesan ema nebee lori nia krus too mate. I nia tenki tuir Hau nafatin.
Tanba see mak hakarak salva nia aan, nia sei lakon fali. I see mak lakon nia moris tanba nia tuir Hau hodi foo sai Liafuan Diak, nia sei hetan moris rohan-laek.
Se ema ida hetan riku-soin mundu nian hotu-hotu, maibee too ikus la hetan moris rohan-laek karik, nia manaan saida loos?
La iha buat ida mak nia bele foo hodi troka fali nia klamar.
Ema agora nee mesak aat deit i la foo laran ba Maromak. Se ema ruma moe atu simu Hau i lakohi simu Hau nia liafuan, aban-bainrua Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan mos sei moe atu rekonhese nia bainhira Hau fila fali mai husi lalehan. Hau sei tuun mai ho Aman Maromak nia kbiit tomak, i Maromak nia anju sira akompanha Hau.”
Jesus hatutan tan dehan, “Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, husi imi sira nee, balu sei moris too haree Maromak ukun ho kbiit boot mak foin sira mate.”
Liu tiha loron neen, Jesus lori Pedro, Tiago ho João, sira mes-mesak baa sae ba foho aas ida. Too iha nebaa, Nia eskolante nain tolu nee haree Jesus nakfilak Aan tiha.
Nia hena mos mutin nabilan tiha. Iha mundu nee, la iha ema ida mak bele halo hena sai mutin nabilan hanesan nee.
Derepenti sira haree profeta Elias ho Moisés koalia hela ho Jesus.
Haree nunee, Pedro dehan ba Jesus, “Mestri, ita hamutuk iha nee, furak. Diak liu ami halo tenda tolu, ida ba Ita Boot, ida ba Moisés, ho ida ba Elias.”
Pedro la hatene atu koalia saida tanba sira nain tolu tauk teb-tebes.
Depois kalohan ida mai falun tiha sira. I lian ida sai husi kalohan nee dehan, “Ida nee Hau nia Oan doben. Imi tenki rona Nia!”
Eskolante nain tolu nee hateke ba-mai, sira la haree ema ida, so Jesus deit.
Hotu tiha Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira tuun fali husi foho. Sira lao tuun dadauk, Jesus bandu dehan, “Saida mak ohin imi haree nee, la bele hatete ba ema ida. Bainhira Maromak halo Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan moris fali husi mate mak foin imi bele foo sai ba ema.”
Buat nebee akontese nee, eskolante sira la foo sai ba ema ida. Maibee sira komesa husu ba malu dehan, “‘Moris fali husi mate’ nee dehan saida?”
Depois sira husu ba Jesus dehan, “Nusaa mak mestri relijiaun sira dehan, Elias tenki mai uluk mak foin Mesias mai?”
Jesus hataan, “Loos duni, Elias sei mai uluk atu prepara buat hotu-hotu. Maski nunee keta haluha, iha Livru Sagradu mos hakerek dehan, Ema Umanu nia Oan tenki hetan terus barak i ema sei fila kotuk ba Nia.
Maibee Hau hatete ba imi, Elias mai tiha ona, i ema halo aat nia tuir sira nia hakarak, hanesan saida mak hakerek ona iha Livru Sagradu.”
Depois Jesus ho Nia eskolante nain tolu nee fila fali ba iha eskolante sira seluk. Too iha nebaa, sira haree ema barak haleu eskolante sira, i mestri relijiaun sira diskuti malu hela ho sira.
Bainhira ema barak nee haree Jesus, sira admira, i sira halai kedas atu baa simu Nia.
Jesus husu sira, “Imi diskuti malu kona ba saida?”
Husi ema barak nee iha mane ida hataan, “Mestri, hau mai lori hau nia oan mane atu hasoru Ita Boot, tanba espiritu aat iha nia laran halo nia la bele koalia.
Kuandu espiritu aat nee ataka ona nia, espiritu nee riba nia ba rai. Labarik nee nia kabeen mutin sai, nia ruun nehan, i nia isin toos tiha. Hau husu tiha ona Ita Boot nia eskolante sira atu duni sai espiritu aat nee, maibee sira la bele.”
Jesus siak sira dehan, “Imi ema nebee la fiar ba Maromak. Hau tenki hela ho imi too bainhira tan? Hau tenki pasiensia ho imi too iha nebee?! Lori labarik nee mai.”
Nunee sira lori labarik nee ba Jesus. Maibee espiritu aat nee foin hetan Jesus, nia riba kedas labarik nee ba rai too labarik nee duir ba duir mai, i kabeen mutin mos sai husi ibun.
Jesus husu ba labarik nia aman, “Hori bainhira mak ita boot nia oan hetan moras hanesan nee?” Nia aman hataan, “Komesa nia sei kiik.
Dala barak espiritu aat nee soe nia ba iha ahi laran, ka halo nia mout iha bee laran, tanba hakarak atu oho nia. Maibee se Ita Boot bele halo buat ruma ba nia, entaun hanoin ami i tulun ami ba!”
Jesus hataan, “Nusaa mak o dehan, ‘se Ita Boot bele’? See mak fiar, buat hotu bele deit.”
Labarik nia aman hataan kedas ho lian makaas, “Hau fiar! Tulun hau atu hametin hau nia fiar nebee fraku nee.”
Jesus haree ema barak liu tan halai ba iha fatin nee. Nunee Nia foo orden ba espiritu aat nee dehan, “Espiritu nebee halo labarik nee tilun diuk ho la bele koalia, Hau haruka o sai ona husi labarik nee! I la bele tama tan iha nia!”
Rona nunee, espiritu aat hakilar makaas i doko labarik nee makaas loos, depois sai tiha husi nia. Labarik nee haree ba hanesan ema mate. Nunee ema barak dehan, “Nia mate tiha ona!”
Maibee Jesus kaer labarik nia liman hodi ajuda nia hamriik. I labarik nee hamriik kedas.
Depois Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira tama fali iha uma ida, Nia eskolante sira husu Nia mes-mesak, “Nusaa mak ami ohin la bele duni sai espiritu aat nee?”
Jesus hataan, “Atu duni sai espiritu aat hanesan ida ohin nee, imi tenki halo orasaun [ho jejun]. Se lae, la bele.”
Hotu tiha Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira husik tiha fatin nee hodi lao liu husi provinsia Galileia. Jesus lakohi atu ema seluk hatene Nia iha nebee,
tanba Nia atu hanorin deit Nia eskolante sira. Nia hatete ba sira, “Aban-bainrua ema sei faan Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan ba ema aat. Sira sei oho Hau, depois iha loron tolu Maromak sei halo Hau moris fali.”
Maibee Nia eskolante sira la kompriende, i sira mos tauk atu husu ba Nia.
Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira too iha sidade Kafarnaum. Sira tama iha uma ida, depois Jesus husu ba Nia eskolante sira dehan, “Ohin ita iha dalan, imi diskuti malu kona ba saida?”
Maibee Nia eskolante sira nonook deit, tanba ohin iha dalan sira diskuti malu kona ba ida nebee mak boot liu.
Jesus tuur, depois bolu Nia eskolante sanulu resin rua nee hamutuk hodi hanorin dehan, “See mak hakarak sai ema boot liu, nia tenki haraik aan sai ema ida nebee kiik liu hodi serbi nia maluk sira seluk hanesan atan.”
Depois Jesus lori labarik ida mai hamriik iha eskolante sira nia klaran, i Nia hakuak labarik nee hodi dehan ba sira,
“See mak simu labarik ida hanesan nee hodi Hau nia naran, nia simu Hau. I see mak simu Hau, nia laos simu Hau deit, maibee nia simu mos Ida nebee haruka Hau mai.”
João foo hatene ba Jesus dehan, “Mestri, ami haree ema ida duni sai diabu hodi Ita Boot nia naran. Ami bandu nia, tanba nia laos ita nia ema.”
Maibee Jesus hataan, “La bele bandu! Tanba la iha ema ida mak halo milagre hodi Hau nia naran depois iha tempu badak nia laran nia hatete aat fali Hau.
Ema nebee la kontra ita, nia hamutuk ho ita.
Hau dehan lo-loos ba imi, see mak foo tulun ba imi tanba imi lori Mesias nia naran, maski nia foo bee kopu ida deit mos, Maromak la haluha nia kolen.”
Jesus hatutan tan dehan, “See mak halo labarik kiik ida monu ba sala too la fiar mai Hau, ema nee sei simu kastigu todan. Ba nia, diak liu ema kesi fatuk boot ida iha nia kakorok depois soe nia tama ba tasi laran! Tanba kastigu nebee nia sei simu todan liu fali ida nee.
Se o nia liman halo o monu ba sala karik, tesi tiha. Diak liu o tama iha lalehan ho liman sorin deit duke o tama ba iha infernu ho liman kompletu.
[Iha nebaa ular nunka mate, i ahi lakan hela deit.]
Se o nia ain halo o monu ba sala karik, tesi tiha. Diak liu o tama iha lalehan ho ain sorin deit duke o tama ba iha infernu ho ain kompletu.
[Iha nebaa ular nunka mate, i ahi lakan hela deit.]
Se o nia matan halo o monu ba sala karik, sukit sai tiha o nia matan nee. Diak liu o tama ba iha Maromak nia reinu ho matan sorin deit duke o tama ba iha infernu ho matan kompletu.
Iha nebaa, ‘ular nunka mate, i ahi lakan hela deit.’
Ema hotu-hotu sei liu husi ahi para sai meer tiha.
Masin nee buat diak ida. Maibee se masin nee sai miis tiha ona karik, ita la bele halo meer fila fali. Imi mos tenki sai meer hanesan masin hodi moris dame malu.”
Jesus sai husi fatin nee hodi baa iha provinsia Judeia ho fat-fatin iha mota Jordaun nia sorin ba. Iha nebaa mos ema barak mai haleu Nia, i Jesus hanorin sira hanesan baibain.
Depois ema balu husi grupu Farizeu mai koko atu hamonu Nia. Sira husu, “Tuir Moisés nia lei, laen soe nia feen, bele ka lae?”
Jesus hataan, “Moisés nia lei hatete saida?”
Sira hataan, “Moisés foo lisensa dehan, laen bele soe nia feen, naran katak nia foo surat deklarasaun soe malu nian.”
Jesus hataan, “Moisés hakerek lei nee tanba imi nia ulun toos.
Maibee fo-foun Maromak halo lalehan ho rai, Maromak ‘halo sira mane ho feto.’
‘Tanba nee, mane sei husik nia inan-aman hodi baa moris neon ida laran ida ho nia feen,
i sira nain rua sai ona ida.’ Entaun sira laos ona ema nain rua, maibee sai ona ida.
Nee duni se Maromak tau feto ho mane hamutuk sai feen-laen ona, ema keta fahe fali.”
Hotu tiha Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira tama fali ba iha uma, depois eskolante sira husu kona ba Nia liafuan ohin nee.
Jesus hataan ba sira dehan, “Se mane soe nia feen hodi hola fali feto seluk, mane nee halo sala seksual hasoru nia feen.
I feto mos hanesan. Se nia soe tiha nia laen hodi hola fali mane seluk, nia mos halo sala seksual.”
Iha loron ida, ema balu mai lori labarik ba Jesus atu Nia tau liman ba sira hodi foo bensaun ba sira. Maibee Jesus nia eskolante sira bandu.
Haree nunee, Jesus siak Nia eskolante sira dehan, “Husik labarik sira nee mai iha Hau, la bele bandu. Tanba ema hanesan labarik sira nee mak sai Maromak nia reinu.
Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, see mak atu sai Maromak nia reinu, nia tenki laran metin ba Maromak hanesan labarik sira nee. Se lae, la bele.”
Jesus hakuak labarik sira nee, i tau liman ba labarik ida-idak nia ulun hodi foo bensaun ba sira.
Jesus foin sai husi fatin nee, ema riku ida halai mai hasoru Jesus. Nia hakruuk iha Jesus nia oin hodi husu, “Mestri nebee diak, hau tenki halo saida para hau bele hetan moris rohan-laek?”
Jesus hataan, “Tanba saa mak ita dehan, Hau ema diak? La iha ema ida mak diak, so Maromak deit.
Ita hatene ona, Nai Maromak nia ukun fuan nebee dehan, ‘La bele oho ema. La bele halo sala ho ema nia feen ka laen. La bele naok. La bele foo testemunhu falsu. La bele han-matak ema nia sasaan. I respeita o nia inan-aman.’ ”
Ema nee hataan, “Mestri, komesa hau sei kiik, ukun fuan sira nee hau halo tuir hotu ona.”
Jesus hateke ba nia ho domin hodi dehan, “Maibee ita sei falta buat ida. Agora baa faan tiha ita nia riku-soin hotu, i osan nee foo ba ema kiak. Nunee mak ita sei hetan fali riku-soin iha lalehan. Fahe hotu tiha, mai tuir Hau.”
Rona nunee, ema nee hatudu nia oin tristi, i nia fila ho laran susar tanba nia riku teb-tebes.
Depois Jesus haree ba-mai, i hatete ba Nia eskolante sira, “Ema riku susar teb-tebes atu sai Maromak nia reinu.”
Rona tiha liafuan nee, Jesus nia eskolante sira hakfodak. Maibee Jesus hatete dala ida tan, “Oan sira, susar teb-tebes atu sai Maromak nia reinu.
Kuda kamelu tama liu husi daun kuak susar teb-tebes. Maibee susar liu tan, ema riku ida atu sai Maromak nia reinu hodi hakruuk ba Nia nudar Liurai.”
Jesus nia eskolante sira admira teb-tebes hodi husu, “Se nunee, see loos mak sei hetan salvasaun?”
Jesus hateke ba sira hodi dehan, “Ba ema, la bele duni. Maibee ba Maromak buat hotu-hotu bele. La iha buat ida mak la bele.”
Pedro dehan, “Ami husik tiha ona buat hotu-hotu hodi tuir Ita Boot.”
Jesus hataan, “Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, Maromak sei foo bensaun ba see-see deit mak husik ona nia uma, nia maun-alin, nia inan-aman, nia oan sira ka nia toos tanba nia tuir Hau i foo sai Liafuan Diak.
Uma, maun-alin, inan, oan ho rai nebee nia husik ona nee, nia sei simu tan dala atus ida iha mundu nee. Nia mos sei hetan terus tanba nia tuir Hau. I bainhira nia husik ona mundu nee, nia sei hetan moris rohan-laek.
Maibee ema barak nebee agora boot sei sai kiik. I ema barak nebee agora kiik sei sai boot.”
Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira lao dadauk sae ba iha Jerusalém. Jesus lao uluk. Nia eskolante sira admira, i ema barak nebee mak lao husi kotuk tauk. Dala ida tan Jesus halibur Nia eskolante nain sanulu resin rua mesak deit hodi foo sai ba sira saida mak atu akontese ba Nia.
Nia hatete, “Rona mai! Ita lao dadauk ba Jerusalém. Too iha nebaa, ema sei entrega Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan ba iha nai lulik nia ulun sira ho mestri relijiaun sira. Ema sira nee sei tesi Hau nia lia katak, Hau tenki hetan kastigu mate. Sira sei entrega Hau ba iha ema nebee la fiar Maromak.
Depois ema sira nee sei hamoe Hau, tafui kabeen mai Hau, baku Hau ho sikoti, i oho Hau. Maibee iha loron tolu Hau sei moris fali.”
Hotu tiha Zebedeu nia oan Tiago ho João baa husu Jesus, “Mestri, ami hakarak Ita Boot halo tuir buat nebee mak ami atu husu nee.”
Jesus husu fali, “Imi hakarak Hau halo saida ba imi?”
Sira hataan, “Ami husu atu aban-bainrua Ita Boot tuur iha naroman lalehan nian, ami nain rua nee, ida tuur iha Ita Boot nia sorin loos, ida seluk tuur iha Ita Boot nia sorin karuk.”
Maibee Jesus hatete ba sira dehan, “Imi la kompriende saida mak imi husu. La kleur tan Hau sei simu susar ho terus todan. Imi mos prontu simu susar ho terus nee ka lae?”
Sira hataan, “Ami prontu.” Jesus hatete ba sira, “Loos duni, imi sei simu duni susar ho terus hanesan Hau.
Maibee Hau la iha direitu atu hili see mak atu tuur iha Hau nia sorin loos ho sorin karuk. Kona ba ida nee, Maromak desidi tiha ona.”
Bainhira eskolante nain sanulu rona buat nebee mak Tiago ho João husu, sira hirus maun-alin nain rua nee.
Entaun Jesus bolu sira hamutuk hodi dehan, “Imi hatene katak, iha nasaun sel-seluk, ema sira nebee hanaran nai ulun, sira manda ema tuun-sae, i ukun nain sira hanehan sira nia povu.
Maibee imi la bele halo hanesan nee. Husi imi sira nee, see mak hakarak sai boot, nia tenki haraik aan hodi serbi nia maluk sira seluk.
See mak hakarak sai ema boot liu, nia tenki sai atan ba ema hotu-hotu hodi serbi sira.
Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan mos mai iha mundu nee laos atu ema serbi Hau. Maibee Hau mai atu serbi ema seluk i foo Aan ba mate atu ema barak hetan liberdade.”
Depois Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira too iha sidade Jerikó. Bainhira sira lao sai fali husi sidade nee, ema barak mos tuir. Iha ema matan delek ida tuur hela iha dalan ninin hodi husu ezmola. Nia naran Bartimeu, nee katak “Timeu nia oan”.
Bainhira nia rona dehan, ema ida liu nee Jesus husi Nazaré, nia komesa bolu ho lian makaas dehan, “Jesus, liurai David nia Jerasaun, hanoin hau ba!”
Ema barak siak nia hodi haruka nia nonook. Maibee nia bolu makaas liu tan dehan, “Liurai David nia Jerasaun, hanoin hau ba!”
Jesus mos para tiha hodi dehan, “Bolu nia mai!” Entaun sira bolu ema matan delek nee dehan, “Keta tauk! Hamriik ba! Mestri bolu o.”
Rona nunee, Bartimeu soe tiha nia hena, hamriik kedas i baa hasoru Jesus.
Jesus husu, “O hakarak Hau halo saida ba o?” Ema matan delek nee hataan, “Mestri, hau hakarak haree.”
Jesus hatete, “O hetan kura tanba o fiar mai Hau. O bele baa ona.” Ema nee nia matan diak kedas. I nia lao tuir Jesus.
Bainhira Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira besik ona sidade Jerusalém, sira too iha aldeia Betfagé ho Betánia iha foho Oliveira nia lolon, Nia haruka Nia eskolante nain rua baa uluk.
Nia dehan ba sira, “Imi baa iha aldeia nebaa. Bainhira imi tama, imi haree kedas kuda buru oan ida kesi hela, ema ida seidauk sae. Kore tiha dada mai.
Se ema ruma husu karik, ‘Nusaa mak imi halo buat nee?’, hatete ba nia, ‘Nai mak presiza.’ Ema nee sei haruka imi dada kedas kuda buru nee.”
Entaun sira nain rua mos baa. Sira hetan kuda buru oan nee kesi hela iha uma oin, iha dalan ibun. Bainhira sira kore dadauk kuda nia talin,
ema balu nebee hamriik hela iha nebaa husu, “Imi halo saida iha nee? Nusaa mak imi kore fali kuda buru nee?”
Sira hataan tuir buat nebee Jesus hatete ona ba sira, depois ema sira nee husik sira lori kuda buru nee.
I sira dada kuda buru nee lori ba Jesus. Too iha nebaa, sira hasai sira nia hena tau ba iha kuda nia kotuk, depois Jesus sae.
Ema barak hasai sira nia hena hodi nahe tu-tuir dalan. Iha mos ema balu taa ramus tahan iha toos hodi nahe tuir dalan.
Ema balu lao uluk iha Jesus nia oin, iha balu lao husi kotuk. Sira hotu haklalak hahii Maromak dehan, “Hosana! Maromak foo bensaun ba Ida nebee mak mai lori Nai Maromak nia naran.
Maromak foo bensaun ba liurai David nia Jerasaun nebee mai atu ukun. Hosana, hahii Nia iha fatin aas liu!”
Jesus tama iha Jerusalém, Nia baa iha uma kreda boot hodi haree buat hotu iha nebaa. Tanba rai atu kalan ona, Nia ho Nia eskolante sanulu resin rua fila fali ba iha Betánia.
Aban fali Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira sai husi Betánia. Iha dalan Jesus hamlaha.
Husi dook Nia haree tiha ona ai figeira huun, nia tahan buras. Nunee Nia baa atu haree ai nee nia fuan iha ka lae. Maibee bainhira too iha ai huun, Nia haree ai fuan ida mos la iha, so tahan deit, tanba laos tempu atu foo fuan.
Jesus hatete ba ai huun nee dehan, “Hahuu agora la iha ema ida mak haan tan o nia fuan.” Nia eskolante sira rona hela liafuan nee.
Depois Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira too iha Jerusalém. Jesus tama iha area uma kreda boot, i duni sai ema sira nebee mak halo kontratu iha fatin nee. Nia baku fila tiha meza nebee mak ema uza hodi troka osan, banku nebee mak ema tuur hodi faan manu pombu mos Nia baku fila hotu.
Nia mos bandu ema atu la bele lori sasaan liu husi area uma kreda boot.
Depois Jesus hanorin ema sira iha nebaa dehan, “Iha Maromak nia liafuan hakerek tiha ona dehan, ‘Hau nia uma nee fatin ba ema husi nasaun hotu-hotu atu halo orasaun.’ Maibee imi halo fali hanesan ema naok-teen sira nia subar fatin.”
Nai lulik nia ulun sira ho mestri relijiaun sira rona saida mak akontese nee. Entaun sira komesa buka dalan atu oho Jesus. Sira tauk Jesus tanba Nia hanorin halo ema barak admira.
Rai besik kalan ona, Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira sai fali husi sidade.
Aban dadeer-saan, Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira liu husi fatin horiseik, sira haree ai figeira nee mate tiha ona, too nia abut maran hotu.
Pedro hanoin fali Jesus nia liafuan nebee natoon Nia hatete ba ai figeira nee, entaun Pedro dehan ba Jesus, “Mestri, haree ba! Ai figeira huun nebee Ita Boot foo malisan nee mate tiha ona.”
Jesus hataan, “Fiar ba Maromak!
Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, see deit mak haruka foho ida nee muda ba iha tasi laran, foho nee sei muda duni. Naran katak nia laran metin ba buat nebee nia husu, i la duvida.
Nee duni Hau hatete ba imi, bainhira imi husu saida deit liu husi orasaun, imi tenki fiar katak imi sei simu. Se imi fiar nunee mak imi sei hetan duni.
Se imi halo orasaun i hanoin hetan ema ruma halo sala hasoru imi, perdua nia sala ba, atu nunee imi nia Aman iha lalehan mos perdua imi nia sala.
[Maibee se imi la perdua ema, imi nia Aman iha lalehan mos sei la perdua imi nia sala.”]
Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira tama fali iha Jerusalém. Jesus lao hela iha area uma kreda boot, nai lulik nia ulun sira, mestri relijiaun sira ho katuas lia nain sira mai hasoru Nia.
Sira husu dehan, “O iha direitu saida para halo buat sira nee? See mak foo direitu nee ba O?”
Jesus hataan, “Hau mos atu husu buat ida. Hataan mai took. Depois mak Hau foo hatene imi, see mak foo direitu mai Hau hodi halo buat sira nee.
Foo hatene took Hau: See mak foo direitu ba João Sarani Nain hodi foo sarani ema? Maromak mak foo ka, ema mak foo?”
Sira diskuti malu dehan, “Ita susar ona. Se ita hataan, ‘Maromak mak foo direitu ba nia,’ Jesus sei husu fali ita dehan, ‘Entaun, nusaa mak imi la fiar ba nia?’
Maibee ita mos la bele dehan, ‘Ema mak foo direitu.’ ” Sira dehan nunee tanba sira tauk povu, tanba povu sira hanoin dehan, João nee Maromak nia profeta ida duni.
Nunee sira hataan dehan, “Ami la hatene.” Jesus dehan ba sira, “Se nunee, Hau mos la hatete ba imi, see mak foo direitu mai Hau hodi halo buat sira nee.”
Jesus koalia nafatin ho nai lulik nia ulun sira, mestri relijiaun sira, ho katuas lia nain sira. Nia halo komparasaun nunee: “Iha toos nain ida kuda uvas iha nia toos ida tomak. Nia halo lutu haleu tiha toos nee, i kee rai kuak halo tanki ida atu hasai uvas been. Nia mos harii fatin aas ida ba seguransa sira atu hein toos nee. Hotu tiha, nia foo ba ema aluga, depois nia baa hela iha rai liur.
Too tempu kuu uvas, toos nain haruka nia baa simu ninia parte husi ema nebee mak aluga toos.
Maibee sira kaer nia, baku nia, i duni nia fila ho liman mamuk.
Depois toos nain haruka tan nia atan ida baa. Maibee sira baku kanek nia ulun, i tarata nia.
Toos nain haruka tan atan ida seluk, maibee ida nee sira oho tiha. Toos nain haruka nafatin nia atan sel-seluk, balu sira baku i balu sira oho.
Too ikus la iha tan ema ida mak nia bele haruka baa foti nia parte, hela deit nia oan mane nebee nia hadomi. Entaun nia haruka nia oan nee baa. Nia hanoin dehan, ‘Sira sei respeita hau nia oan.’
Maibee bainhira toos nain nia oan too iha nebaa, ema aluga toos nee dehan ba malu, ‘Nia mak sei hetan nia aman nia riku-soin tomak. Diak liu ita oho tiha nia, atu toos nee sai ita nian fali.’
Nunee sira kaer nia, oho nia, depois rasta nia mate isin sai husi toos laran.”
Konta hotu tiha, Jesus husu ba nai ulun relijiaun sira dehan, “Agora, toos nain sei halo saida? Nia sei baa oho tiha sira hotu, depois foo fali toos nee ba ema seluk aluga.
Iha Livru Sagradu kompara Mesias hanesan fatuk ida. Imi nunka lee ka? Iha nebaa dehan, ‘Iha fatuk ida nebee badaen fatuk sira lakohi uza, maibee agora fatuk nee mak sai fali fatuk nebee prinsipal.
Nai Maromak rasik mak hili fatuk nee, ita haree ba furak teb-tebes.’ ”
Nai ulun relijiaun sira rona komparasaun nee, sira hatene katak Jesus konta istoria nee hodi hatudu sira nia sala. Nunee sira buka dalan atu kaer Nia, maibee sira tauk ema lubun boot nee, entaun sira husik Nia sai husi fatin nee.
Hotu tiha nai ulun relijiaun sira haruka ema Farizeu balu ho partidu Herodes nia membru balu baa hasoru Jesus hodi husu pergunta oi-oin ho intensaun atu hamonu Nia.
Too iha Jesus, sira husu, “Mestri, ami hatene katak Ita Boot ema nebee mak moris loos. Ita Boot la preokupa ema seluk nia hanoin, tanba Ita Boot la fihir ema. Ita Boot sempre hanorin ho loos kona ba Maromak nia hakarak. Ami nia pergunta mak nee: Tuir ita nia lei relijiaun, ita selu impostu ba liurai boot César, nee loos ka la loos? Ita tenki selu ka lae?”
Maibee Jesus hatene katak sira koalia oin ida hahalok oin seluk, nunee Nia dehan ba sira, “Nusaa mak imi hakarak hamonu Hau? Lori took osan mutin ida mai Hau haree.”
Sira lori osan mutin ida foo ba Jesus, i Nia husu ba sira, “See nia oin mak iha osan nee? I see nia naran?” Sira hataan, “Liurai boot César nian.”
Jesus hatete ba sira, “Entaun foo ba estadu buat nebee mak estadu nian, i foo ba Maromak buat nebee mak Maromak nian.” Rona nunee, sira admira.
Depois ema husi grupu Saduseu mos mai koko Jesus. Ema Saduseu sira hanorin dehan, ema mate sei la moris fali. Entaun sira husu ba Jesus,
“Mestri, Moisés hakerek lei ida rai hela mai ita dehan nunee: Se mane ida mate husik hela nia kaben, maibee la iha oan, mane nia alin tenki kaben fali ho feto faluk nee, para bele foo jerasaun ba nia maun.
Entaun, hanesan nee: Uluk iha maun-alin nain hitu. Maun boot kaben, depois nia mate, la iha oan.
Entaun nia alin ida tuir nia nee, kaben fali ho feto faluk nee. La kleur nia mos mate, la iha oan. Nunee mos ho nia alin tuir mai. Nia kaben ho feto faluk nee, maibee nia mate, la iha oan.
Nunee nafatin too nain hitu nee mate hotu, la iha oan. Ikus liu feto nee mos mate.
Agora ami husu nunee: Feto nee kaben ho mane nain hitu. Aban-bainrua Maromak halo moris fali ema mate, feto nee nia kaben mak ida nebee loos?”
