Tanba iha loron nee, Maromak sei foo kastigu hodi kumpri buat nebee Nia profeta sira hakerek ona hori uluk.
Iha tempu nee, feto isin rua ho inan sira nebee foo susu nia oan, sei terus teb-tebes. Iha nasaun nee tomak, ema sei hetan terus boot, tanba Maromak fakar Nia hirus ba povu nee.
Inimigu sei oho sira balu, i lori sai balu baa kastigu iha nasaun sel-seluk. I ema husi rai liur nebee la fiar Maromak sei mai sama hanehan povu Jerusalém, too tempu nebee Maromak desidi ba sira nee remata.”
Jesus hatutan tan dehan, “Sei iha sinal iha loro matan, iha fulan, ho iha fitun. Iha mundu nee mos, tasi siak i laloran boot baku ba-mai, halo ema iha nasaun hotu-hotu laran susar, too sira hanoin la hetan.
Fitun hotu-hotu sei nakdoko halai rungu-ranga. Haree nunee, ema sei tauk too dezmaia, tanba sira hatene dezastre boot atu mosu ona iha mundu tomak.
Depois mak sira haree Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan tuun mai iha kalohan laran, ho kbiit boot ho naroman lalehan nian.
Kuandu sinal sira nee hahuu akontese, hamriik metin ho laran haksolok ba, tanba tempu besik ona atu Maromak salva imi.”
Depois Jesus halo komparasaun ida dehan, “Imi hanoin took ai figeira ho ai huun sira seluk.
Kuandu ai nee dikin ona, nee sinal katak, atu tama ona tempu manas.
Nunee mos bainhira imi haree buat sira nee akontese, imi hatene katak, tempu besik ona atu Maromak ukun nudar Liurai.
Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, husi ema hotu nebee mak moris iha tempu nee, iha balu sei moris too buat sira nee hotu akontese.
Lalehan ho rai sei remata, maibee Hau nia liafuan sei la remata.”
Jesus hatutan tan dehan, “Kuidadu di-diak! Keta moris festa hela deit, keta sai lanu-teen, i keta preokupa liu ba imi nia moris loro-loron. Se lae, aban-bainrua Hau fila fali mai, imi neon beik hanesan fali animal fuik ida nebee lao-lao, hakfodak mai tama tiha iha lasu laran.
Tanba bainhira Hau fila fali mai, la iha ema ida iha mundu mak bele sees aan.
Nee duni atensaun beibeik, i sempre halo orasaun, atu imi bele liu husi susar nee ho diak. Nunee too ikus imi sei la tauk hamriik iha Ema Umanu nia Oan nia oin.”
Loro-loron Jesus baa hanorin iha uma kreda boot. Maibee kalan Nia sai husi Jerusalém baa toba iha foho Oliveira.
Dadeer-saan rai huun mutin, ema barak lao ba iha uma kreda boot para rona Nia hanorin.
Festa Paun la Tau Fermentu besik ona, festa nee hanaran mos Paskua.
Momentu nee, nai lulik nia ulun sira ho mestri relijiaun sira buka hela dalan atu oho Jesus, maibee oho subar deit, tanba sira tauk, se povu hatene, bele halo rungu-ranga.
Depois Satanás tama iha Judas nia laran. Judas nee Jesus nia eskolante ida husi sira nain sanulu resin rua, ema mos bolu nia Iscariotes.
Entaun Judas baa buka nai lulik nia ulun sira ho uma kreda boot nia xefi seguransa sira hodi kombina para faan Jesus ba sira.
Nia planu nee halo sira kontenti teb-tebes, i sira promete atu foo osan ba nia.
Judas mos konkorda. Nunee nia komesa buka dalan atu entrega nonook Jesus ba sira, atu povu la bele hatene.
Too ona Festa Paun la Tau Fermentu. Iha loron nee, ema Judeu tenki oho bibi malae oan para kalan nee bele selebra festa Paskua.
Entaun Jesus haruka Pedro ho João dehan, “Imi nain rua baa uluk halo preparasaun para orsida ita bele haan hamutuk hodi selebra festa Paskua.”
Sira husu, “Ita Boot hakarak ami baa prepara iha nebee?”
Jesus hataan, “Bainhira imi tama ba iha sidade Jerusalém, imi sei hasoru mane ida lori hela sanan rai ho bee iha laran. Imi tuir deit nia too nia tama ba iha uma ida.
Too iha uma, husu ba uma nain nunee: ‘Mestri husu kona ba fatin nebee mak prepara ona ba Nia atu haan hamutuk ho Nia eskolante sira hodi selebra festa Paskua. Fatin nee iha nebee?’
Depois uma nain sei hatudu salaun ida iha uma andar leten, nia prepara tiha ona fatin nee. Hela deit imi nain rua baa prepara hahaan iha nebaa.”
Nunee sira nain rua baa, hetan buat hotu-hotu tuir lo-loos saida mak Jesus hatete ba sira. I sira halo preparasaun ba festa Paskua iha nebaa.
Oras too ona, Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira tuur haleu meza atu haan hamutuk.
Jesus dehan ba sira, “Hau hakarak teb-tebes haan hamutuk ho imi iha festa Paskua nee, molok Hau terus.
Tanba Hau sei la haan tan hahaan Paskua nian too Maromak ukun iha mundu foun hodi halo festa nee nia signifikadu sai realidade.”
Depois Jesus foti tua kopu ida hodi foo agradese ba Maromak. I Nia foo tua nee ba sira hodi dehan, “Simu ba, imi ida-idak hemu.
Hau hatete ba imi, Hau sei la hemu tan tua too Maromak ukun nudar Liurai iha mundu foun.”
Depois Nia foti paun hodi agradese ba Maromak. Nia silu paun nee fahe ba Nia eskolante sira hodi hatete, “Nee Hau nia isin, Hau foo hodi salva imi. Halo hanesan nee nafatin hodi hanoin Hau.”
Bainhira sira haan hotu ona, Jesus foti tan tua kopu ida hodi dehan, “Tua nee hatudu Maromak nia promesa foun nebee Nia halo liu husi Hau nia raan, tanba Hau nia raan nee sei fakar hodi salva imi.
Maibee iha ema ida haan hamutuk hela ho Hau iha meza nee mak sei faan Hau.
Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan tenki mate duni tuir Maromak nia planu. Maibee ema nebee faan Hau nee, sei terus teb-tebes.”
Rona nunee, Jesus nia eskolante sira komesa husu ba malu, see mak atu halo buat aat nee.
Depois Jesus nia eskolante sira komesa haksesuk malu kona ba eskolante ida nebee mak boot liu.
Maibee Jesus dehan ba sira, “Iha nasaun sel-seluk, liurai sira manda sira nia reinu tuun-sae. Maski nunee sira hakarak para povu bolu sira dehan, ‘Liurai laran luak’.
Maibee imi la bele nunee. See mak boot liu, nia tenki sai hanesan ema nebee kiik liu. I ema nebee ukun, tenki sai hanesan atan hodi serbi ema seluk.
Hanoin took. Ida nebee mak boot liu: ema nebee tuur haan iha meza ka, ida nebee serbi nia? Ida nebee tuur haan iha meza mak boot. Maibee Hau iha imi nia leet hanesan ema nebee serbi.
Bainhira Hau iha susar nia laran, imi mak hamutuk ho Hau.
Hau nia Aman foti ona Hau sai Liurai para ukun. Nunee mos, agora Hau foti imi para ukun,
atu nunee aban-bainrua Hau ukun Hau nia reinu, imi bele tuur iha meza hodi haan-hemu hamutuk ho Hau. I imi mos sei tuur iha kadeira ukun hodi ukun Israel nia suku sanulu resin rua hotu.”
Jesus hatete ba Simão Pedro, “Simão, Simão, Satanás simu ona lisensa atu koko imi. Nia hakarak haketak imi husi Hau, hanesan ema tahek foos para hasai nia kulit.
Maibee Simão, Hau halo ona orasaun ba o, atu o nia fiar la bele lakon. I bainhira o fila fali mai Hau, o tenki hametin o nia maluk sira nia laran.”
Pedro hataan, “Lae, Nai! Hau prontu tama kadeia hamutuk ho Ita Boot. Atu mate hamutuk ho Ita Boot mos, hau prontu.”
Maibee Jesus hataan fali dehan, “Pedro, rona mai. Orsida molok manu kokoreek, o sei nega Hau dala tolu dehan, o la konhese Hau.”
Depois Jesus husu ba Nia eskolante sira, “Uluk Hau haruka imi baa foo sai Hau nia Liafuan Diak, Hau hatete para imi la bele lori osan, pasta, ho sandalias rezerva. Iha tempu nebaa imi falta buat ruma ka?” Sira hataan, “Lae, ami la falta buat ida.”
Jesus dehan, “Maibee agora oin seluk. Se imi iha osan, lori ho. Se iha pasta, lori mos. Se la iha surik, faan tiha imi nia faru ida hodi sosa.
Tanba uluk Maromak nia profeta hakerek hanesan nee kona ba Hau: ‘Ema konsidera Nia hanesan ema nebee halo krimi.’ Agora tenki sai realidade. Tebes, buat nebee hakerek kona ba Hau nee besik akontese ona.”
Sira dehan, “Nai, ami iha surik rua.” Jesus hataan, “Too ona, lalika koalia tan ona.”
Hotu tiha, Jesus sai husi sidade baa iha foho Oliveira, hanesan baibain. Nia eskolante sira akompanha Nia.
Too iha nebaa, Nia dehan ba sira, “Imi tenki halo orasaun atu imi la bele monu ba tentasaun.”
Depois Jesus sees aan uitoan husi sira, i Nia hakneak hodi halo orasaun dehan,
“Hau nia Aman, se Ita Boot hakarak, hasai tiha terus ida nee husi Hau. Maibee la bele halo tuir Hau nia hakarak, halo tuir deit Ita Boot nia hakarak.”
[Anju ida mai husi lalehan hodi foo forsa ba Nia.
Jesus laran susar teb-tebes, nee mak Nia halo orasaun makaas liu tan, too Nia kosar sai turu ba rai hanesan raan.]
Harohan tiha hotu, Jesus hamriik hodi fila fali ba Nia eskolante sira, Nia haree sira toba dukur hela, tanba sira nia laran tristi halo sira kole liu.
Jesus hatete ba sira, “Nusaa mak imi toba? Hadeer ona hodi halo orasaun atu imi la bele monu ba tentasaun.”
Jesus sei koalia hela, Judas, eskolante ida husi sira nain sanulu resin rua nee, mai lori ema barak. Nia besik baa hodi rei Jesus.
Maibee Jesus hatete, “Judas, o rei Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan, para faan Hau ka?”
Kuandu Jesus nia eskolante sira seluk hatene saida mak atu akontese, sira husu ba Jesus, “Nai, ami bele hasoru sira ho surik ka?”
Depois eskolante ida tesi kotu tiha ema ida nia tilun sorin loos. Ema kanek nee nai lulik boot nia atan.
Maibee Jesus hatete, “Para ona!” Depois Nia kaer atan nee nia tilun hodi halo tomak fali.
Ema sira nebee mai atu kaer Jesus nee mak nai lulik Judeu nia ulun sira, xefi seguransa sira iha uma kreda boot, ho katuas lia nain sira. Jesus husu ba sira, “Nusaa mak imi mai lori surik ho ai dona? Imi hanoin Hau ema kriminozu ka?
Loro-loron Hau iha hela area uma kreda boot nian, hanesan mos imi, i imi la kaer Hau. Maibee agora imi nia tempu, i forsa nakukun nian mak ukun.”
Depois sira kaer Jesus, i lori Nia ba iha nai lulik boot nia uma. Pedro lao tu-tuir husi dook deit.
Iha uma oin ema balu sunu ahi hodi haneruk, i Pedro mos baa tuur hamutuk ho sira.
Iha kriada ida haree Pedro tuur hela besik ahi. Kriada nee baa fihir di-diak Pedro nia oin, depois hatete, “Ema ida nee hamutuk ho Jesus!”
Maibee Pedro nega dehan, “Lae, menina! Hau la konhese Nia.”
La kleur ema ida tan haree Pedro, i dehan, “O nee Nia ema duni!” Maibee Pedro dehan, “Lae, maun! Laos hau.”
Liu tiha oras ida hanesan nee, iha tan ema ida hatete dehan, “Ema nee hamutuk ho Jesus duni. La iha duvida, tanba nia mos ema Galileia.”
Maibee Pedro nega dehan, “Maun, hau la hatene saida mak ita koalia nee.” Pedro sei koalia nunee, derepenti manu kokoreek.
Nai Jesus fila ba kotuk hodi hateke loos ba Pedro. I Pedro hanoin fali Nai Jesus nia liafuan ohin dehan, “Orsida molok manu kokoreek, o sei nega Hau dala tolu.”
Entaun Pedro sai husi nebaa hodi tanis ho laran dodok.
Ema sira nebee hein Jesus nee komesa hamoe Nia i baku Nia fila-fila.
Sira kesi tiha Nia matan ho hena hodi goza Nia dehan, “He, profeta, siik took ba, see mak baku o nee?”
I sira mos hatete liafuan aat oi-oin hodi tarata Nia.
Dadeer-saan, loro matan foin sae, justisa nain relijiaun Judeu nian halibur malu. Sira nee mak katuas lia nain sira, nai lulik nia ulun sira ho mestri relijiaun sira. Depois ema nebee hein Jesus lori Nia baa aprezenta ba sira para tesi Nia lia.
Justisa nain sira husu ba Nia, “Hatete mai, O mak Mesias ka?” Jesus hataan, “Se Hau hatete ba imi, imi sei la fiar.
Se Hau husu ba imi, imi sei la hataan.
Maibee la kleur tan Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan sei tuur iha Maromak Kbiit Nain nia sorin loos.”
Rona nunee, sira rame-rame husu fali, “Entaun, O Maromak nia Oan ka?” Jesus hataan, “Imi dehan nee loos.”
Depois sira dehan ba malu, “Ita la presiza tan sasin ona. Ita rona ona, Nia liafuan rasik mak hamonu Nia.”
Depois justisa nain sira hotu hamriik hodi lori Jesus ba governador Pilatus.
Too iha governador nia oin, sira komesa foo sala ba Jesus dehan, “Ami kaer toman Ema nee tau lia ba povu para kontra estadu. Nia haruka povu la bele selu impostu ba liurai boot César. Nia mos deklara katak, Nia mak Mesias, ema Judeu sira nia Liurai.”
Entaun Pilatus husu ba Jesus, “Loos ka? O mak ema Judeu sira nia Liurai duni ka?” Jesus hataan, “Ita dehan nee loos.”
Depois Pilatus foo sai nia desizaun ba nai lulik nia ulun sira ho ema lubun boot nee dehan, “Hau la hetan Ema nee nia sala ida atu bele kastigu Nia.”
Maibee sira ulun toos nafatin hodi protesta dehan, “Lae, Nia hanorin hodi tau lia ba povu iha nebee-nebee atu halo rungu-ranga, komesa husi provinsia Galileia, too iha rai Judeia tomak, mai too iha nee.”
Rona nunee, governador Pilatus husu ba sira, “Se hanesan nee, Nia ema Galileia ka?”
Sira hataan dehan, loos. Nunee governador haruka Jesus ba iha liurai Herodes, tanba nia mak ukun iha provinsia Galileia, i tempu nebaa nia iha hela sidade Jerusalém.
Bainhira Herodes haree Jesus, nia kontenti teb-tebes, tanba kleur ona hakarak atu hasoru Nia. Herodes rona ona istoria barak kona ba Jesus, i hakarak atu haree Nia halo milagre ruma.
Entaun Herodes husu pergunta oi-oin ba Jesus, maibee Nia la hataan liafuan ida.
Nai lulik nia ulun sira ho mestri relijiaun sira mos hamriik besik hodi duun makaas dehan, Nia halo ona sala todan oi-oin.
Depois liurai Herodes ho nia soldadu sira komesa hamoe Jesus i goza Nia. Sira foo hatais Nia ho ropa nabilan ida nebee baibain liurai sira mak hatais, depois haruka Nia fila ba governador Pilatus.
Uluk Herodes ho Pilatus odi malu, maibee iha loron nee sira nain rua diak malu fali.
Governador Pilatus halibur nai lulik nia ulun sira, ukun nain sira ho tan povu.
Depois nia foo sai nia desizaun dehan, “Imi lori Ema nee mai hau hodi foo sala ba Nia dehan, Nia sempre tau lia ba povu para kontra estadu. Maibee hau investiga tiha ona Nia iha imi nia oin, i la hetan Nia sala ida atu bele kastigu Nia.
Liurai Herodes mos la hetan Nia sala ida. Tanba nee mak liurai haruka Nia fila fali mai ita. Imi haree ona, Ema nee la halo sala ida atu hau bele foo kastigu mate ba Nia.
Tanba nee mak hau hakotu nunee: Hau sei haruka baku Nia ho sikoti, depois husik fali Nia.”
[Iha tempu nebaa bainhira ema Judeu sira halo festa Paskua, governador sempre hasai ema dadur ida tuir sira nia hakarak.]
Entaun sira hotu hakilar rame-rame dehan, “Oho tiha Nia! Hasai mak Barabás!”
Barabás nee tama kadeia tanba nia halo rungu-ranga iha sidade Jerusalém kontra estadu Roma, i nia mos oho ema.
Pilatus hakarak husik Jesus. Entaun nia koalia ba sira dala ida tan.
Maibee sira hotu hakilar dehan, “Prega tiha Nia ba krus! Prega tiha Nia ba krus!”
Pilatus koalia ba sira ba dala tolu dehan, “Tansaa? Nia halo krimi saida? Hau la hetan razaun ida para hau bele foo kastigu mate ba Nia. Nee mak hau haruka ema baku deit Nia ho sikoti, depois husik fila fali.”
Maibee ema barak nee hakilar beibeik ho lian makaas hodi obriga para prega Jesus iha krus too mate. Ikus mai, sira mak manaan.
Entaun Pilatus desidi tuir sira nia hakarak deit.
Nia hasai ema nebee mak sira husu, ida nebee dadur hela tanba halo rungu-ranga kontra estadu i oho ema. I nia entrega Jesus ba sira nia liman atu halo tuir sira nia hakarak.
Depois soldadu sira lori Jesus sai husi governador Pilatus nia uma. Iha dalan klaran sira hasoru ema ida naran Simão husi Sirene, nia foin mai husi foho atu tama ba sidade. Sira obriga Simão lori Jesus nia krus hodi lao tuir Nia.
Ema barak lao tuir Jesus, i senhora balu tanis halerik ba Nia.
Jesus fila oin ba sira hodi dehan, “Senhora Jerusalém oan sira, lalika tanis mai Hau. Diak liu tanis halerik ba imi nia aan rasik, i tanis ba imi nia oan sira.
Tanba aban-bainrua susar boot sei kona imi too ema dehan, ‘Feto nebee sorti mak sira nebee la iha oan, sira nebee nunka kous i nunka foo susu bebee.’
Bainhira susar nee mai, ema sei halerik ba foho dehan, ‘Monu hanehan ona ami ba!’ Sira sei dehan ba foho kiik sira, ‘Hakoi tiha ami ba!’
Se ai nebee matak mos ahi haan, saa tan ai nebee maran tiha ona.”
Bainhira soldadu sira lori Jesus, sira lori mos kriminozu nain rua para kastigu mate hamutuk ho Nia.
Too iha fatin ida naran Ulun Ruin, sira prega Jesus ba iha krus. Sira prega mos kriminozu nain rua nee, ida iha Jesus nia sorin loos, ida iha Nia sorin karuk.
[Jesus halo orasaun dehan, “Hau nia Aman, perdua ema sira nee nia sala, tanba sira la hatene saida mak sira halo.”] Depois soldadu sira dada rifa atu hatene see mak bele hetan Jesus nia hena.
Ema barak hamriik hela hodi haree. I ema Judeu nia boot sira tarata Jesus dehan, “Nia salva ona ema seluk. Se Nia mak Mesias, Ida nebee mak Maromak hili, entaun husik Nia salva Nia Aan rasik.”
Soldadu sira mos besik Jesus hodi goza Nia. Sira lolo tua siin ba Nia
hodi dehan, “Se O mak ema Judeu nia liurai, salva O nia Aan ba!”
Sira prega ai kabelak ida ba krus iha Jesus nia ulun leten. Iha ai kabelak nee hakerek dehan, “Nee ema Judeu sira nia Liurai.”
Kriminozu ida nebee prega hela iha Jesus nia sorin mos hatete aat Jesus dehan, “O mak Mesias ka? Entaun, salva O nia Aan, salva mos ami!”
Maibee kriminozu ida seluk siak nia dehan, “O la tauk Maromak ka? O simu kastigu mate hanesan mos Nia.
Ita nain rua merese duni simu kastigu nee, tanba ita nia hahalok aat. Maibee Ema nee la halo sala buat ida.”
Depois nia dehan, “Jesus, bainhira Ita Boot kaer ona ukun nudar Liurai, hanoin hau ba.”
Jesus hataan, “Hau promete ba o, ohin loron kedas o sei hamutuk ho Hau iha fatin furak nian.”
Iha meudia, nakukun komesa taka metin rejiaun nee tomak too tuku tolu lokraik,
tanba loro matan la foo naroman tiha. Iha uma kreda boot iha kurtina boot ida hodi haketak Fatin nebee Lulik Liu. Derepenti deit kurtina nee naklees fahe ba rua.
Jesus harohan ho lian makaas dehan, “Hau nia Aman, Hau entrega Hau nia klamar ba Ita Boot nia liman.” Koalia tiha nunee, Nia iis mos kotu.
Komandante Roma haree buat nebee mak akontese, i nia hahii Maromak dehan, “Tebes duni! Ema nee Ema ida nebee moris loos.”
Ema hotu-hotu nebee ohin mai asisti nee, sira haree saida mak akontese, i sira fila ba uma ho laran tristi liu.
Maibee senhora sira nebee uluk tuir Jesus husi Galileia too iha Jerusalém, sira sei hamriik hela husi dook hodi haree. Nunee mos Nia maluk sira seluk.
Iha ema ida naran José, husi sidade Arimateia iha provinsia Judeia, hakarak atu hakoi Jesus nia mate isin. Nia ema ida nebee diak i moris loos, i nia hein hela Maromak atu ukun nudar Liurai. José mos membru tribunal relijiaun Judeu nian, maibee nia la konkorda ho nia kolega sira nia desizaun hodi kastigu mate Jesus.
<range>
Entaun nia baa hasoru governador Pilatus hodi husu lisensa atu hatuun Jesus nia mate isin husi krus.
Hetan tiha lisensa, José baa hatuun Jesus nia mate isin. Depois nia falun ho hena mutin diak nian. Hotu tiha nia lori baa haloot iha rate. Fatin nee fatuk lolon nebee ema bahat tiha ona atu sai rate, maibee seidauk iha ema ida hakoi iha laran.
Momentu nee Sesta lokraik ona, besik atu tama ona ba loron Sabadu, ema Judeu nia loron deskansa.
Senhora sira nebee akompanha Jesus husi Galileia, sira lao tuir José too iha rate. Sira haree rate nee i haree José latan Jesus nia mate isin ba.
Hotu tiha, sira fila ba uma hodi prepara ai been morin ho mina morin oi-oin. Too iha loron Sabadu, sira deskansa tuir lei.
Iha loron Domingu dadeer-saan nakukun, senhora sira nee fila fali ba iha Jesus nia rate. Sira lori ai been morin ho mina morin nebee sira prepara tiha ona atu tau ba Jesus nia isin.
Too iha nebaa, sira haree fatuk boot nebee hodi taka rate ibun, ema duir tiha ona ba ninin.
Entaun sira tama ba rate laran, maibee sira la hetan Nai Jesus nia mate isin.
Sira bilaan tiha hodi hanoin hela buat nee. Derepenti deit mane nain rua hatais hena nabilan hanesan rai lakan hamriik hela iha sira nia sorin.
Senhora sira nee tauk teb-tebes, i hakruuk too rai iha sira nia oin. Ema nain rua nee husu, “Nusaa mak imi mai buka ema moris iha ema mate sira nia fatin?
Nia la iha nee ona. Nia moris fali ona! Keta haluha buat nebee Nia hatete ba imi bainhira Nia sei hamutuk ho imi iha Galileia.
Nia foo hatene kedas ona dehan, ema sei faan Ema Umanu nia Oan ba iha ema aat sira nia liman, i sei prega Nia iha krus too mate. Maibee iha loron tolu Nia sei moris fila fali.”
Rona nunee, sira foin hanoin hetan Jesus nia liafuan uluk nee.
Depois sira fila husi rate hodi konta buat sira nee hotu ba apostolu nain sanulu resin ida ho ema sira seluk nebee tuir Nia.
Senhora sira nebee baa iha rate nee mak Maria Madalena, Joana, Tiago nia inan Maria, ho mos feto seluk tan. Sira konta buat sira nee ba apostolu sira.
Maibee apostolu sira la fiar, sira hanoin dehan senhora sira koalia nar-naran deit.
Maski nunee Pedro hamriik lalais hodi halai ba rate. Too iha nebaa, nia hakruuk hodi hateke ba rate laran, maibee nia so haree deit hena mutin nebee ohin falun mate nee. Nia fila ba uma hodi hanoin hela kona ba saida mak akontese.
Iha loron nee kedas, Jesus nia eskolante nain rua sai husi Jerusalém atu baa iha aldeia ida naran Emaus. Aldeia nee kala kilometru sanulu resin ida husi Jerusalém.
Tuir dalan, sira koalia dadauk kona ba buat hotu-hotu nebee foin akontese nee.
Sira koalia namanas hela, Jesus rasik toman sira hodi lao hamutuk ho sira.
Maibee sira la konhese katak, nee Jesus, tanba Maromak taka tiha sira nia hanoin.
Depois Jesus husu ba sira, “Ohin iha dalan, imi koalia saida?” Sira nain rua hamriik iha fatin hodi hatudu oin tristi loos.
Ida naran Cleopas dehan ba Jesus, “Husi ema hotu-hotu nebee mai vizita Jerusalém nee, karik Ita Boot mesak deit mak la hatene buat nebee mak foin akontese dadauk nee.”
Jesus husu fali, “Buat saida?” Sira hataan, “Buat nebee mak akontese ba Jesus husi Nazaré. Nia Maromak nia Profeta, Nia halo milagre boot i Nia liafuan mos hatudu katak Nia iha kbiit. Maromak rasik konsidera Nia Profeta boot, saa tan povu.
Maibee nai lulik nia ulun sira ho ita nia ukun nain sira entrega fali Nia ba governador para kastigu mate Nia. Depois sira prega tiha Nia iha krus too mate.
Uluk ami laran metin katak, Nia mak atu foo liberdade ba povu Israel. Maibee agora buat sira nee akontese loron tolu liu ba ona.
Agora ami sai bilaan liu tan. Tanba ohin dadeer-saan senhora balu husi ami nia grupu baa iha rate,
maibee sira la hetan Jesus nia mate isin. Depois sira fila hodi konta mai ami dehan, sira haree anju, i anju sira nee hatete katak, Jesus moris fali ona.
Nunee ami nia kolega balu halai kedas ba rate. Too iha rate, sira haree katak, buat nebee senhora sira ohin konta nee, loos duni. Sira mos la haree Jesus.”
Jesus hatete ba sira, “Imi ulun toos duni! Nusaa mak imi la fiar nafatin liafuan sira nebee Maromak nia profeta sira foo sai ona hori uluk?!
Sira hakerek dehan, Mesias tenki terus hanesan nee duni, foin Maromak foti aas Nia.”
Depois Jesus esplika ba sira kona ba buat hotu-hotu nebee hakerek ona iha Livru Sagradu kona ba Nia Aan, komesa husi Moisés nia livru, too iha profeta sira seluk.
Bainhira sira besik too ona iha Emaus, Jesus halo finji lao ba oin nafatin.
Maibee sira nain rua dehan, “Husu boot, Senhor deskansa lai ho ami kalan nee, tanba lokraik ona, loro matan atu besik monu ona.” Entaun Jesus tama hamutuk ho sira ba uma laran.
Bainhira sira tuur iha meza atu haan, Jesus foti paun, i foo agradese ba Maromak. Depois Nia silu paun nee halo rohan-rohan hodi foo ba sira nain rua.
Momentu nee kedas Maromak loke sira nia hanoin, i sira hatene katak, ema nee Jesus. Maibee derepenti deit Nia lakon tiha husi sira nia oin.
Sira konta ba malu, “Ohin iha dalan Nia koalia ho ita hodi esplika Livru Sagradu, ita nia laran haksolok teb-tebes.”
Sira nain rua mos hamriik kedas hodi fila ba Jerusalém. Too iha nebaa, sira hasoru malu ho apostolu nain sanulu resin ida ho sira seluk nebee halibur hamutuk hela.
Ema sira nee hatete ba sira nain rua, “Loos duni! Nai Jesus moris fali ona! Ohin Nia hatudu Aan ba Simão Pedro.”
Depois sira nain rua mos konta buat nebee akontese iha dalan, too sira konhese Jesus bainhira Nia silu paun.
Sira sei koalia hela nunee, derepenti deit Jesus rasik hamriik iha sira nia klaran. Nia kumprimenta sira dehan, “Maromak foo pas ba imi!”
Sira hakfodak ho tauk teb-tebes, tanba sira hanoin katak, Nia nee mate klamar ida.
Maibee Jesus dehan, “Nusaa mak imi tauk? Nusaa mak imi laran ru-rua?
Haree took Hau nia liman ho ain. Hau rasik mak nee! Lolo liman hodi kaer rasik ba, para imi bele hatene katak, Hau laos mate klamar. Tanba mate klamar la iha isin ho ruin, maibee imi haree ona, Hau iha duni isin ho ruin.”
Koalia tiha hotu, Jesus mos hatudu Nia liman ho ain ba sira.
Sira seidauk fiar, tanba sira haksolok demais ho admira. Entaun Jesus husu ba sira, “Hahaan ruma iha karik, foo uitoan mai.”
Sira foo ikan tunu pedasuk ida.
Jesus simu tiha ikan nee hodi haan iha sira nia oin.
Hotu tiha Jesus dehan ba sira, “Uluk Hau sei hamutuk ho imi, Hau hatete hanesan nee: Buat hotu nebee hakerek ona kona ba Hau iha Livru Sagradu tenki akontese duni, komesa husi Moisés nia livru, too iha livru profeta sira nian ho mos Salmus.”
Depois Nia loke sira nia hanoin para sira bele kompriende di-diak Livru Sagradu nee.
Nia dehan, “Iha Livru Sagradu hakerek nunee: Mesias tenki terus, i mate, depois iha loron tolu, Nia moris fali.
I ema sei foo sai hodi Mesias nia naran katak, see mak hakribi nia sala, Maromak foo perdaun ba nia. Sira sei foo sai nunee iha rai hotu-hotu, hahuu husi Jerusalém.
Imi tenki foo sasin kona ba buat sira nee hotu.
Hau sei haruka Espiritu Santu ba imi, tuir Hau nia Aman promete tiha ona. Maibee imi tenki hein iha sidade nee, too imi simu kbiit husi lalehan.”
Loron ida Jesus lori sira sai husi sidade. Besik too iha aldeia Betánia, Nia foti liman hodi foo bensaun ba sira.
Nia foo dadauk bensaun, Maromak foti Nia sae ba lalehan, husik hela sira.
Sira hotu-hotu adora Nia, i sira fila ba Jerusalém ho haksolok teb-tebes.
Loro-loron sira sempre iha uma kreda boot hodi hahii Maromak.
Hori uluk liu, lalehan ho rai seidauk iha, Ida nebee hanaran Liafuan iha nanis ona. Nia hamutuk ho Maromak, i Nia Maromak duni.
Nia hamutuk ho Maromak hori uluk kedas.
Maromak foo fiar ba Nia hodi halo lalehan ho rai. Se Nia la halo karik, buat hotu-hotu la iha.
Nia mak moris nia huun, i Nia moris nee foo naroman ba ita ema.
Naroman nee leno iha nakukun laran, i nakukun la iha forsa atu hamate Naroman nee.
Iha loron ida, Maromak haruka ema ida mai, nia naran João.
Nia mai atu foo sasin kona ba Naroman nee, atu ema hotu-hotu bele fiar liu husi nia sasin.
João rasik laos Naroman nee, nia so mai atu foo sasin deit kona ba Naroman nee.
Iha tempu nebaa Naroman nee atu mai ona iha mundu. Nia mak Naroman lo-loos nebee leno ema hotu nia moris.
Hori uluk kedas Maromak foo fiar ba Nia mak halo mundu. Nia iha mundu nanis, maibee ema iha mundu la hatene Nia.
Nia mai iha Nia rain rasik, maibee Nia maluk rasik lakohi simu Nia.
Maski nunee ema hotu nebee simu Nia i fiar ba Nia, Nia foo direitu ba sira hodi sai Maromak nia oan.
Sira sai Maromak nia oan nee laos tanba moris husi ema, i laos liu husi feen-laen nia hakarak atu hetan oan, maibee Maromak rasik mak foo moris ba sira.
Ida nebee hanaran Liafuan nee nakfilak ba ema, i hela iha ita nia klaran durante tempu badak. Ita haree tiha ona Nia kbiit boot nudar Maromak nia Oan mane mesak. Nia mai husi Maromak, Nia laran diak nunka hotu i Nia koalia sempre loos.
João foo sasin ho lian makaas kona ba Ema nee dehan, “Nia nee mak uluk hau dehan tiha ona, ‘Iha Ema ida sei mai. Maski hau mak mai uluk maibee Nia boot liu hau, tanba molok hau moris mai, Nia iha nanis tiha ona.’ ”
Husi Nia laran diak teb-tebes mak ita hotu hetan bensaun fila-fila.
Tanba Maromak foo Nia lei liu husi Moisés, maibee Nia laran diak ho lia loos ita hetan liu husi Jesus Kristu.
La iha ema ida mak haree ona Maromak. Maibee Maromak nia Oan mane mesak mak hela iha Aman Maromak nia sorin, i Nia mak foo konhese Maromak ba ita.
Iha loron ida, nai ulun Judeu sira iha Jerusalém haruka nai lulik ho ema Levi balu ba iha João hodi husu dehan, “Ita boot nee see?” João hataan kona ba nia aan,
nia la bosok, maibee foo sai mo-moos dehan, “Hau laos Mesias, Salvador nebee Maromak atu haruka mai.”
Sira husu tan dehan, “Se nunee ita boot see loos? Ita boot mak Maromak nia profeta Elias ka?” João hataan nafatin, “Lae.” Sira husu tan, “Ita boot nee Profeta nebee mak ami hein hela ka?” João hataan, “Lae.”
Too ikus sira husu, “Entaun ita boot nee see? Hatete mai ami kona ba ita boot nia aan atu nunee ami bele foo hatene fali ba ema nebee mak haruka ami mai.”
João hataan tuir liafuan nebee profeta Isaias uluk foo sai tiha ona dehan, “Hau nee ema ida nebee foo sai ho lian makaas iha rai fuik maran dehan, ‘Hadia dalan nebee kleuk para simu ita nia Nai mai.’ ”
Iha mos ema Farizeu balu nebee nai ulun Judeu sira haruka mai.
Sira husu ba João, “Se ita boot laos Mesias, laos profeta Elias, i laos Profeta nebee ami hein hela, entaun nusaa mak ita boot foo sarani ema?”
João hataan, “Hau foo sarani hodi bee deit, maibee iha Ema ida iha imi nia klaran, imi la konhese Nia.
Maski hau mak mai uluk, maibee atu kore deit Nia sandalias talin mos, hau la serve.”
Buat sira nee hotu akontese iha rai Betánia, iha mota Jordaun nia sorin ba, iha fatin nebee João foo sarani ema.
Aban fali João haree Jesus lao mai, i nia dehan, “Haree ba! Maromak nia Bibi Oan nebee hasai mundu nia sala, Nia mak nee.
Hau foo sai tiha ona kona ba Nia dehan, ‘Iha Ema ida sei mai. Maski hau mak mai uluk maibee Nia boot liu hau, tanba molok hau moris mai, Nia iha nanis tiha ona.’
Uluk hau rasik la hatene Nia nee see loos. Maibee hau mai foo sarani ema hodi bee atu povu Israel bele konhese Nia.”
Depois João foo sasin hanesan nee: “Iha loron ida hau haree Maromak nia Espiritu tuun mai husi lalehan hanesan manu pombu, i hela iha Ema nee.
Uluk hau la hatene Nia nee see loos. Maibee Maromak haruka hau foo sarani hodi bee, i Nia hatete nanis mai hau dehan, ‘O sei haree Espiritu Santu tuun mai hela iha Ema ida. Ema nee mak sei foo sarani hodi Espiritu Santu.’ Husi nee mak foin hau konhese lo-loos Nia.
Hau haree ho matan rasik, nunee hau foo sasin katak Nia nee Maromak nia Oan.”
Iha loron tuir mai João ho nia eskolante nain rua iha fali fatin nee.
Bainhira nia haree Jesus lao liu, nia dehan, “Haree ba! Maromak nia Bibi Oan mak nee!”
Rona nunee, João nia eskolante nain rua nee baa tuir kedas Jesus.
Jesus hateke ba kotuk, haree sira nain rua tuir hela Nia. I Nia husu sira, “Imi buka saida?” Sira hataan, “Rabi, Ita Boot hela iha nebee?” (Liafuan rabi dehan “mestri”.)
Jesus hataan, “Mai haree rasik.” Nunee sira baa hamutuk ho Jesus, i haree Nia hela fatin. Iha loron nee tuku haat lokraik ona, entaun sira hela ho Nia too kalan.
Eskolante nain rua nebee rona João nia liafuan hodi tuir Jesus, ida mak André, Simão Pedro nia alin.
André baa kedas buka nia maun Simão hodi hatete ba nia, “Ami hetan ona Mesias!” (Mesias katak “Kristu”, Salvador nebee Maromak atu haruka mai.)
Depois André lori nia maun ba Jesus. Jesus hateke ba Simão hodi dehan, “O nee Simão, João nia oan. Ema sei bolu o Cefas.” (Cefas katak “Pedro” ka “fatuk isin”.)
Aban fali Jesus desidi atu baa iha provinsia Galileia. Nia hasoru Filipe, i dehan, “Mai tuir Hau.”
Filipe nee husi aldeia Betsaida, Pedro ho André mos husi nebaa.
Depois Filipe hetan Natanael hodi dehan, “Ami hetan tiha ona Ema nebee mak Moisés foo sai iha Maromak nia lei, profeta sira seluk mos hakerek kona ba Ema nee. Nia nee Jesus husi aldeia Nazaré, José nia oan.”
Natanael hataan, “Buat diak ida hanesan nee bele mosu fali husi Nazaré ka?” Filipe dehan, “Mai haree rasik.”
Bainhira Jesus haree Natanael lao dadauk mai, Nia koalia kona ba Natanael dehan, “Ema nee Israel isin, nia la hatene bosok.”
Natanael husu ba Jesus, “Oinsaa mak Ita Boot bele konhese hau?” Jesus hataan, “Molok Filipe bolu o mai, Hau haree tiha ona o iha ai figeira huun.”
Depois Natanael foo sai dehan, “Mestri, Ita Boot mak Maromak nia Oan. Ita Boot nee ema Israel sira nia Liurai.”
Jesus dehan, “O fiar tanba Hau foo sai katak Hau haree o iha ai figeira huun ka? O sei haree buat makaas liu fali ida nee.”
Depois Jesus hatutan tan, “Hau dehan lo-loos ba imi. Imi sei haree lalehan nakloke i Maromak nia anju sira sae-tuun mai iha Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan.”
Iha loron tolu, ema halo festa kazamentu iha aldeia Kaná iha provinsia Galileia. Jesus nia inan baa iha festa nee,
Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira mos ema konvida hotu.
Bainhira tua hotu ona, Jesus nia inan hatete ba Nia, “Sira nia tua la iha ona.”
Jesus hataan, “Hau nia inan, tansaa mak hatete fali mai Hau? Hau nia tempu seidauk too.”
Maibee Nia inan hatete ba ema sira nebee serve iha festa nee dehan, “Halo tuir saida deit mak Nia haruka.”
Besik iha nebaa iha sanan boot neen halo husi fatuk. Sanan nee baibain enxe bee iha laran atu ema bele hamoos aan tuir lisan Judeu nian. Sanan ida-ida bele enxe bee maizoumenus litru atus ida.
Jesus hatete ba ema nebee serve iha festa nee dehan, “Enxe bee iha sanan sira nee.” Entaun sira enxe sanan sira nee too nakonu hotu.
Depois Jesus hatete ba sira, “Agora kuru uitoan foo ba mestri tenda hemu.” Nunee sira mos halo tuir.
Mestri tenda koko tiha, afinal bee nee sai tiha ona tua. Nia la hatene tua nee mai husi nebee, maibee ema nebee ohin kuru bee nee hatene. Depois mestri tenda bolu noivu
hodi dehan, “Baibain ema halo festa, sira hasai uluk tua diak nian, kuandu bainaka sira hemu barak ona mak foin hasai tua baratu. Maibee ita boot hasai fali tua diak nian ikus.”
Milagre nebee Jesus halo iha Kaná iha Galileia nee mak milagre primeiru nebee Jesus halo. Nunee Nia hatudu sai Nia kbiit lalehan nian, i Nia eskolante sira fiar ba Nia.
Hotu tiha Jesus baa iha sidade Kafarnaum hamutuk ho Nia inan, Nia alin sira ho mos Nia eskolante sira. Sira hela iha nebaa loron hira nia laran.
Bainhira ema Judeu nia loron boot Paskua besik ona, Jesus baa iha sidade Jerusalém.
Iha area uma kreda boot, Nia haree ema faan karau, bibi ho manu pombu, iha mos ema balu tuur iha meza hodi troka osan.
Entaun Nia halo sikoti husi tali hodi duni sai sira hotu husi area uma kreda boot nee, karau ho bibi mos Nia duni sai hotu. Nia soe namkari tiha osan nebee ema troka, i baku fila hotu sira nia meza.
Nia hatete ba ema nebee faan manu pombu dehan, “Lori sai tiha manu nee hotu! La bele halo Hau nia Aman nia uma hanesan fali merkadu.”
Jesus nia eskolante sira hanoin hetan buat nebee hakerek iha Livru Sagradu dehan, “Hau foo Aan tomak hodi defende Ita Boot nia uma, maski ida nee sei lori Hau ba mate.”
Depois nai ulun Judeu sira sadik Jesus hodi dehan, “Hatudu took mai ami milagre ruma atu sai sinal katak O iha direitu hodi halo buat sira nee.”
Jesus hataan, “Halo rahun took uma kreda boot nee, i Hau sei harii fali iha loron tolu nia laran.”
Sira hataan fali dehan, “Uma nee halo durante tinan haat-nulu resin neen, O atu harii fali iha loron tolu deit ka?”
Afinal uma kreda boot nebee mak Jesus temi nee mak Nia isin lolon rasik.
Bainhira Maromak halo Jesus moris fila fali husi mate mak foin Nia eskolante sira hanoin hetan fali Nia liafuan nee. I sira fiar buat nebee hakerek iha Livru Sagradu ho mos buat nebee Jesus koalia tiha ona.
Jesus hela iha Jerusalém durante tempu Paskua. Iha momentu nebaa ema barak haree milagre nebee mak Nia halo, i sira fiar ba Nia.
Maski nunee Jesus la fiar sira, tanba Nia konhese mo-moos ita ema.
Nia hatene nanis ona ita nia laran, nunee la presiza ema ida foo hatene fali Nia kona ba ita.
Iha justisa nain relijiaun Judeu ida naran Nicodemos, nia ema husi grupu Farizeu.
Iha kalan ida nia baa hasoru Jesus hodi dehan, “Mestri, ami hatene katak Maromak haruka Ita Boot mai atu hanorin ami. Tanba Maromak hamutuk ho ema ida mak foin ema nee bele halo milagre hanesan Ita Boot halo nee.”
Jesus hataan dehan, “Hau hatete lo-loos ba ita, ema tenki moris fila fali mak foin bele hola parte iha Maromak nia reinu. Se lae, la bele.”
Nicodemos husu fali, “Nee halo nusaa? Ema nebee boot ona bele tama fali ba iha nia inan nia kabun laran atu nia bele moris fila fali ka?!”
Jesus hataan, “Hau hatete lo-loos ba ita, see-see deit mak hakarak sai Maromak nia reinu, nia tenki moris fila fali liu husi bee ho mos Maromak nia Espiritu. Se lae, la bele.
Ema nia isin hetan moris husi ema. Maibee moris tuir Espiritu, Maromak nia Espiritu mak foo.
La bele hakfodak ba Hau nia liafuan ohin dehan, ‘Imi tenki moris fila fali.’
Hau foti ezemplu husi anin. Anin huu tuir nia hakarak. Ita bele rona nia lian, maibee la hatene mai husi nebee ka atu baa iha nebee. Maromak nia Espiritu foo moris foun ba ema mos hanesan nee.”
Nicodemos husu tan, “Oinsaa mak buat nee bele akontese?”
Jesus hataan, “Ita boot ema Israel nia mestri ida. Nusaa mak la kompriende buat sira nee?
Hau hatete lo-loos ba ita, Ami nee hanorin kona ba buat nebee Ami hatene tuir. I Ami foo sasin tuir buat nebee mak Ami haree tiha ona. Maibee imi sira nee la simu nafatin Ami nia sasin.
Hau koalia tiha ona ba imi kona ba buat mundu nian, maibee imi la fiar. Saa tan Hau koalia kona ba buat lalehan nian, imi atu fiar oinsaa?
La iha ema ida mak sae tiha ona ba lalehan. So Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan deit mak tuun mai husi nebaa.
Uluk bainhira ita nia bei-ala sira iha rai fuik maran, Moisés halo samea husi riti i hasae ba iha ai riin ida. See-see deit mak samea tata, bainhira hateke ba samea riti nee, sira la mate. Nunee mos Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan. Ema tenki hasae Hau iha ai
atu see-see deit mak fiar mai Hau hetan moris rohan-laek.”
Maromak nia domin ba ema iha mundu nee boot teb-tebes, too Nia entrega Nia Oan mane mesak. Nunee see-see deit mak fiar ba Nia Oan nee, la mate haketak aan husi Maromak, maibee hetan moris rohan-laek.
Tanba Maromak haruka Nia Oan mai iha mundu nee laos atu foo justisa ba ema, maibee atu liu husi Nia, ema iha mundu nee bele hetan salvasaun.
Ema nebee mak fiar ba Maromak nia Oan, Maromak nia kastigu la monu ba sira. Maibee ema nebee mak la fiar, Maromak desidi nanis ona atu kastigu sira tanba sira la fiar ba Maromak nia Oan mane mesak.
Sira hetan kastigu nee tanba naroman mai tiha ona iha mundu, maibee ema gosta liu moris iha nakukun laran duke moris iha naroman laran, tanba sira nia hahalok aat.
Ema hotu nebee halo buat aat, sira odi naroman. Sira lakohi mai iha naroman tanba sira tauk atu naroman nee hatudu sai sira nia hahalok aat.
Maibee see-see deit mak moris tuir dalan loos, sira mai iha naroman, atu ema bele haree mo-moos katak sira nia hahalok diak tanba Maromak tulun sira.
Hotu tiha Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira baa iha rai Judeia. Nia hela hamutuk ho sira iha nebaa iha tempu badak nia laran hodi foo sarani ema.
Iha tempu nebaa João seidauk tama iha komarka. Nia foo sarani ema iha rai Enon, besik aldeia Salim, tanba iha nebaa iha bee barak. Ema nadodon mai iha fatin nee atu João foo sarani sira.
<range>
João nia eskolante sira ho ema Judeu ida komesa diskuti malu kona ba serimonia hamoos aan.
Sira baa iha João hodi dehan, “Mestri, ita boot sei hanoin Ema ida nebee uluk hamutuk ho ita boot iha mota Jordaun nia sorin ba, ita foo sasin kona ba Nia. Agora Nia mos foo sarani ema too ema halai hotu ba Nia!”
João hataan, “Ita ema so bele simu deit buat nebee Maromak foo mai ita.
Imi rasik rona tiha ona hau dehan, ‘Hau laos Mesias, Salvador nebee Maromak atu haruka mai. Maibee Maromak haruka hau mai uluk hodi prepara dalan ba Nia.’
Iha loron kazamentu, noivu mak kaben ho noiva. Noivu nia kolega hamriik hela iha nia sorin hodi asisti, i haksolok teb-tebes rona noivu nia lian. Nunee mos, agora hau haksolok teb-tebes tanba ema barak tuir Jesus.
Nia tenki sai boot liu, hau tenki sai kiik fali.
Nia nee mai husi leten nebaa, nunee Nia boot liu hotu-hotu. See mak mai husi mundu nee, nia ema mundu nian deit, nunee koalia hanesan ema mundu nian deit. Maibee Ida nebee mai husi lalehan, Nia boot liu hotu-hotu.
Nia foo sasin kona ba buat nebee mak Nia haree i rona rasik, maski nunee ema lakohi simu Nia liafuan.
Maibee sira nebee simu Nia liafuan, sira deklara katak Maromak sempre koalia loos.
Ema nebee Maromak mak haruka, Nia hatoo Maromak nia liafuan, tanba Maromak foo tomak Espiritu Santu ba Nia.
Aman Maromak hadomi Nia Oan i entrega tiha ona buat hotu-hotu ba iha Nia liman laran.
See deit mak fiar ba Maromak nia Oan, nia hetan ona moris rohan-laek. Maibee see-see deit mak lakohi simu Maromak nia Oan, nia sei la hetan moris rohan-laek, maibee Maromak fakar Nia hirus ba ema nee.”
Iha tempu nebaa ema balu husi grupu Farizeu rona katak, ema nebee tuir Jesus barak liu fali ema nebee tuir João. Sira mos rona dehan, Jesus foo sarani ema barak liu.
Afinal Jesus rasik la foo sarani ema, Nia eskolante sira mak foo sarani.
Jesus hatene katak istoria nee too ona iha ema Farizeu nia tilun. Nunee Nia ho Nia eskolante sira sai husi provinsia Judeia baa fali iha provinsia Galileia.
Atu baa Galileia tenki liu husi provinsia Samaria.
Entaun sira too iha sidade ida iha Samaria naran Sikar, besik rai nebee uluk Jacó foo ba nia oan José.
Bee posu Jacó nian iha nebaa. Tanba sira lao dook ona, entaun Jesus kolen liu, i Nia baa tuur iha bee posu nee nia leten. Iha momentu nebaa meudia ona,
nunee Jesus nia eskolante sira baa iha sidade atu sosa hahaan. Depois feto Samaria ida mai atu kuru bee, i Jesus husu ba nia, “Foo netik bee uitoan mai Hau hemu lai.”
<range>
Feto Samaria nee dehan, “Ita Boot ema Judeu, hau feto Samaria. Nusaa mak husu fali bee mai hau?” Nia hatete nunee tanba ema Judeu la gosta liga ema Samaria.
Jesus hataan, “Se karik ita hatene tuir buat nebee Maromak atu foo, i hatene See loos mak husu bee nee, entaun ita sei husu bee mai Hau, nunee Hau sei foo bee moris nian.”
Feto nee hataan, “Senhor, Ita Boot nia kanaba la iha, i bee posu nee naruk. Ita Boot atu hetan bee moris nian husi nebee?
Uluk ami nia bei-ala Jacó mak kee bee posu nee. Nia ho nia oan sira ho mos nia animal sira hemu bee husi posu nee. Senhor boot liu fali nia ka?”
Jesus hataan, “Ema nebee hemu bee ida nee, la kleur hamrook fali.
Maibee see mak hemu bee nebee Hau foo, nia sei la hamrook tan. Tanba bee nebee Hau foo ba nia nee sei sai hanesan bee matan ida iha nia laran, bee nee sei suli nafatin hodi foo moris rohan-laek ba nia.”
Feto nee dehan ba Jesus, “Senhor, se nunee foo bee nee mai hau atu hau la bele hamrook tan, para hau lalika mai beibeik kuru bee iha nee.”
Jesus hatete ba nia, “Baa bolu ita nia kaben, imi nain rua mai.”
Feto nee hataan fali, “Hau laos kaben nain.” Jesus hatete ba nia, “Saida mak ita koalia nee loos, ita la iha kaben duni.
Ita kaben dala lima ona i mane nebee moris hamutuk ho ita agora nee laos ita nia kaben. Buat nebee ohin ita koalia nee loos duni.”
Feto nee dehan, “Senhor, agora hau hatene ona katak, senhor nee Maromak nia profeta ida.
Ami nia bei-ala sira adora Maromak iha foho nebaa, maibee imi Judeu dehan ema tenki adora Maromak iha Jerusalém.”
Jesus hatete, “Senhora, fiar Hau nia liafuan nee. Too tempu ida imi la presiza sae tan foho nebaa ka baa iha Jerusalém mak foin adora Aman Maromak.
Imi ema Samaria adora Maromak maski la konhese Nia. Ami ema Judeu adora Nia i konhese Nia. Tanba Maromak sei foo salvasaun ba ema liu husi ema Judeu.
Too tempu ida, tempu nee mak komesa agora nee, ema nebee adora lo-loos Aman Maromak sei adora Nia tuir Nia Espiritu hanorin i tuir buat nebee loos. Ida nee mak Maromak hakarak.
Maromak nee Espiritu. I see deit mak adora Nia tenki adora Nia tuir Nia Espiritu hanorin i tuir buat nebee loos.”
Feto nee dehan, “Hau hatene katak Mesias sei mai. Bainhira Nia mai, Nia sei foo sai buat hotu-hotu ba ita.” (Mesias katak “Kristu”, Salvador nebee Maromak atu haruka mai.)
Depois Jesus hatete, “Ida nebee ita temi Mesias mak agora dadauk koalia hela ho ita nee.”
Jesus sei koalia hela, Nia eskolante sira fila husi sidade. Sira hakfodak haree Jesus dada lia hela ho feto ida. Maibee sira ida mos la husu, “Ita presiza saida?” La iha ida mak husu Jesus dehan, “Nusaa mak Ita Boot dada lia ho nia?”
Depois feto nee husik hela nia sanan iha nebaa, i fila ba iha sidade laran hodi foo hatene ba ema sira iha nebaa dehan,
“Mai haree! Iha ema ida foo sai buat hotu nebee hau halo tiha ona! Karik Nia nee Mesias?”
Nunee ema sira nee sai husi sidade atu baa haree Jesus.
Sira seidauk too, Jesus nia eskolante sira hatete, “Mestri, haan lai.”
Maibee Nia hataan, “Hau iha hahaan nebee imi la hatene.”
Nunee Nia eskolante sira husu ba malu dehan, “Keta ema ruma mai foo hahaan ba Nia karik?”
Jesus dehan, “Hau nia hahaan mak halo tuir Maromak nia hakarak, i halo hotu knaar nebee Nia foo mai Hau.
Baibain imi dehan, ‘Fulan haat tan, tempu silu batar.’ Hau hatete ba imi, loke matan hodi haree ema sira nebee mai nee. Sira hanesan batar iha toos nebee maran ona, prontu atu silu.
Hanesan ema silu batar hodi hatama ba armazen, nunee mos imi lori ema mai iha Hau para sira bele hetan moris rohan-laek. Nunee imi simu ona imi nia kolen. Too ikus ema nebee kuda ho ema nebee silu sei haksolok hamutuk.
Ema baibain soe lia dehan, ‘Ida kuda, ida seluk mak silu.’ Nee loos duni.
Hau haruka ona imi atu silu batar nebee ema seluk kuda. Sira servisu mate aan hodi halo toos i imi hein silu deit.”
Iha tempu nebaa ema Samaria barak husi sidade nee fiar ba Jesus tanba sira rona feto nee foo sasin dehan, “Nia foo sai buat hotu nebee hau halo tiha ona.”
Entaun bainhira ema Samaria sira too iha Jesus, sira husu fila-fila atu Nia hela hamutuk ho sira. Nunee Jesus hela loron rua iha nebaa.
Too ikus ema barak liu tan fiar ba Jesus tanba sira rona rasik Nia hanorin.
Sira hatete ba feto nee, “Agora ami fiar ba Nia tanba ami rona rasik Nia hanorin, laos deit tanba o nia liafuan. Agora ami hatene katak Nia mak atu salva ema hotu.”
Liu tiha loron rua Jesus baa liu iha provinsia Galileia.
Nia rasik hatete tiha ona katak, ema la respeita profeta ida iha nia rain rasik.
Maibee bainhira Nia too iha nebaa, ema Galileia simu Nia ho diak tanba foin dadauk sira asisti festa Paskua iha Jerusalém, sira haree hotu buat nebee Nia halo iha nebaa.
Iha Galileia, Jesus fila ba iha aldeia Kaná, fatin nee mak uluk Nia halo bee sai fali tua. Iha funsionariu boot ida hela iha sidade Kafarnaum, nia oan moras hela,
besik atu mate. Bainhira funsionariu nee rona katak Jesus mai tiha ona husi provinsia Judeia too iha Galileia, nia baa iha Kaná hasoru Jesus hodi husu ho haraik aan atu Jesus baa kura nia oan.
Maibee Jesus hatete ba nia, “Imi sira nee so fiar bainhira imi haree milagre ho sinal oi-oin nebee halo imi admira. Se lae imi la fiar.”
Funsionariu nee hatete, “Senhor, favor baa lalais, se lae hau nia oan mate.”
Jesus hataan, “Ita bele fila ona, ita nia oan diak ona, la mate ida.” Funsionariu nee fiar Jesus nia liafuan nee, i nia fila kedas.
Iha dalan klaran, nia atan sira mai hasoru nia hodi foo hatene dehan, “Ita boot nia oan diak fali ona.”
Depois funsionariu nee husu ba sira, saa oras mak nia oan hetan fali isin diak. Nia atan sira hataan, “Horiseik lokraik tuku ida nia isin manas lakon.”
Depois labarik nia aman hanoin fali katak, iha duni oras hanesan nee mak Jesus hatete ba nia, “Ita nia oan diak ona, la mate ida.” Nunee nia ho nia uma laran tomak fiar ba Jesus.
Jesus halo milagre nee bainhira Nia fila husi Judeia. Ida nee mak milagre segundu nebee Nia halo iha provinsia Galileia.
Hotu tiha Jesus baa iha Jerusalém atu tuir loron boot ema Judeu nian.
Iha nebaa iha bee kolan ida, varanda lima haleu, iha lian Ebreu naran Betesda. Bee kolan nee besik portaun boot naran Portaun Bibi Malae.
Ema moras barak mak toba hela iha varanda nee, hanesan ema matan delek, ema ain aat, ho ema liman-ain mate. [Sira hein hela bee nee nakdoko.
Tanba dala ruma Nai Maromak nia anju tuun mai halo bee nee nakdoko. Depois see mak tama uluk iha bee laran, nia moras saida deit hetan kura.]
Iha mos mane ida ain aat lao la diak durante tinan tolu-nulu resin walu ona.
Bainhira Jesus haree nia latan hela iha nebaa, Jesus hatene katak ema nee moras kleur loos ona. Entaun Jesus husu ba nia, “O hakarak hetan isin diak ka?”
Ema nee hataan, “Senhor, bainhira bee nakdoko, la iha ema ida atu ajuda hau tama ba iha bee laran. Bainhira hau hakaas aan atu tama, ema seluk tama uluk tiha ona.”
Depois Jesus hatete ba nia, “Hamriik ona! Foti o nia biti, lao ona!”
Iha momentu nee kedas ema nee hetan isin diak, nia foti nia biti hodi lao. Loron nee loron Sabadu.
Nunee nai ulun Judeu sira hatete ba ema nebee foin hetan kura nee dehan, “Ohin loron Sabadu, lei bandu loron Sabadu la bele lori o nia biti.”
Maibee nia hataan, “Ema nebee kura hau mak haruka hau dehan, ‘Foti o nia biti, lao ona!’ ”
Entaun sira husu ba nia, “Nia nee see fali mak haruka o foti o nia biti hodi lao?”
Ema nebee foin hetan kura nee la hatene see mak kura nia, tanba iha fatin nee ema barak, i Jesus sai tiha ona husi nebaa ho nonook.
La kleur Jesus hetan fali ema nee iha uma kreda boot, i hatete ba nia, “Agora o isin diak ona. Kuidadu, la bele halo sala tan, se lae buat aat liu tan bele kona o.”
Depois ema nee fila fali ba iha nai ulun Judeu sira hodi foo hatene katak, Ema nebee kura nia nee naran Jesus.
Nunee nai ulun Judeu sira komesa hatete aat Jesus tanba Nia kura ema iha loron Sabadu.
Maibee Jesus hatete ba sira, “Hau nia Aman servisu nunka para, Hau mos servisu nunee.”
Jesus nia liafuan nee halo nai ulun Judeu sira hakarak liu tan atu oho Jesus, tanba Nia kontra beibeik regra loron Sabadu nian. Laos nee deit maibee Nia mos dehan Maromak mak Nia Aman rasik, nunee Nia halo Nia Aan hanesan fali Maromak.
Rona nunee Jesus dehan ba sira, “Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, Maromak nia Oan la bele halo buat ida mes-mesak, Nia haree buat nebee mak Nia Aman halo, Nia mos halo tuir. Saida deit mak Nia Aman halo, ida nee mak Nia halo.
Tanba Nia Aman hadomi Nia, i buat hotu-hotu nebee Nia Aman halo, hatudu ba Nia. Nia Aman sei hatudu ba Nia buat nebee makaas liu tan, halo imi admira.
Nia Aman halo moris fali ema mate, i foo moris rohan-laek ba sira. Nunee mos Nia Oan sei foo moris foun ba ema nebee mak Nia hili.
Nia Aman la foo justisa ba ema ida. Maibee Nia foo fiar tiha ona ba Nia Oan atu foo justisa ba ema,
atu ema hotu respeita Nia Oan hanesan sira respeita Nia Aman. See deit mak la respeita Nia Oan, la respeita mos Nia Aman nebee haruka Nia mai.”
Jesus hatutan tan dehan, “Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, see deit mak rona Hau nia liafuan i fiar ba Ida nebee haruka Hau mai, sira hetan ona moris rohan-laek, sira sei la hetan kastigu. Sira sai tiha ona husi mate hodi tama ba moris rohan-laek.
Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, too tempu ida, tempu nee mak komesa agora nee, ema nebee hanesan mate tiha ona tanba haketak aan husi Maromak, sira sei rona Maromak nia Oan nia lian. I see mak rona sei hetan moris.
Tanba Aman Maromak mak moris nia huun, i Nia foo tiha ona kbiit ba Nia Oan atu foo moris ba ema.
Nia mos foo tiha ona kbiit ba Nia Oan atu foo justisa ba ema, tanba Nia mak Ema Umanu nia Oan.
La bele hakfodak. Too loron ida, matebian sira hotu sei rona Maromak nia Oan nia lian.
Depois matebian sira nee sei sai mai. Sira nebee uluk halo buat diak, hetan moris rohan-laek. Maibee sira nebee uluk halo buat aat, sei hetan kastigu.
Hau la bele halo buat ida mes-mesak, Hau so foo justisa tuir buat nebee mak Hau rona husi Hau nia Aman. Justisa nebee Hau foo nee loos. Tanba Hau laos halo tuir Hau nia hakarak rasik. Maibee Hau halo tuir Hau nia Aman nia hakarak, tanba Nia mak haruka Hau mai.”
“Se karik Hau mesak mak foo sasin kona ba Hau nia Aan, entaun Hau nia sasin la vale ida.
Maibee iha Ida mak foo sasin kona ba Hau, nee mak Aman Maromak rasik. Hau hatene katak Nia sasin kona ba Hau nee loos.
Imi haruka ona ema ba iha João, i nia foo sasin ba buat nebee loos.
Afinal Hau la presiza ema ida atu foo sasin kona ba Hau. Maibee Hau so foo hanoin fila fali ba imi kona ba João nia liafuan atu imi bele hetan salvasaun.
Bainhira João hela iha imi nia leet, nia hanesan ahi-oan nebee lakan iha tempu badak nia laran, i imi kontenti simu nia naroman nee.
Maibee iha buat seluk nebee foo sasin boot liu fali João nian, nee mak servisu nebee Hau nia Aman foo mai Hau atu halao too hotu. Servisu nee mak Hau halo durante nee, i servisu nee hatudu katak Hau nia Aman mak haruka Hau mai.
Hau nia Aman nebee haruka Hau mai nee, Nia rasik foo sasin kona ba Hau. Imi nunka rona Nia lian, i nunka haree Nia oin.
Imi la simu Nia liafuan, tanba imi lakohi fiar Ida nebee mak Nia haruka mai.
Imi badinas estuda Livru Sagradu, tanba imi hanoin katak liu husi Livru nee imi hetan moris rohan-laek. Afinal Livru Sagradu nee rasik foo sasin kona ba Hau,
maibee imi lakohi mai iha Hau atu hetan moris.
Hau la buka atu ema gaba Hau.
Maibee Hau hatene imi nia laran, Hau hatene imi la hadomi Maromak.
Hau mai hodi Hau nia Aman nia naran maibee imi la simu Hau. Ema seluk mai hodi nia naran rasik, nee mak imi simu fali.
Imi la buka atu Maromak gaba imi, maski Nia mesak deit mak Maromak. Imi buka fali atu imi nia maluk sira mak gaba. Entaun oinsaa mak imi atu fiar mai Hau?
Keta hanoin dehan Hau sei hamriik iha Hau nia Aman nia oin hodi foo sala ba imi. Moisés mak sei foo sala ba imi, maski imi laran metin ba nia.
Se karik imi fiar Moisés nia liafuan, entaun imi fiar mos Hau, tanba nia hakerek tiha ona kona ba Hau.
Maibee imi la fiar buat nebee Moisés hakerek, nunee oinsaa mak imi atu fiar buat nebee Hau koalia?”
Hotu tiha Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira baa iha tasi Galileia nia sorin ba, tasi nee nia naran seluk mak Tiberiades.
Ema barak teb-tebes tuir Nia tanba sira haree milagre nebee mak Nia halo tiha ona ba ema moras sira.
Depois Jesus sae ba foho ida, i Nia tuur hamutuk ho Nia eskolante sira.
Iha tempu nee ema Judeu nia loron boot Paskua besik ona.
Jesus hateke tuun, iha ema barak teb-tebes nadodon sae mai. Nunee Nia hatete ba Filipe, “Ita atu sosa paun iha nebee para sira hotu bele haan?”
Nia hatete nunee para koko Filipe, afinal Nia rasik hatene ona saida mak Nia atu halo.
Filipe hataan, “Ema badaen nia salariu fulan walu nian mos la too atu sosa hahaan ba ema barak hanesan nee. Atu ema ida-ida hetan deit paun pedasuk ida mos la too.”
Depois eskolante ida seluk naran André, Simão Pedro nia alin foo hatene dehan,
“Labarik mane ida iha nee, nia lori paun baratu nian fuan lima ho ikan rua, maibee nee la too atu foo haan ba ema barak hanesan nee.”
Iha nebaa iha duut matak barak. Jesus foo hatene ba Nia eskolante sira dehan, “Haruka sira tuur.” Sira mos tuur iha duut leten. Ema sira nee maizoumenus rihun lima, nee mane deit, seidauk konta feto ho labarik.
Depois Jesus foti paun nee i foo agradese ba Maromak. Hotu tiha Nia foo ba Nia eskolante sira hodi fahe ba ema sira nebee tuur nee. Ikan sira nee mos hanesan. Ema lubun boot nee haan too bosu.
Sira hotu bosu ona, Jesus haruka Nia eskolante sira dehan, “Tau hamutuk hahaan restu atu la bele estraga.”
Nunee eskolante sira tau hamutuk hahaan restu husi paun fuan lima nebee ema barak haan nee, hamutuk bote sanulu resin rua nakonu.
Bainhira ema barak nee haree milagre nebee Jesus halo, sira dehan, “Tebes duni, Ema nee Profeta nebee atu mai iha mundu.”
Jesus hatene katak ema barak nee hakarak obriga Nia atu sai sira nia liurai, nunee Nia sai husi sira nia klaran hodi baa mes-mesak iha foho ida.
Rai besik kalan ona, Jesus nia eskolante sira tuun ba iha tasi ibun.
Rai nakukun ona, Jesus seidauk mai hamutuk ho sira. Nunee sira sae roo atu hakur tasi ba iha sidade Kafarnaum.
Sira lao dadauk, anin komesa huu makaas, i laloran mos boot.
Bainhira sira hean roo too tiha ona kilometru lima ka neen, sira haree Jesus lao mai iha bee leten, halo sira tauk teb-tebes.
Maibee Jesus dehan ba sira, “Nee Hau. Keta tauk!”
Rona nunee, sira kontenti simu Nia tama ba iha roo laran. Derepenti roo nee too iha fatin nebee sira atu baa.
Ema barak nebee ohin Jesus foo haan nee sei hela iha tasi sorin. Aban fali sira hakarak haree tan Jesus. Sira hatene katak, horiseik roo ida deit mak para iha nebaa, i Jesus nia eskolante sira deit mak sae roo nee, Jesus la sae hamutuk ho sira.
La kleur iha roo balu mai husi sidade Tiberiades. Roo sira nee para iha fatin nebee horiseik Nai Jesus foo agradese ba Maromak hodi foo paun ba ema barak nee haan.
Ema barak nee haree katak Jesus ho Nia eskolante sira nee la iha tiha ona. Nunee sira sae roo hirak nee hodi baa iha Kafarnaum buka Jesus.
Bainhira ema lubun boot nee too iha tasi sorin, sira hetan Jesus iha nebaa. Sira husu ba Nia, “Mestri too hori bainhira?”
Jesus hataan, “Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, imi buka Hau laos tanba imi aprende buat ruma husi milagre nebee mak Hau halo. Maibee imi buka Hau tanba paun nebee mak imi haan too bosu di-diak.
La bele servisu para hetan deit hahaan nebee la dura. Maibee servisu para hetan hahaan nebee mak iha nafatin hodi foo moris tinan ba tinan. Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan mak sei foo hahaan nee ba imi, tanba Aman Maromak foo fiar tiha ona mai Hau atu halo ida nee.”
Depois sira husu ba Nia, “Ami tenki halo servisu saida atu bele halo tuir Maromak nia hakarak?”
Jesus hataan, “Servisu nebee Maromak hakarak atu imi halo mak nee: Imi tenki fiar ba Ida nebee Nia haruka mai.”
Sira husu fali, “Se nunee hatudu lai sinal ruma mai ami para ami bele haree hodi fiar. Ita Boot sei halo saida?
Uluk ita nia bei-ala sira haan paun manaa iha rai fuik maran, hanesan hakerek iha Livru Sagradu dehan, ‘Nia foo paun husi lalehan para sira haan.’ ”
Jesus dehan ba sira, “Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, uluk imi nia bei-ala sira hetan paun husi lalehan, laos Moisés mak foo. Agora Paun lalehan nian lo-loos mos, Hau nia Aman mak foo ba imi.
Paun nebee Maromak foo mak Ema ida nebee tuun mai husi lalehan hodi foo moris rohan-laek ba ema iha mundu.”
Sira hatete ba Nia, “Senhor, foo paun nee mai ami loro-loron.”
Depois Jesus hatete, “Hau mak Paun nebee foo moris. See-see deit mak mai iha Hau, nia la hamlaha tan, i see mak fiar mai Hau, sei la hamrook tan.
Maibee Hau dehan tiha ona ba imi, maski imi haree tiha ona Hau mos, imi la fiar Hau nafatin.
Ema hotu nebee Hau nia Aman entrega tiha ona mai Hau, sira sei mai iha Hau. I kuandu sira mai iha Hau, Hau sei la duni sai sira.
Tanba Hau mai husi lalehan laos atu halo tuir Hau nia hakarak, maibee atu halo tuir Hau nia Aman nia hakarak, tanba Nia mak haruka Hau mai.
I Nia hakarak mak nee: Ema nebee Nia entrega ona mai Hau, ida mos la bele lakon, i bainhira mundu nee remata, Hau halo sira moris fali husi mate.
Hau nia Aman hakarak atu see-see deit mak konhese katak Hau Maromak nia Oan i fiar mai Hau, sei hetan moris rohan-laek. I Hau sei halo moris fali sira bainhira mundu nee remata.”
Entaun nai ulun Judeu sira komesa murmura kona ba Jesus tanba Nia dehan, “Hau mak Paun nebee tuun mai husi lalehan.”
Sira dehan, “Nia nee Jesus, José nia oan. Ita konhese hela Nia inan-aman. Nusaa mak Nia bele dehan fali, Nia tuun mai husi lalehan? ”
Jesus hatete ba sira, “Imi la bele murmura tan.
Hau nia Aman mak haruka Hau mai. La iha ema ida bele mai mesak iha Hau. So Hau nia Aman lori nia mak foin bele. I see deit mak mai iha Hau, Hau sei halo nia moris fali bainhira mundu remata.
Iha Livru Sagradu Maromak nia profeta hakerek dehan, ‘Maromak sei hanorin ema hotu.’ Nunee ema hotu nebee rona Hau nia Aman i aprende husi Nia sei mai iha Hau.
La iha ema ida mak haree ona Aman Maromak. So Hau deit mak haree tiha ona Nia tanba Hau mai husi Nia.
Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, ema nebee fiar mai Hau, sei hetan moris rohan-laek.
Hau mak Paun nebee foo moris.
Imi nia bei-ala sira haan duni paun manaa iha rai fuik maran, maibee too ikus sira mate.
Maibee Paun nebee tuun mai husi lalehan agora dadauk iha nee hela. See deit mak haan Paun nee sei la mate.
Hau mak Paun Moris nian nebee tuun ona husi lalehan. See deit mak haan Paun Moris nian nee sei moris tinan ba tinan. Paun nee mak Hau nia isin nebee Hau foo atu ema iha mundu nee hetan moris.”
Rona nunee, ema Judeu sira komesa haksesuk malu makaas hodi dehan, “Oinsaa mak Ema nee bele foo Nia isin atu ita haan?”
Entaun Jesus dehan ba sira, “Nudar Ema Umanu nia Oan, Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, imi tenki haan Hau nia isin i hemu Hau nia raan, se lae imi la hetan moris.
See deit mak haan Hau nia isin ho hemu Hau nia raan hetan ona moris rohan-laek. I Hau sei halo moris fali nia bainhira mundu nee remata.
Tanba Hau nia isin ho Hau nia raan mak haan-hemu lo-loos.
See deit mak haan Hau nia isin i hemu Hau nia raan, nia ida deit ho Hau.
Hau nia Aman mak moris nia huun, Nia mak haruka Hau mai, i Hau moris tanba Nia. Nunee mos ema nebee haan Hau nia isin sei moris tanba Hau.
Hau mak Paun nebee tuun mai ona husi lalehan. Ema nebee mak haan Paun nee sei moris tinan ba tinan. Laos hanesan paun manaa nebee imi nia bei-ala sira haan, maski sira haan maibee too ikus mate.”
Jesus hanorin buat sira nee iha uma kreda laran iha Kafarnaum.
Rona Jesus nia hanorin nee, ema barak nebee baibain tuir Nia hodi sai Nia eskolante komesa dehan ba malu, “Nia hanorin nee susar atu kompriende, see mak bele simu?”
Jesus hatene katak Nia eskolante sira murmura ba malu kona ba buat nebee Nia hanorin nee. Nunee Nia hatete ba sira dehan, “Hau nia hanorin nee xoke imi nia laran ka?
Entaun aban-bainrua imi haree Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan sae fila fali ba Hau nia fatin uluk, imi sei hanoin saida loos?
Maromak nia Espiritu mak foo moris, ema la bele. Liafuan nebee Hau hanorin nee mai husi Maromak nia Espiritu hodi foo moris ba ema.
Maski nunee iha ema balu iha imi nia leet la fiar.” Jesus hatete nunee tanba Nia hatene nanis ona see mak la fiar, i see mak atu faan Nia.
Jesus hatutan tan dehan, “Tanba nee mak Hau hatete tiha ona ba imi katak, la iha ema ida bele mai mesak iha Hau. So Hau nia Aman ajuda nia mak foin nia bele mai iha Hau.”
Komesa husi loron nee Jesus nia eskolante sira barak husik tiha Nia i lakohi tuir tan.
Jesus husu ba Nia eskolante nain sanulu resin rua dehan, “Imi sira nee mos hakarak atu husik Hau ka?”
Simão Pedro hataan, “Nai, ami atu baa loos nebee? Ita Boot nia liafuan mak foo moris rohan-laek.
Ami fiar, i ami hatene katak Ita Boot mak Ema Santu nebee Maromak haruka mai.”
Depois Jesus hataan, “Hau rasik mak hili imi sanulu resin rua nee sai Hau nia eskolante. Maibee imi ida diabu.”
Jesus koalia kona ba Judas, Simão Iscariotes nia oan. Maski Judas nee eskolante ida husi sira nain sanulu resin rua, maibee too ikus nia mak faan Jesus.
Hotu tiha Jesus lao haleu provinsia Galileia laran. Nia lakohi baa iha provinsia Judeia, tanba nai ulun Judeu sira iha nebaa hakarak oho Nia.
Iha tempu nebaa ema Judeu nia loron boot nebee bolu “Baraka” besik ona.
Nunee Jesus nia alin sira hatete ba Nia, “Diak liu sai husi fatin nee hodi baa iha Judeia, atu Ita Boot nia eskolante sira iha nebaa bele haree Ita Boot nia milagre.
Tanba see mak hakarak sai boot, nia la bele subar buat nebee nia halo. Se Ita Boot halo ona milagre, entaun hatudu Aan ba mundu atu ema hotu haree.”
Sira hatete nunee tanba maski sira Jesus nia alin maibee sira la fiar ba Nia.
Nunee Jesus hataan ba sira dehan, “Agora Hau nia tempu seidauk too. Maibee ba imi, tempu saida deit imi bele baa.
Ema mundu nee laos odi imi, sira odi mak Hau tanba Hau foo hatene beibeik ba sira katak sira nia hahalok aat.
Imi baa tuir selebrasaun nee. Hau la baa tanba Hau nia tempu seidauk too.”
Koalia tiha nunee, Nia hela iha Galileia.
Maibee bainhira Nia alin sira baa tiha, Nia mos baa nonook deit tuir festa nee, ema seluk la hatene.
Iha festa nee, nai ulun Judeu sira buka Jesus hodi husu tuun-sae dehan, “Ema nee iha nebee?”
Ema barak nebee tuir festa nee komesa bis-bisu ba malu kona ba Jesus. Iha ema balu dehan, “Nia ema diak.” Balu tan dehan, “Lae, Nia lohi ema barak lao sala dalan.”
Maibee la iha ema ida mak brani koalia mo-moos kona ba Nia, tanba sira tauk nai ulun Judeu sira.
Selebrasaun Baraka nee lao too klaran ona, Jesus baa iha uma kreda boot hodi hanorin.
Nai ulun Judeu sira admira hodi dehan, “Ema nee laos eskola boot ida. Nia aprende buat sira nee husi nebee?”
Nunee Jesus dehan, “Buat nebee Hau hanorin nee laos mai husi Hau nia Aan rasik, maibee mai husi Ida nebee haruka Hau mai.
Ema nebee prontu halo tuir Maromak nia hakarak, nia sei hatene, Hau nia hanorin mai husi Maromak ka mai husi Hau nia hanoin rasik.
See mak hanorin husi nia hanoin rasik, nia buka atu ema foti aas nia. Maibee see mak buka atu foti aas Ida nebee haruka nia mai, ema nee sempre koalia deit buat loos i la hatene bosok.
Moisés foo lei ba imi, maibee imi ida la halo tuir lei nee. Entaun nusaa mak imi atu oho fali Hau?”
Ema lubun boot hataan, “Diabu tama ona O nia laran! See mak atu oho O?”
Jesus hataan, “Foin dadauk Hau halo milagre ida iha loron Sabadu, imi hotu hakfodak.
Maibee se labarik mane ida nia loron atu sunat monu iha Sabadu, imi rasik mos sunat nia iha loron nee, atu nunee imi kumpri Moisés nia lei. Afinal sunat nee nia huun laos Moisés nia lei, maibee tuun husi bei-ala sira.
Entaun atu halo tuir Moisés nia lei, imi sunat labarik mane iha loron Sabadu. Se nunee, nusaa mak imi hirus Hau tanba Hau kura ema moras iha loron Sabadu? Afinal Hau halo nia isin lolon tomak sai diak.
Tetu ho lo-loos mak foin dehan ema seluk sala ka la sala. La bele ona foo sala ba ema tuir deit buat nebee imi haree husi liur.”
Depois ema Jerusalém balu husu ba malu dehan, “Ema nee mak nai ulun sira buka hela atu oho nee ka lae?
Haree took, agora Nia koalia iha ema barak nia oin, i nai ulun sira la hatete buat ida hasoru Nia. Keta halo be sira konhese ona katak Nia mak Mesias, Salvador nebee Maromak atu haruka mai.
Maibee oinsaa mak bele? Tanba bainhira Mesias mai, la iha ema ida mak hatene Nia mai husi nebee. Ema nee, ita hatene hela Nia.”
Iha tempu nee, Jesus sei hanorin hela iha area uma kreda boot. Bainhira Nia rona ema koalia nunee, Nia hatete ba ema barak nee ho lian makaas dehan, “Imi konhese duni Hau, i imi hatene Hau husi nebee. Hau mai laos tanba Hau nia hakarak rasik. Ida nebee haruka Hau mai, Nia sempre koalia lia loos. Imi la konhese Nia,
maibee Hau konhese Nia, tanba Hau mai husi Nia i Nia mak haruka Hau mai.”
Rona nunee, sira hakarak atu kaer Jesus, maibee la iha ida mak konsege tau liman ba Nia, tanba Nia loron seidauk too.
Maski nunee povu barak komesa fiar ba Nia. Sira dehan ba malu, “Ema nee halo milagre barak. Kuandu Mesias mai, Nia atu halo liu fali Ema nee ka?”
Ema Farizeu sira rona hela ema barak bis-bisu ba malu nunee kona ba Jesus. Entaun sira hamutuk ho nai lulik nia ulun sira haruka seguransa uma kreda boot nian atu baa kaer Jesus.
Jesus hatete, “Hau hamutuk ho imi iha tempu badak deit, depois Hau sei fila fali ba Ida nebee haruka Hau mai.
Imi sei buka Hau, maibee la hetan Hau, tanba imi la bele baa iha fatin nebee mak Hau hela.”
Nunee nai ulun Judeu sira hatete ba malu, “Ema nee atu baa iha nebee mak ita la bele hetan Nia? Keta halo be Nia atu baa iha ita nia maluk Judeu sira nebee namkari iha ema jentiu sira nia rai hodi hanorin ema jentiu sira iha nebaa.
Ohin Nia dehan, ‘Imi sei buka Hau maibee la hetan Hau.’ I ‘Imi la bele baa iha fatin nebee mak Hau hela.’ Nia liafuan nee dehan saida?”
Iha loron ikus selebrasaun Baraka nian, loron nee mak loron importante liu, Jesus hamriik foo sai ho lian makaas dehan, “See deit mak hamrook, mai iha Hau hodi hemu bee.
Hanesan hakerek ona iha Livru Sagradu dehan, ema nebee fiar mai Hau, ‘bee moris nian sei suli sai husi nia laran.’ ”
Nunee Jesus koalia kona ba Maromak nia Espiritu, ema nebee fiar ba Jesus sei simu Espiritu nee. Maibee momentu Jesus koalia, Maromak seidauk foo Nia Espiritu tanba Maromak seidauk foti aas Jesus.
Rona Jesus koalia nunee, povu balu dehan, “Loos duni. Ema nee Profeta nebee mak ita hein hela.”
Iha balu dehan, “Nia nee Mesias, Salvador nebee Maromak atu haruka mai.” Balu tan husu, “Mesias mai husi Galileia fali ka?
Iha Livru Sagradu dehan Mesias sei mai husi liurai David nia jerasaun, husi David nia aldeia Belém.”
Nunee povu barak haksesuk malu kona ba Jesus.
Sira balu hakarak kaer Jesus maibee la iha ida mak konsege tau liman ba Nia.
Too ikus seguransa uma kreda boot nian fila fali ba nai lulik nia ulun sira ho ema Farizeu sira. Sira nee husu ba seguransa dehan, “Nusaa mak imi la lori Nia mai?”
Sira hataan, “Seidauk iha ema ida mak hanorin hanesan Ema nee.”
Ema Farizeu sira nee dehan, “Keta halo be Nia lohi tan imi.
Ami nai ulun sira ho Farizeu sira fiar ba Nia ka? La iha!
Maibee povu sira nee beik, la hatene Moisés nia lei. Malisan sei kona sira.”
Iha nebaa iha ema Farizeu ida naran Nicodemos, nia mak uluk baa hasoru Jesus. Nia hatete ba sira,
“Tuir ita nia lei, ita desidi kedas atu kastigu ema ka, ita rona uluk lai husi nia ibun kona ba saida mak nia halo, depois mak foin tesi nia lia?”
Sira hataan, “O mos ema Galileia ka?! Baa buka di-diak iha Livru Sagradu, o sei hatene katak la iha profeta ida mak mai husi Galileia.”
[Hotu tiha sira ida-idak fila ba sira nia uma.
Maibee Jesus baa iha foho Oliveira.
Iha dadeer-saan deit, Nia baa fali iha area uma kreda boot. Ema barak nadodon mai iha Nia, i Nia tuur hodi hanorin sira.
Depois mestri relijiaun ho ema Farizeu sira lori feto ida ba iha Jesus. Feto nee ema kaer toman bainhira nia halo hela relasaun seksual ho ema nia laen. Sira obriga feto nee hamriik iha ema barak nia oin.
Depois sira husu ba Jesus, “Mestri, feto nee ema kaer toman bainhira nia halo hela relasaun seksual ho ema nia laen.
Tuir Moisés nia lei, feto hanesan nee ita tenki tuda mate ho fatuk. Tuir Ita Boot nia hanoin oinsaa?”
Sira husu nunee atu lasu Nia tanba sira buka razaun atu foo sala ba Nia. Maibee Jesus hakruuk i hakerek iha rai ho Nia liman fuan.
Nai ulun sira husu beibeik ba Nia. Nunee Nia hamriik i hatete ba sira, “Imi sira nee, see mak nunka halo sala, nia mak tuda uluk fatuk ba feto nee.”
Depois Nia hakruuk fali i hakerek iha rai.
Bainhira sira rona Jesus nia liafuan nee, sira lao ida-idak nian, komesa husi katuas sira too joven. Ikus mai Jesus mesak iha nebaa ho feto nee.
Depois Jesus hamriik fali hodi husu ba feto nee, “Senhora, ema sira ohin nee iha nebee tiha ona? La iha ema ida mak atu kastigu senhora ka?”
Feto nee hataan, “La iha Senhor!” Jesus hatete ba nia, “Hau mos la kastigu ita. Agora bele baa ona. Maibee la bele halo sala tan.”]
Hotu tiha Jesus koalia tan ho ema lubun boot nee dehan, “Hau mak naroman mundu nian. See deit mak tuir Hau, nia sei moris iha naroman nee nia laran. Nia dalan la nakukun tan ona.”
Depois ema Farizeu sira hatete, “O mesak mak foo sasin kona ba O nia Aan, entaun O nia sasin nee la vale ida.”
Jesus hataan dehan, “Maski Hau mesak mak foo sasin kona ba Hau nia Aan, maibee sasin nebee Hau foo nee loos nafatin. Tanba Hau hatene hela, Hau mai husi nebee i Hau sei baa iha nebee, maibee imi la hatene Hau husi nebee i sei baa iha nebee.
Imi tesi lia tuir dalan mundu nian, Hau laos mai atu tesi ema ida nia lia.
Maibee se Hau tesi lia, Hau halo ho lo-loos. Tanba Hau laos foo justisa mes-mesak, maibee Hau hamutuk ho Hau nia Aman nebee mak haruka Hau mai.
Iha imi nia lei dehan, ema nain rua foo sasin nebee hanesan mak foin sasin nee vale.
Iha Testemunhu rua mak foo sasin kona ba Hau. Ida mak Hau rasik, Ida seluk mak Hau nia Aman nebee haruka Hau mai.”
Entaun sira husu ba Nia, “O nia Aman iha nebee?” Jesus hataan, “Imi la konhese Hau ho Hau nia Aman. Se karik imi konhese Hau, entaun imi mos konhese Hau nia Aman.”
Jesus hatete buat sira nee bainhira Nia hanorin iha area uma kreda boot besik kaixa oferta. Maski Nia hanorin iha fatin nee, maibee la iha ema ida mak kaer Nia, tanba Nia loron seidauk too.
Dala ida tan Jesus hatete ba ema barak nee, “Hau sei baa, i imi sei buka Hau. Maibee imi la bele baa iha fatin nebee mak Hau baa, i imi sei mate ho imi nia sala.”
Rona nunee nai ulun Judeu sira husu ba malu, “Nia atu oho Aan karik. Tanba nee mak Nia dehan, ‘Imi la bele baa iha fatin nebee mak Hau baa.’ ”
Maibee Jesus hatete ba sira, “Imi husi kraik, Hau husi leten nebaa. Imi ema mundu nian, Hau lae.
Tanba nee mak Hau hatete ba imi katak imi sei mate ho imi nia sala. Se imi la fiar katak Hau mak Ida nebee imi hein hela nee, imi sei mate duni ho imi nia sala.”
Sira husu ba Jesus, “Entaun Ita Boot nee see fali?” Jesus hataan, “Hori uluk too agora Hau foo hatene tiha ona kona ba Hau nia Aan.
Tuir loos Hau bele hatete buat barak kona ba imi hodi hatudu sai imi nia sala. Maibee Hau laos atu halo ida nee. Ida nebee haruka Hau mai nee sempre koalia buat nebee loos. I saida mak Hau rona husi Nia, nee deit mak Hau hatoo ba ema iha mundu nee.”
Sira la kompriende katak Jesus koalia kona ba Nia Aman iha lalehan.
Tanba nee Jesus dehan, “Bainhira imi hasae Hau, Ema Umanu nia Oan ba iha fatin aas mak foin imi hatene katak Hau mak Ida nebee imi hein hela nee. I imi sei hatene katak Hau la halo buat ida mes-mesak, maibee Hau koalia deit buat nebee mak Hau nia Aman hanorin tiha ona mai Hau.
Ida nebee haruka Hau mai, Nia sempre hamutuk ho Hau, Nia nunka husik Hau mesak, tanba Hau sempre halo haksolok Nia laran.”
Bainhira Jesus koalia nunee, ema barak komesa fiar ba Nia.
Jesus hatete ba ema Judeu sira nebee fiar tiha ona ba Nia dehan, “Se imi kaer metin Hau nia hanorin, imi Hau nia eskolante duni.
Nunee imi sei hatene lia loos, i lia loos nee sei halo imi livre.”
Sira hataan, “Ami nee Abraão nia jerasaun, ami nunka sai ema ida nia atan. Nusaa mak Ita Boot dehan, ami sei sai livre?”
Jesus hataan, “Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, see mak halo sala, nia sai ona atan ba sala.
Atan ida la bele laran metin atu hela nafatin ho patraun nia familia. So patraun nia oan rasik mak nafatin iha familia nee too tinan ba tinan.
Entaun se Patraun nia Oan mak halo imi livre, imi livre duni.
Hau hatene imi nee Abraão nia jerasaun, maibee imi hakarak oho fali Hau, tanba imi lakohi simu Hau nia hanorin.
Hau foo hatene ba imi saida mak Hau nia Aman hatudu ona mai Hau. Maibee imi halo saida mak imi nia aman hatete ona ba imi.”
Sira hataan, “Ami nia aman mak Abraão.” Jesus dehan, “Se imi Abraão nia jerasaun duni, entaun imi sei halo tuir Abraão nia hahalok.
Maibee imi lae. Imi sira nee buka dalan atu oho Hau, maski Hau foo hatene ba imi lia loos nebee Hau rona husi Maromak. Buat nebee imi halo nee, Abraão nunka halo.
Imi halo tuir fali saida mak imi nia aman rasik halo.” Sira hataan, “Ami nee laos oan hili. Ami nia Aman ida deit, nee mak Maromak rasik, aman seluk la iha.”
Jesus dehan ba sira, “Se Maromak mak imi nia Aman duni, entaun imi sei hadomi Hau, tanba Hau mai husi Maromak. Hau laos mai tanba Hau nia hakarak rasik, maibee Maromak mak haruka Hau mai.
Nusaa mak imi la kompriende buat nebee Hau koalia? Tanba imi lakohi rona.
Imi nia aman mak Satanás, imi gosta tuir imi nia aman nee nia hakarak. Hori uluk kedas Satanás nee oho door i sempre kontra lia loos, tanba lia loos la bele hela iha nia laran. Bainhira nia koalia, nia bosok, tanba nia kakutak nakonu ho buat bosok deit. Nia rasik bosok-teen, i Nia mak bosok-teen hotu-hotu nia aman.
Maibee Hau foo sai buat nebee loos ba imi, nee mak imi lakohi fiar Hau.
Husi imi sira nee, see mak bele hatudu dehan, Hau halo sala? Se Hau koalia buat nebee loos, nusaa mak imi lakohi fiar Hau?
Ema nebee mai husi Maromak, nia rona Maromak nia liafuan. Maibee imi laos husi Maromak, tanba nee mak imi lakohi rona.”
Entaun ema Judeu sira hatete ba Jesus, “Ami dehan nanis katak O nee ema Samaria, diabu tama tiha ona O. Nee loos duni.”
Jesus hatete, “Diabu la tama iha Hau ida. Hau respeita Hau nia Aman, imi hatuun fali Hau.
Hau la buka atu ema foti aas Hau, maibee iha Ida mak hakarak atu ema foti aas Hau. Nia mak sei desidi see mak loos i see mak sala.
Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, see mak halo tuir Hau nia liafuan, nia sei la mate.”
Rona nunee, ema Judeu sira dehan, “Agora ami hatene mo-moos katak diabu tama iha O nia laran! Abraão rasik mate tiha ona, profeta sira mos mate ona, maibee O dehan, see mak halo tuir O nia liafuan sei la mate.
O hanoin O makaas liu ami nia bei-ala Abraão ka? Afinal Abraão mate tiha ona, profeta sira mos mate ona. O hanoin O nee see fali?”
Jesus hataan, “Se Hau rasik mak foti aas Hau nia Aan, nee la iha folin ida. Maibee Ida nebee foti aas Hau mak Hau nia Aman, Nia nee mak imi bolu imi nia Maromak.
Afinal imi la konhese Nia. Hau konhese Nia, se karik Hau dehan Hau la konhese Nia, entaun Hau bosok-teen hanesan mos imi. Maibee Hau konhese duni Nia i halo tuir Nia liafuan.
Imi nia bei-ala Abraão hakarak teb-tebes atu haree Hau mai. Bainhira nia hanoin kona ba Hau nia loron, nia laran haksolok. Nia haree duni, i nia kontenti.”
Depois ema Judeu sira dehan ba Nia, “O nia tinan seidauk too lima-nulu maibee O haree tiha ona Abraão ka?”
Jesus hataan, “Hau hatete lo-loos ba imi, molok Abraão moris, Hau iha uluk ona.”
Rona nunee, sira foti fatuk atu tuda mate Nia tanba Nia halo Nia Aan hanesan Maromak. Maibee Jesus lao helik tiha husi sira nia klaran hodi sai husi area uma kreda boot.
Jesus lao dadauk, Nia haree mane ida nebee moris mai matan delek nanis.
Nia eskolante sira husu, “Mestri, see nia sala mak halo ema nee moris mai matan delek? Nia sala rasik ka nia inan-aman nian?”
Jesus hataan, “Nia matan delek laos tanba nia sala rasik ka tanba nia inan-aman nia sala. Maibee nia sai nunee para ema bele haree Maromak nia kbiit iha nia.
Maromak mak haruka Hau mai. Ita tenki halao Nia servisu durante rai sei loron. Kuandu rai kalan ona, ema ida la bele halao servisu tan.
Durante Hau sei iha mundu nee, Hau mak naroman mundu nian.”
Koalia tiha nunee Jesus tafui kabeen ba rai, kahur ho rai halo tahu, depois kose ba ema nee nia matan.
Nia hatete ba ema nee, “Baa fase o nia matan iha kolan Siloé.” (Siloé katak “haruka”.) Entaun ema nee baa fase nia matan. Bainhira nia fila fali, nia bele haree.
Nia vizinhu sira ho mos ema seluk nebee baibain haree nia husu ezmola hatete ba malu dehan, “Ema nee mak baibain tuur hodi husu ezmola nee ka lae?”
Iha balu dehan, “Nia duni.” Balu dehan, “Lae, nia oin mak atu hanesan.” Maibee ema nee rasik dehan, “Hau duni.”
Nunee sira husu, “Entaun halo nusaa mak o nia matan bele haree?”
Nia hataan, “Ema ida naran Jesus halo tahu kose ba hau nia matan, i haruka hau baa fase iha bee Siloé. Hau baa fase tiha, depois hau bele haree.”
Sira husu fali, “Ema nee iha nebee?” Nia hataan, “Hau la hatene.”
Depois ema lori mane nebee uluk matan delek nee ba iha ema husi grupu Farizeu.
Tanba loron nebee Jesus halo tahu hodi kura ema matan delek nee loron Sabadu, ema Judeu nia loron deskansa.
Nunee ema Farizeu sira husu ba ema nee, “Halo nusaa mak o nia matan bele haree?” Nia hataan, “Nia kose tahu ba iha hau nia matan, depois hau baa fase tiha, agora hau bele haree.”
Ema Farizeu balu dehan, “Ema nee laos mai husi Maromak, tanba Nia halo fali servisu iha loron Sabadu.” Maibee balu dehan, “Sala nain ida bele halo milagre hanesan nee ka?” Nunee sira haksesuk malu.
Too ikus ema Farizeu sira husu fali ba ema nebee uluk matan delek nee dehan, “Nia kura o nia matan. Entaun oinsaa o nia hanoin kona ba Nia?” Ema nee hataan, “Nia Maromak nia profeta ida.”
Maibee nai ulun Judeu sira nee la fiar nafatin katak, ema nee uluk matan delek i agora bele haree. Nunee sira haruka ema baa bolu nia inan-aman mai.
Depois nai ulun sira nee husu dehan, “Ema nee imi nia oan ka? Nia mak imi dehan moris mai matan delek ka? Se nunee halo nusaa mak nia bele haree?”
Nia inan-aman hataan, “Loos duni, nia ami nia oan. Ami hatene nia moris mai matan delek.
Maibee oinsaa mak nia bele haree, ami la hatene. Ami mos la hatene see mak kura nia matan. Ita boot sira bele husu rasik ba nia. Nia boot ona, nia bele hataan mesak.”
Nia inan-aman hataan nunee tanba sira tauk. Tanba nai ulun Judeu sira kombina malu tiha ona katak see mak foo sai dehan Jesus mak Mesias, nia la bele tama tan iha uma kreda.
Nee mak nia inan-aman dehan, “Nia boot ona, ita boot sira bele husu rasik ba nia.”
Nunee nai ulun Judeu sira bolu fila fali ema nebee uluk matan delek nee hodi dehan, “O jura took iha Maromak nia oin atu hataan ho lo-loos. Ami hatene katak Ema nee sala nain ida.”
Nia hataan, “Ema nee sala nain ka lae, hau la hatene. Buat nebee hau hatene mak uluk hau matan delek, maibee agora hau bele haree.”
Nunee sira husu fali, “Nia halo saida ba o? Oinsaa mak Nia kura o nia matan?”
Nia hataan, “Hau hatete tiha ona ba ita boot sira maibee ita boot sira lakohi rona. Nusaa mak ita boot sira hakarak rona tan? Keta halo be ita boot sira mos hakarak sai Nia eskolante?”
Depois sira hatete aat nia. I sira dehan tan, “O mak Ema nee nia eskolante, ami lae! Ami Moisés nia eskolante.
Ami hatene katak Maromak koalia ba Moisés. Maibee kona ba Ema nee, Nia mosu husi nebee ami la hatene.”
Nunee nia hataan, “Hau admira! Ita boot sira dehan la hatene Ema nee mai husi nebee. Afinal Nia kura tiha ona hau nia matan.
Ita hotu hatene katak Maromak la rona ema sala nain, Nia so rona ema nebee adora Nia i halo tuir Nia hakarak.
Hori uluk liu too agora seidauk iha ema ida mak kura ema nebee moris mai matan delek, atu nia bele haree.
Se karik Ema nee laos mai husi Maromak, entaun Nia la bele halo buat ida.”
Rona nunee sira hataan, “O nee moris mai nakonu ho sala tiha ona. O mak hanorin fali ami ka?” Depois sira duni sai tiha nia husi uma kreda.
Jesus rona katak nai ulun Judeu sira duni sai tiha ona ema nebee uluk matan delek nee husi uma kreda. Nunee Nia baa hasoru ema nee hodi dehan, “O fiar Ema Umanu nia Oan ka lae?”
Ema nee husu fali ba Jesus, “Senhor, Ema Umanu nia Oan nee see? Foo hatene hau atu hau bele fiar.”
Jesus hatete ba nia, “O haree tiha ona Nia, agora dadauk Nia mak koalia ho o nee.”
Ema nee hataan, “Hau fiar, Nai.” I nia hakneak hodi adora Jesus.
